GSP33brsvbh1u:15: śāśvatāya namaskurmo vedāya ca bhavāya ca //3//
GSP33brsvbh1u:29: FN: 1-yatra jijñāsyatvaṃ tatraiva saṃdigdhatvaṃ saprayojanatvaṃ ceti jijñāsyatvavyāpake saṃdigdhatvasaprayojanatve /
GSP33brsvbh1u:43_0: sa cāyam ākīṭapataṅgebhya ā ca devarṣibhyaḥ prāṇabhṛnmātrasyedaṅkārāspadebhyo dehendriyamanobuddhiviṣayebhyo
GSP33brsvbh1u:44: na hi jātu kaścidatra saṃdigdhe 'ahaṃ vā nāhaṃ vā'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:53: tadālambanatve hi 'yo 'haṃ bālye pitarāvanvabhavaṃ sa eva sthāvire praṇaptṝnanubhavāmi'iti pratisaṃdhānaṃ na bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:54: na hi bālasthavirayoḥ śarīrayorasti manāgapi pratyabhijñāna @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:59: tasmādyeṣu vyāvartamāneṣu yadanuvartate tattebhyo bhinnaṃ yathā ca kusumebhyaḥ sūtram /
GSP33brsvbh1u:60: tathā bālādiśarīreṣu vyāvartamāneṣvapi paramahaṅkārāspadamanuvartamānaṃ tebhyo bhidyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:61_0: api ca svapnānte divyaśarīrabhedamāsthāya taducitānbhogānbhuñjāna eva pratibuddho
GSP33brsvbh1u:61_1: manuṣyaśarīramātmānaṃ paśyan 'nāhaṃ devo manuṣya eva'iti devaśarīre bādhyamāne 'pyahamāspadamabādhyamānaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:64: FN: 2-aṇimādisiddhilābhāllīlādyarthaṃ yogamahimnā vyāghraśarīraṃ kṛtvā tadābhimānītyarthaḥ atredaṃ bodhyam avayavopacayāpacayātmake bālye sthāvire vā na śarīrabhedaḥ siddhyati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:84: tasmādidaṅkārāspadebhyo dehendriyamanobuddhiviṣayebhyo vyāvṛttaḥ sphuṭatarāhamanubhavagamya ātmā saṃśayābhāvādajijñāsya iti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh1u:96: na ca 'aham'iti sarvajanīnasphuṭatarānubhavasamarthita ātmā dehendriyādivyatiriktaḥ śakya upaniṣadāṃ sahasrairapyanyathayitum,
GSP33brsvbh1u:99: tasmādanubhavavirodhādupacaritārthā evopaniṣada iti yuktamutpaśyāma ityāśayavānāśaṅkya pariharati-yuṣmadasmatpratyayagocarayoḥ iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:108: FN: 2-idaṃśabdasya parākpratipādakatvāviśeṣe 'pi ete vayamityādi pracuraprayogavaśānmukhyavadbhānaṃ bhavatīti tattatra nirūḍhamiti bhāvaḥ / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:118: FN: 3-samudācarantyau bhedena jñāyamāne vṛttī vartane yayoste tathā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:126: FN: 4-itarasyetaratra bhāva iti yojane siddhasya saṃsargādhyāsaniṣedhasya sādhanaṃ bhavettadanenāpahṛtaṃ boddhavyam / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:135: yathā kusumādbhedena gṛhyamāṇe 'pi sphaṭikamaṇāvatisvacchatayā japākusumapratibimbodgrāhiṇyaruṇaḥ sphaṭikaityāruṇyavibhrama ityata uktam-taddharmāṇāmapīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:137: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-rūpavaddhi dravyamatisvacchatayā rūpavato dravyāntarasya tadvivekena gṛhyamāṇasyāpi cchāyāṃ gṛhṇīyāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:151: mithyeti bhavituṃ yuktaṃ yadyapi tathāpīti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:158: parāmarśo madhye nirdeśaḥ upasaṃhāraśca sāmānyena kathitasya viśeṣe niyamanam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:161: annena śuṅgena sanmūlamanvicchetyādi nirdiśya 'sa ya eṣo 'ṇimaitadātmyamidaṃ sarvaṃ tatsatyaṃ sa ātmā tattvamasi śvetaketo'ityupasaṃhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:168: tasmāt brahmaṇo 'vatārāya yatkiñcidvyāhartavyamiti tadvyāhṛtamiti suvacamato niṣprapañcātmatattvapratipādakānyevaitānīti dik / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:170: parāmarśopasaṃhāraiḥ kriyāsamabhihāreṇedṛgātmatattvamabhidadhati tatparāṇi santi śakyāni śakreṇāpyupacaritārthāni kartum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:171: abhyāse hi bhūyastvamarthasya bhavati yathāho darśanīyāho darśanīyeti na nyūnatvaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:196: na hyāgamajñānaṃ sāṃvyavahārikaṃ pratyakṣasya prāmāṇyamupahanti yena kāraṇābhāvānna bhavedapi tu tāttvikam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:199: tathā ca varṇe hrasvatvadīrghatvādayo 'nyadharmā api samāropitāḥ tattvapratipattihetavaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:200: na hi laukikāḥ 'nāgaḥ'iti vā“nagaḥ“iti vā padātkuñcaraṃ vā taruṃ vā pratipadyamānā bhavanti bhrāntāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:209: paro lakṣyaḥ śabdārtho na bhavatīti śābarabhāṣye siddhāntitam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:211: 'tattvamasi'ityādau ca jīvabrahmaṇoraikyaṃ bruvatāṃ mate bhāgalakṣaṇāṅgīkārānnaitadyuktamiti vācyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:213: tattulyaṃ vā tātparyavadvākyaṃ yatkiñcudanugrahārthamanyaparaṃ na netuṃ śakyamityarthe tātparyāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:217: jyeṣṭhatvaṃ ca anapekṣitasya bādhyatve hetuḥ na tu bādhakatve,
GSP33brsvbh1u:229: FN: 4-jyotiṣṭome 'nyonyaṃ saṃbadhya yajñaśālāto nirgacchatāmṛtvijāṃ vicchedanimittaṃ prāyaścittaṃ śrūyate 'yadyudgātāpacchidyetādakṣiṇena yajeta,
GSP33brsvbh1u:230_1: viruddhaprāyaścittayoḥ samuccayāsaṃbhavāt kiṃ pūrvaṃ kāryamuta paramiti saṃdehe rāddhāntaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:237: api ca ye 'pyahaṅkārāspadamātmānamāsthiṣata tairapyasya na tāttvikatvamabhyupetavyam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:240: na cedaṃ dehasya prādeśikatvamanubhūyate na tvātmana iti sāṃpratam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:243: api ca paraśabdaḥ paratra lakṣyamāṇaguṇayogena vartata iti yatra prayoktṛpratipatroḥ saṃpratipattiḥ sa gauṇaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:247: FN: 6-'yadagnaye ca prajāpataye ca sāyaṃ juhoti'ityagnerheme devatāprakhyāpanādatra agnihotrakarmanāmadheyamagnihotrapadamityarthaḥ)
GSP33brsvbh1u:249: prakaraṇāntarāvadhṛtabhede kauṇḍapāyināmayanagate karmaṇi 'māsamagmihotraṃ juhoti'(ā. 7 pā. 3 sū. 1)
GSP33brsvbh1u:252: FN: 1-prakaraṇabhedena karmabhede siddhe 'nekatra śaktyaṅgīkāre gauravādagnihotravajjuhotīti sādhyasādṛśyena gauṇa ityarthaḥ / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:257: FN: 2-niṣkṛṣya luṭhitaḥ pratibhāsito garbho 'sādhāraṇākāro yasya sa tathā tattathā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:267: nirūṭhatayā gauṇe 'pi na gauṇatvābhimānaḥ sārṣapādiṣu tailaśabdavaditi veditavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:268: tatrāpi snehāttilabhavādbhede siddha eva sārṣapādīnāṃ tailaśabdavācyatvābhimāno,
GSP33brsvbh1u:270: tatsiddhaṃ gauṇatvamubhayadarśino gauṇamukhyavivekavijñānena vyāptam tadidaṃ vyāpakaṃ vivekajñānaṃ nivartamānaṃ gauṇatāmapi nivartayatīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:271: na ca bālasthaviraśarīrabhede 'pi so 'hamityekasyātmanaḥ pratisaṃdhānadehādibhyo bhede @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:278: parīkṣakā api hi vyavahārasamaye na lokasāmāmyamativartante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:280: bāhyā apyāhuḥ -'śāstracintakāḥ khalvevaṃ vivecayanti na pratipattāraḥ'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:281: tatpāriśeṣyāccidātmagocaramahaṅkāram 'ahamihāsmi sadanā'iti prayuñjāno laukikaḥ śarīrādyabhedagrahādātmanaḥ prādeśikatvamabhimanyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:283: na cāhaṅkāraprāmāṇyāya dehādivadātmāpi prādeśika iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:288: kiñca asminpakṣe avayavasamudāyo vā cetayet pratyekaṃ vāvayavāḥ?
GSP33brsvbh1u:289: pratyekaṃ cetanatvapakṣe bahūnāṃ cetanānāṃ svatantrāṇāmekavākyatābhāvādaparyāyaṃ viruddhādikkriyatayā śarīramunmathyeta,
GSP33brsvbh1u:291: samudāyasya tu caitanyayoge vṛkṇa ekasminnavayave cidātmano 'pyavayavo vṛkṇa iti na cetayet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:293: ya evāvayavo viśīrṇastadā tadabhāve na cetayet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:301: tadevamuktena krameṇāhaṃpratyaye pūtikūṣmāṇḍīkṛte bhagavatī śrutirapratyūhaṃ kartṛtvabhoktṛtvaduḥkhaśokādyātmatvamahamanubhavaprasañjitamātmano niṣeddhumarhatīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:308: itiśabdasūcitaśca śarīrādyanukūlaṃ pratikūlaṃ ca prameyajātaṃ pramāya pramāṇena tadupādānaparivarjanādiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:313: atra ca adhyāsavyavahārakriyābhyāṃ yaḥ kartonnītaḥ sa samāna iti samānakartṛkatvenādhyasya vyavahāra ityupapannam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:317: tadevamadhyāsasvarūpaṃ phalaṃ ca vyavahāramuktvā tasya nimittamāha-itaretarāvivekena /
GSP33brsvbh1u:321: paramārthato dharmiṇoratādātmyaṃ viveko dharmāṇāṃ cāsaṃkīrṇatā vivekaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:325: iha tu paramārthasataścidātmano 'tyantabhinnaṃ na dehādyasti vastusat,
GSP33brsvbh1u:326: tatkutaścidātmano bhedāgrahaḥ kutaśca tādātmyavibhramaḥ ityata āha-satyānṛte mithunīkṛtya iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:335: na ca saṃvṛtiparamārthasatoḥ pāramārthakaṃ mithunamastītyabhūtatadbhāvārthasya cveḥ prayogaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:336: etaduktaṃ bhavati - apratītasyāropāyogādāropyasya pratītirupayujyate na vastusatteti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:338: āropyasya pratītau satyāṃ pūrvadṛṣṭasya samāropaḥ samāropanibandhanā ca pratītiriti durvāraṃ parasparāśrayatvamityata āha-naisargika iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:346: prakāśamānatvameva hi cidātmano 'pi sattvaṃ na tu tadatiriktaṃ sattāsāmānyasamavāyor'thakriyākāritā vā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:356: samādhātā lokasiddhamadhyāsalakṣaṇamācakṣāṇa evākṣepaṃ pratikṣipati-ucyate-smṛtirūpaḥ paratra pūrvadṛṣṭāvabhāsa /
GSP33brsvbh1u:363: tasya ca dṛṣṭatvamātramupayujyate na vastusatteti dṛṣṭagrahaṇam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:364: tathāpi vartamānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ darśanaṃ nāropopayogīti pūrvetyuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:372: asti hi svastimatyāṃ gavi pūrvadṛṣṭasya gotvasya,
GSP33brsvbh1u:377: pūrvaṃ tu pūrvadṛṣṭasya paratra dharmyadhyāsamabhipretyeti jñeyam @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:379: ca pāṭaliputre pūrvadṛṣṭasya devadattasya paratra māhiṣmatyāmavabhāsaḥ samīcīnaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:382: FN: 2-nanu avamato bhāso 'vabhāsa iti vyutpādayam kathamudāhṛtasthalādāvativyāptimāheti vadantaṃ pratyāha-avabhāsapadaṃ ceti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:384: na ca pūrvadṛṣṭapadenānirvācyānṛtamuktamityuktatvānna tatrātivyāptikathanaṃ saṃgacchata iti vācyam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:388: yathā nīlasyāvabhāsaḥ pītasyāvabhāsa ityata āha-smṛtirūpa iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:405: asaṃbandhāgrahaṇasārūpyeṇapītaṃ tapanīyapiṇḍaṃpītaṃ bilvaphalamityādau pūrvadṛṣṭaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ pītatvaśaṅkhatvayorāropyāhapītaḥ śaṅkhaiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:407: evaṃ vijñātṛpuruṣābhimukheṣvādarśodakādiṣu svaccheṣu cākṣuṣaṃ tejo lagnamapi balīyasā sauryeṇa tejasā pratisrotaḥ pravartitaṃ mukhasaṃyuktaṃ mukhaṃ grāhayat,
GSP33brsvbh1u:411: FN: 2-pūrvadṛṣṭayorabhimukhayoḥ ādarthodakayordeśa eva deśo yasya tasya bhāvastattā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:414: darśodakadeśatāmābhimukhyaṃ ca mukhasyāropayatīti pratibimbavibhramo 'pi lakṣito bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:418: na hi sarpādibhāvena rajjvādayo vā sphaṭikādayo vā raktādiguṇayogino na pratibhāsante,
GSP33brsvbh1u:424: na ca marīcirūpeṇa salilamavastusatsvarūpeṇa tu paramārthasadeva,
GSP33brsvbh1u:425: dehendriyādayastu svarūpeṇāpyasanta ityanubhavāgocaratvātkathamāropyanta iti sāṃpratamyato yadyasan nānubhavagocarāḥ kathaṃ tarhi marīcyādīnāmasatāṃ toyatayānubhavagocaratvam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:426: na ca svarūpasattvena toyādyātmanāpi santo bhavanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:428: api tu bhāva eva bhāvāntarātmanā abhāvaḥ svarūpeṇa tu bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:431: FN: 3-yathā iha ghaṭo nāstītyādau kevalabhūtalādhikaraṇasvarūpatvaṃ ghaṭābhāvasya,
GSP33brsvbh1u:433: tathā jalarūpeṇa marīcīnāmasattvaṃ yat tanmarīcaya eva,
GSP33brsvbh1u:453: viṣayasya samastasāmarthyavirahe 'pi jñānameva tattādṛśaṃ svapratyayasāmarthyāsāditādṛṣṭāntasiddhasvabhāvabhedamupajātamasataḥ prakāśanaṃ, tasmāda @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:455: FN: 6-bauddhānāṃ mate 'vidyayāsatprakāśakamiti cet vā hi asatprakāśanaśaktirjñānasya saivā vadyetyarthaḥ / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:468: śaktijñāpyaṃ punaḥ kasmānnabhavediti cet śaktijñāpyatvaṃ śaktiniṣṭhajñāpakatānirūpitajñāpyatāśālitvaṃ vaktavyam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:473: FN: 8-atha vaktavyaṃ jñānāntaramupalabhata iti tathāpi tasyāpi jñāpakatvena jñānāntarāpekṣāyāmanavasthāpāta ityarthaḥ / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:478: asadadhīnanirūpaṇatvaṃ sato jñānasyāsatā saṃbandha iti cet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:482: asadantareṇa pratyayo na prathata iti pratyayasyaivaiṣa svabhāvo na tvasadadhīnamasya kiñciditi cet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:485: FN: 1-avinābhāvamūlaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvo vā tatsvabhāvatvaṃ vā vaktavyam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:492: FN: 2-evaṃ sarvatra vastu sadeva bhātīti sadvādinākṣipte siddhāntyāha-atra brūma iti / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:495: tatkimidānīṃ marīcayo 'pi toyātmanā satattvā yadanubhavagocarāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:499: FN: 3-nanu sadvādinā toyātmanā marīcīnāmasattvaṃ cedaṅgīkriyeta tarhi siddhāntahāniriti cenna,
GSP33brsvbh1u:504: dvividhaṃ ca vastūnāṃ tattvaṃ sattvamasattvaṃ ca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:508: vastuni jñāyate kiñcidrūpaṃ kaiścitkadā ca na //
GSP33brsvbh1u:516: tathā ca samīcīna iti na bhrānto nāpi bādhyeta / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:523: addhā na bādhyeta yadi marīcīnatoyātmatattvānatoyātmanā gṛhṇīyāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:527: FN: 6-anirvacanīyakhyātivādī pratyāha-yatpunarāropita bhāvāntaratoyātmanā marīcayo bhāsanta ityavādīḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:535: FN: 7-na satkiṃ tu asadeveti cettātkiṃ tucchaṃ vā sadbhinnaṃ veti vaktavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:540: vastvantarameva hi vastvantarasyāsattvamāsthīyate 'bhāvāntaramabhāvo 'nyo na kaścidanirūpaṇāt'iti vadadbhiḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:562: tattvatastu na toyaṃ na ca pūrvadṛṣṭaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:565: apūrvo 'pi pūrvamithyāpratyayopadarśita iva paratra cidātmanyadhyasyata iti upapannam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:571: na tu tadatiriktaṃ sattāsāmānyasamavāyor'thakriyākāritā veti sarvamavadātam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:573: tadbhede paraṃ vipratipattirityanirvacanīyatāṃ draḍhayitumāha-taṃ kecidanyatrānyadharmādhyāsa iti vadanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:580: vijñānavādināmapi yadyapi na bāhyaṃ vastu sat,
GSP33brsvbh1u:586: FN: 1-ayaṃ bhāvaḥ-idaṃ rajatamityatra rajatānuyogikaṃ idantvapratiyogikaṃ tādātmyaṃ bhāsate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:590: tasmānnedaṃ rajatamityatra raḍate bhāsamānā idantaiva bādhitā bhavenna punā rajatamapīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:591: tathā caitanmate ahaṃ rajatamiti pratyayaḥ prameti bhāvaḥ / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:593: nedaṃ rajatamiti ca bādhakasyedantāmātrabādhenopapattau na rajatagocaratocitā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:594: rajatasya dharmiṇo bhādhe hi rajataṃ ca tasya ca dharma idantā bādhite bhavetām,
GSP33brsvbh1u:595: tadvaramidantaivāsya dharmo bādhyatām na punā rajatamapi dharmi,
GSP33brsvbh1u:596: tathā ca rajataṃ bahirbādhitamarthādāntare jñāne vyavatiṣṭhata iti jñānākārasya bahiradhyāsaḥ sidhyati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:616: kiṃ purovarti dravyaṃ rajatādvidhecayatyāhosmin jñānākāratāmapyasya darśayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:617: tatra jñānākāratopadarśanavyāpāraṃ bādhakapratyayasya bruvāṇaḥ ślāghanīyaprajño devānāṃ priyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:626: FN: 4-yaduktaṃ bahirbādhitamarthāntare vyavatiṣṭhata iti tadapyannathopapadyata ityāha-asaṃnidhāneti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:638: na ca rajatameva śuktikāyāṃ prasañjitaṃ rajatajñānena /
GSP33brsvbh1u:663: FN: 10-idaṃ rajatamiti jñānaṃ na mithyetyāha-api ceti / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:665: api cendriyādīnāṃ samīcīnajñānopajanane sāmarthyamupalabdhamiti kathamebhyo mithyājñānasaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:672: FN: 11-sarvajñānānāṃ samīcīnatve udāhṛtasthale bhrama eva na syāditi cettatra svamatamāha-tathā ceti / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:675: idam iti ca dve vijñāne smṛtyanubhavarūpe,
GSP33brsvbh1u:678: tanmātraṃ ca gṛhītaṃ sadṛśatayā saṃskārodbodhakrameṇa rajate smṛtiṃ janayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:685: tathā ca rajatasamṛteḥ purovartidravyamātragrahaṇasya ca mithaḥ svarūpato viṣayataśca bhedāgrahāt, saṃnihita @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:688: atraivaṃ tajjñānasārūpyaṃ-yathedaṃ rajatamitijñānaṃ idamo rajatasya cāsaṃsargaṃ na gṛhṇāti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:694: idaṃ rajatamiti bhinne api smaraṇagrahaṇe abhedavyavahāraṃ ca sāmānādhikaraṇyavyapadeśaṃ ca pravartayataḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:697: atra hi bahirvinirgacchannayanaraśmivartinaḥ pittadravyasya kācasyeva svacchasya pītatvaṃ gṛhyate pittaṃ tu na gṛhyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:701: tadupapattau ca prācīnasya pratyayasya bhrāntatvamapi lokasiddhaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:710: yasminśuktikādau yasya rajatāderadhyāsa iti lokaprasiddhiḥ nāsāvanyathākhyātinibandhanā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:711: kintu gṛhītasya rajatādestatsmaraṇasya ca gṛhītatāṃśapramoṣeṇa gṛhītamātrasya ca yaḥ idamiti puro 'vasthitāddravyamātrāttatjñānācca vivekaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:716: atredamākūtam-asti tāvadrajatārthinorajatamidamiti pratyayātpurovartini dravye pravṛttiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyavyapadeśaśceti sarvajanīnam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:720: kiṃ tu grahaṇasmaraṇe eva mithaḥ svarūpato viṣayataścāgṛhītabhede,
GSP33brsvbh1u:726: tatra na tāvatsamīcīnajñānasadṛśī iti jñānaṃ samīcīnajñānavadvyavahārapravartakam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:727: na higosadṛśo gavayaḥiti jñānaṃ gavārthinaṃ gavaye pravartayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:732: tatra kimayamāropotpādakrameṇa vyavahāraheturāstvāho 'nutpāditāropa eva svata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:735: nanu satyaṃ cetanavyavahāro nājñānapūrvakaḥ kiṃ tvaviditavivekagrahaṇasmaraṇapūrvaka iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:739: kathaṃ cāyamidaṅkārāspade pravarteta yadi na tadicchet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:741: na cedidaṅkārāspadaṃ rajatamiti jānīyātkathaṃ rajatārthī tadicchet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:743: so 'yamupādānopekṣābhyāmabhita ākṛṣyamāṇaścedano 'vyavasthitaḥ itīdaṅkārāspade rajatasamāropeṇopādāna eva vyavasthāpyate iti bhedāgrahaḥ samāropotpādakrameṇa cetanapravṛttihetuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:753: FN: 2-sādhyasādhanajñātasaṃbandhasya puṃso liṅgaviśiṣṭadharmyekadeśadarśanāt liṅge viśiṣṭadharmyekadeśe buddhiranumānamiti śabarasvāminaḥ / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:760: yadyadarthinaṃ yatra niyamena pravartayati tajjñānantadviṣayaṃ yathobhayasiddhasamīcīnarajatajñānam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:765: kiṃ śuktikātvasyaidaṃ rajatamiti jñānaṃ pratyanālambanatvamāhosvitdravyamātrasya puraḥsthitasya sitabhāsvarasya /
GSP33brsvbh1u:775: tat bodhakatvena svataḥprāmāṇyaṃ nāvyabhicāreṇeti vyutpādayadbhirasmābhiḥ parihṛtaṃ nyāya @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:777: FN: 3-vyabhicāriṇāmapi sitanīlādiṣu cakṣurādīnāṃ bodhakatvena prāmāṇyamityā de tatroktam / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:782: tadidamuktam-'anye tu yatra yadadhyāsastasyaiva viparītadharmatvakalpanāmācakṣate iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:783: 'yatra śuktikādau yasya rajatāderadhyāsastasyaiva śuktikāderviparītadharmakalpanāṃ rajatatvadharmakalpanāmiti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:785: prakṛte tu kimāyātamityatāha-sarvathāpi tvanyasyānyadharmakalpanāṃ na vyabhicarati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:792: tena sarveṣāmeva parīkṣakāṇāṃ mato 'nyasyānyadharmakalpanānirvacanīyāvaśyaṃbhāvinītyanirvacanīyatā sarvatantrasiddhānta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:795: api tu laukikānāmapītyāha-tathā ca loke 'nubhavaḥ--śuktikā hi rajatavadavabhāsata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:799: ekasya tvabhinnasya bhedabhramo na dṛṣṭa iti kutaścidātmano 'bhinnānāṃ jīvānāṃ bhedavibhrama ityatāha-ekaścandraḥ sadvitīyavaditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:803: na khalvapratibhāsamāne purovartini dravye rajatasya vā taddharmāṇāṃ vā samāropaḥ saṃbhavatiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:806: na khalu sa eva kartā ca karma ca bhavati, virodhāt / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:808: FN: 2-dhātvarthatāvacchedakaphalaśālitvaṃ karmatvamityukte gacchatītyādau saṃyogaphalasya grāma iva caitre 'pi samavetatvāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:813: na ca jñānakriyā parasamavāyinīti kathamasyāṃ karma,
GSP33brsvbh1u:814: na ca tadeva svaṃ ca paraṃ ca, virodhāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:818: ātmā jaḍo 'pi sarvārthajñāneṣu bhāsamāno 'pi kartaiva na karma,
GSP33brsvbh1u:820: yathā hi caitrasamavetakriyayā caitranagaraprāptāvubhayasamavetāyāmapi kriyamāṇāyāṃ nagarasyaiva karmatā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:825: śrūyate hi 'satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma'iti upapadyate ca,
GSP33brsvbh1u:826: tathā hi-yo 'yamarthaprakāśaḥ phalaṃ yasminnarthaśca ātmā ca prathete sa kiṃ jaḍaḥ svayaṃprakāśo vā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:839: ātmā jaḍaḥ kiṃ na syāditivādinaṃ ātmasvaprakāśavādyāha---tathāpīti / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:844: FN: 1-arthātmasaṃbandhinyāṃ saṃvidyajaḍāyāmapi nārthātmanoḥ prakāśamānatāsiddhiḥ paṇḍite 'pi putre piturapāṇḍityavadityāha---tatkimiti / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:846: tatkiṃ putraḥ paṇḍita iti pitāpi paṇḍito 'stu /
GSP33brsvbh1u:847: svabhāva eṣa saṃvidaḥ svayaṃprakāśāyā yadarthātmasaṃbandhiteti cet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:848: hanta putrasyāpi paṇḍitasya svabhāva eṣa yatpitṛsaṃbandhiteti @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:850: FN: 2-yathā svabhāvasaṃbaddhā saṃvit tathā pitṛgatajanakatvasaṃbaddhaṃ putragatajanyatvamiti bhāvaḥ / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:853: sahārthātmaprakāśena saṃvitprakāśo na tvarthātmaprakāśaṃ vineti tasyāḥ svabhāva iti cet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:863: evaṃ cet yāvaduktaṃ bhavati saṃvitātmārthau saheti tāvaduktaṃ bhavati saṃvidarthātmaprakāśau saheti, @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:865: FN: 4-saṃvidatiriktaprakāśānaṅgīkāre saṃvidarthātmānau saha prakāśata ityuktaṃ syāt tathā coktaputrapāṇḍityanyāyaprasaraḥ / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:880: na ca prakāśasyātmāno viṣayāḥte hi vicchinnadīrghasthūlatayānubhūyante,
GSP33brsvbh1u:885: tasmāccandre 'nubhūyamāne iva dvitīyaścandramāḥ svaprakāśādanyor'thaḥ anirvacanīya eveti yuktamutpaśyāmaḥ / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:894: na ca anirvācyārthabhedaḥ prakāśaṃ nirvācyaṃ bhettumarhati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:896: na ca arthānāmapi parasparaṃ bhedaḥ samīcīnajñānapaddhatimadhyāste ityupariṣṭādupapādayiṣyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:897_0: tadayaṃ prakāśa eva svayaṃprakāśa ekaḥ kūṭasthanityo niraṃśaḥ pratyagātmāśakyanirvacanīyebhyo
GSP33brsvbh1u:897_1: dehendriyādibhya ātmānaṃ pratīpaṃ nirvacanīyamañcati jānātīti pratyaṅ sa cātmeti pratyagātmā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:904: kasmādayamayukta ityata āha-sarvo hi puro 'vasthite viṣaye viṣayāntaramadhyasyati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:905: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yatparādhīnaprakāśamaṃśavacca tatsāmānyāṃśagrahe kāraṇadoṣavaśācca viśeṣāgrahe 'nyathā prakāśate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:911: nahi tadeva tadānīmeva tenaiva gṛhītamagṛhītaṃ ca saṃbhavatīti na svayaṃprakāśapakṣe 'dhyāsaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:914: FN: 9-śukteriva ekasyaiva vastunaḥ grahaṇāgrahaṇe siddhe kimityaupādhikaṃ viṣayatvaṃ sādhyata iti cet sāṃśasya tathā syāt ātmanastu niraṃśatvānna tathetyāha----nahīti / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:916: na hi śuktau apuraḥsthitāyāṃ rajatamadhyasyatīdaṃ rajatamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:917: tasmādatyantagrahe atyantāgrahe ca nādhyāsa iti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh1u:921: tatkathaṃ nādhyāsa ityata āha-yuṣmatpratyayāpetasya ca pratyagātmano 'viṣayatvaṃ bravīṣi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:923: tathā ca yo viṣayī sa eva cidātmā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:930: tathāpi anirvacanīyānādyavidyāparikalpitabuddhimanaḥ sūkṣmasthūlaśarīrendriyāvacchedakabhedenānavacchinno 'pi vastuto 'vacchinna iva abhinno 'pi bhinna iva,
GSP33brsvbh1u:931: akartāpi karteva abhoktāpi bhokteva aviṣayo 'pyasmatpratyayaviṣaya iva,
GSP33brsvbh1u:934: na hi cidekarasasyātmanaḥ cidaṃśe gṛhīte agṛhītaṃ kiñcidasti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:937: gṛhītā eva tu kalpitena bhedena na vivecitā ityagṛhītā ivābhānti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:939: yena cidātmani gṛhyamāṇe so 'pi gṛhīto bhavet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:941: tasmāccidātmanaḥ svayaṃprakāśasyaiva anavacchinnasya avacchinnebhyo buddhyādibhyo bhedāgrahāt tadadhyāsena jīvabhāva iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:943: tathā hi-kartā bhoktā cidātmā ahaṃpratyaye pratyavabhāsate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:945: yasya ca buddhyādeḥ kāryakāraṇasaṃghātasya kriyābhogaśaktī na tasya caitanyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:946_2: ca janturiti ca kṣetrajña iti ca ākhyāyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:951: FN: 1-yatpūrvaṃ karmakartṛtvavirodha uktaḥ so 'pyanena parāsto veditavyaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:955: na ca adhyāse sati viṣayatvaṃ viṣayatve ca adhyāsaḥ ityanyonyāśrayatvamiti sāṃpratam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:959: jīvo hi cidātmatayā svayaṃprakāśatayāviṣayo 'pyaupādhikena rūpeṇa viṣaya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:962: kintu pratyagātmā na svato nāpi parataḥ prathata ityaviṣayaḥ iti brūmaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:963: tathā ca sarvathāprathamāne pratyagātmani kuto 'dhyāsa ityata āha-aparokṣatvācca pratyagātmaprasiddheḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:969: etaduktaṃ bhavati-avaśyaṃ cidātmāparokṣo 'bhyupetavyaḥ tadaprathāyāṃ sarvasyāprathanena jagadāndhyaprasaṅgādityuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:970: śrutiścātra bhavati-'tameva bhāntamanu bhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:971: tadevaṃ paramārthaparihāramuktvābhyupetyāpi cidātmanaḥ parokṣatāṃ prauḍhavāditayā parihārāntaramāha-na cāyamasti niyamaḥ puro 'vasthita eva,
GSP33brsvbh1u:974: kasmādayaṃ na niyama ityata āha-apratyakṣe 'pi hyākāśe bālāstalamalinatādyadhyasanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:976: nabho hi dravyaṃ sat rūpasparśavirahānna bāhyendriyapratyakṣam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:980: atha ca tatra bālā avivekinaḥ paradarśitadarśinaḥ kadācitpārthivacchāyāṃ śyāmatāmāropya,
GSP33brsvbh1u:983: tatrāpi pūrvadṛṣṭasya taijasasya vā tāmasasya rūpasya paratra nabhasi smṛtirūpo 'vabhāsata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:988: tatkimarthamayamevādhyāsa ākṣepasamādhānābhyāṃ vyutpāditaḥ nādhyāsamātramityata āha-tametamevaṃlakṣaṇamadhyāsaṃ paṇḍitā avidyeti manyante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:991: pratyagātmanyanātmādhyāsa eva sarvānarthahetuḥ na punā rajatādivibhramā iti sa evāvidyā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:992: tatsvarūpaṃ cāvijñātaṃ na śakyamucchettumiti tadeva vyutpādyaṃ nādhyāsamātram /
GSP33brsvbh1u:999: upāyābhāvāditi yo manyate taṃ prati tannirodhopāyamāha-tadvivekena ca vastusvarūpāvadhāraṇam-nirvicikitsaṃ jñānamvidyāmāhuḥ,paṇḍitāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1006: vastusvarūpāvadhāraṇaṃ vidyā cidātmarūpaṃ svarūpe vyavatiṣṭhata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1008: atinirūḍhanibiḍhavāsanānuvidvāvidyā vidyayāpabādhitāpi svavāsanāvaśātpunarudbhaviṣyati pravartayiṣyati ca vāsanādikāryaṃ svocitamityata āha-tatraivaṃ sati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1010: yatra yadadhyāsastatkṛtena doṣeṇa guṇena vā aṇumātreṇāpi sa na saṃbadhyate-antaḥkaraṇādidoṣeṇāśanāyādinā cidātmā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1012: etaduktaṃ bhavati-tattvāvadhāraṇābhyāsasya hi svabhāva eva sa tādṛśaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1018: viśeṣatastu cidātmasvabhāvasya tattvajñānasyātyantāntaraṅgasya kuto 'nirvācyayāvidyayā bādha iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1020: vivekāgrahādadhyasyāhamidaṃmamedamiti lokavyavahāraiti tatra vyapadeśalakṣaṇo vyavahāraḥ kaṇṭhoktaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1028: santu vā pratyakṣādīni saṃvṛtyāpi yathā tathā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1032: ayamarthaḥ-pramātṛtvaṃ hi pramāṃ prati kartṛtvam tacca svātantryam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1039: atha mā pravartiṣata pramāṇāni kiṃ naśchinnamityata āha-na hīndriyāṇyanupādāya pratyakṣādivyavahāraḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1049: atha svayameva kasmānna pravartata ityata āha-na cādhiṣṭhānamantareṇendriyāṇāṃ vyāpāraḥ-pramāṇānāṃ vyāpāraḥsaṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1050: na jātu karaṇānyanadhiṣṭhitāni kartrā svakārye vyāpriyante,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1057: evamanadhyastātmabhāvaṃ dehendriyāditi vyāpārayan bhaviṣyati tadabhijñaḥ pramātotyata āha-na caitasminsarvasmin-itaretarātmādhyāse itaretarātmādhyāse ca,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1067: pramāyāṃ khalu phale svatantraḥ pramātā bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1082: āgamopapattipratipannapratyagātmatattvānāṃ vyutpannānāmapi puṃsāṃ pramāṇaprameyavyavahārā dṛśyanta iti kathamavidyāvadviṣayāṇyeva pramāṇānītyata āha-paśvādibhiścāviśeṣāditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1085: yādṛśo hi paśuśakuntādīnāmavipratipannamugdhabhāvānāṃ vyavahārastādṛśo vyutpannānāmapi puṃsāṃ dṛśyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1090: atra caśabdādibhiḥ śrotrādīnāṃ saṃbandhe satiiti pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ darśitam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1093: tathā hi-śabdādisvarūpamupalabhya tajjātīyasya pratikūlatāmanusmṛtya tajjātīyatayopalabhyamānasya pratikūlatāmanumimīta iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1098: śāstraṃ tu 'jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajeta'ityādi na dehātmādhyāsena pravartitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1103: śāstraphalaṃ śāstragamyaṃ phalaṃ prayoktari pratīyate tasmāt prayoge 'nuṣṭhāne yajamānaḥ svayaṃ kartā syāditi sūtrārthāḥ / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:1105: phalaṃ prayoktari tallakṣaṇatvāttasmātsvayaṃ prayoge syāt'(ā. 3 pā. 7 sū. 18)iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1106: na ca dehādi bhasmībhūtaṃ pāralaukikāya phalāya kalpata iti dehādyatiriktaṃ kañcidātmānamadhikāriṇamākṣipati śāstram,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1109: adhikāraśāstraṃ hi svargakāmasya puṃsaḥ paralokasaṃbandhaṃ vinā na nirvahatīti tāvanmātramākṣipet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1113: prayoktā hi karmaṇaḥ karmajanitaphalabhogabhāgī karmaṇyadhikārī svāmī bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1119: te tvavidyāvantamanuśāsanto nirmṛṣṭanikhilāvidyamanuśiṣṭaṃ svarūpe vyavasthāpayantītyetāvāneṣāṃ viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1124: tathā ca parasparāpahatārthatvena kṛtsna eva vedaḥ prāmāṇyamapajahyādityata āha-prāk ca tathābhūtātmeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1126: tasmāttu purastātkarmavidhayaḥ svocitaṃ vyavahāranirvartayanto nānupajātena brahmajñānena śakyā niroddhum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1129: yathā-'na hiṃsyātsarvā bhūtāni'iti sādhyāṃśaniṣedhe 'pi 'śyenenābhicaran yajeta'iti śāstraṃ pravartamānaṃ na hiṃsyādityanena na virudhyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1134: avidyāvatpuruṣaviṣayatvaṃ nātivartata iti yaduktaṃ tadeva sphorayati-tathāhiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1144: dehatādātmyamātmanyadhyasya dehadharmaṃ putrakalatrādisvāmyaṃ ca kṛśatvādivadāropya āha-ahameva vikalaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1146: svasya khalu sākalyena svābhyasākalyāt svāmīśvaraḥ sakalaḥ saṃpūrṇo bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1149: bāhyadharmā ye vaikalyādayaḥ svāmyapraṇālikayā saṃcaritāḥ śarīre tānātmanyadhyasyatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1150: yadā ca paropādhyapekṣe dehadharme svāmye iyaṃ gatiḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1151: tadā kaiva kathā anaupādhikeṣu dehadharmeṣu kṛśatvādiṣvatyāśayavānāha-tathā dehadharmāniti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1153: tato 'pyantaraṅgasyāntaḥkaraṇasya adhyastātmabhāvasya dharmān kāmasaṃkalpādīn ātmanyadhyasyatīti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1154: tadanena prapañcena dharmādhyāsamuktvā tasya mūlaṃ dharmyadhyāsamāha-evamahaṃpratyayinam-ahaṃpratyayo vṛttiryasmin antaḥkaraṇādau,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1174: virodhipratyayaṃ vinā kuto 'sya prahāṇamityaya uktam-ātmaikatvavidyāpratipattaye iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1180: etaduktaṃ bhavati-asmatpratyayasyātmaviṣayasya samīcīnatve sati brahmaṇo jñātvānniṣprayojanatvācca na jijñāsā syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1181: tadabhāve ca na brahmajñānāya vedāntāḥ paṭhyeran /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1187: na hi rajjvā rajjutvaṃ sahasramapi sarpadhārāpratyayā apavadituṃ samutsahante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1192: tatkathaṃ sarveṣāṃ vedāntānāmātmaikatvapratipādanamartha ityata āha-yathā cāyamarthaḥ sarveṣāṃ vedāntānāṃ tathā vayamasyāṃ śārīrakamīmāṃsāyāṃ pradarśayiṣyāmaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1194: tasya tvaṃpadābhidheyasya tatpadābhidheyaparamātmarūpatāmīmāṃsā yā sā tathoktā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1198: FN: 1-nanu sarvasya vedasya kāryāvabodhaparatvāt siddhe brahmaṇi vedāntānāmaprāmāṇyaṃ syāditicettatrāha---aviśiṣṭastviti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1200: mantrāṇāmiva devatādau vedāntānāṃ brahmaṇi prāmāṇyaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1204: yadyapi ca vedāntebhyaścaitanyānandaghanaḥ kartṛtvabhoktṛtvarahito niṣprapañca ekaḥ pratyagātmā avagamyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1205_1: virudhyamānā vedāntāḥ svārthātpracyutā upacaritārthā vā japamātropayogino vetyavivakṣitasvārthāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1206: tathā ca tadarthavicārātmikā caturlakṣaṇī śārīrakamīmāṃsā nārabdhavyā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1207: na ca sarvajanīnāhamanubhavasiddha ātmā saṃdigdho vā saprayojano vā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1208: yena jijñāsyaḥ san vicāraṃ prayuñjīteḥiti pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1216: tasya ca vakṣyamāṇena krameṇa saṃdigdhatvāt prayojanavatvācca yuktā jijñāsā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1224: kintu brahmamīmāṃsākhyatarketikartavyatānujñātaviṣayairvedāntairāhitaṃ nirvicikitsaṃ brahmajñānameva samastaduḥkhopaśamarūpamānandaikarasaṃ paramaṃ naḥ prayojanam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1227: yathā svagrīvāgatamapi graiveyakaṃ kutaścidbhramānnāstīti manyamānaḥ pareṇa pratipāditamaprāptamiva prāpnoti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1228: jijñāsā tu saṃśayasya kāryamiti svakāraṇaṃ saṃśayaṃ sūcayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1230: tathā ca śāstre prekṣāvatpravṛttihetusaṃśayaprayojanasūcanāt yuktamasya sūtrasya śāstrāditvamityāha bhagavānbhāṣyakāraḥvedāntamīmāṃsāśāstrasya vyācikhyāsitasyaasmābhiḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1235: sā hyanena śiṣyate śiṣyebhyo yathāvatpratipādyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1245: tadevaṃ sūtratātparyaṃ vyākhyāya tasya prathamapadaṃ atheti vyācaṣṭe-tatrāthaśabda ānantaryārthaḥ parigṛhyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1246: teṣu sūtrapadeṣu madhye yo 'yaṃ athaśabdaḥ sa ānantaryārtha iti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1252: jijñāsā tāvadiha sūtre brahmaṇaśca tatprajjñānācca śabdataḥ @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:1254: FN: 1-nanu jijñāsāyāḥ śāstreṇāpratipādyamānatvāt tatpratipādanārtho mā bhūdathaśabdaḥ brahmatajjñānaprārambhārthastu syāditi cenna /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1256: atra hi pratyayānāṃ prakṛtyarthānvitasvārtabodhajanakatvāt brahmajñānaviṣayiṇī icchaiva pradhānaṃ tatra ca nānvayaḥ saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:1261: FN: 2-apradhānabrahmatajjñānaprārambhārtho bhavatu yathā 'daṇḍau praiṣānanvāha'ityatra apradhānadaṇḍaḥ vivakṣyata iticenna /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1262: tatrahi 'maitrāvaruṇaḥ praiṣyeti cānvāha'iti mantreṇa prāpte praiṣānuvacane na vidhyanvayitvena vivakṣā kintu aprāpte 'pradhāne 'pi daṇḍagrahaṇe /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1268: tadavivakṣāyāṃ tadasūcanena kākadantaparīkṣāyāmiva brahmamīmāṃsāyāṃ na prekṣāvantaḥ pravarteran /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1269: na hi tadānīṃ brahma vā tajjñānaṃ vābhidheyaprayojane bhavitumarhataḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1271: karmapravṛttyupayogitayā upacaritārthānāṃ vā japopayogināṃ vā 'hum phaḍ'ityevamādīnāmivāvivakṣitārthānāmapi svādhyāyādhyayanavidhyadhīnagrahaṇatvasya saṃbhavāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1272: tasmātsaṃdehaprayojanasūcanī jijñāsā iha padato vākyataśca pradhānaṃ vivakṣitavyā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1283: nāntatvaṃ nipātya 'māṅ māne'ityasmādvā 'mānapūjāyām'ityasmādvā dhātoḥ 'mānbadha-'ityādinānicchārthe sani vyutpāditasya mīmāṃsāśabdasya pūjitavicāra @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:1296: na ca svārthaparatvasyopapattau satyāṃ anyārthaparatvakalpanā yuktā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1300: tathā ca maṅgalahetutvāt pratyahaṃ brahmajijñāsā kartavyeti sūtrārthaḥ saṃpadyata ityata āha-maṅgalasya ca vākyārthe samanvayābhāvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1302: sa ca vācyo vā lakṣyo vā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1303: na ceha maṅgalamathaśabdasya vācyaṃ vā lakṣyaṃ vā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1305: na ca kāryajñāpyayorvākyārthe samanvayaḥ śabdavyavahāre dṛṣṭa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1306: tatkimidānīṃ maṅgalārtho 'thaśabdaḥ teṣu teṣu na prayoktavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1309: 'iti smṛtivyākopa ityata āha-arthāntaraprayukta eva hyathaśabdaḥ śrutyā maṅgalaprayojano bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1310: arthāntareṣvānantaryādiṣu prayukto 'thaśabdaḥ śrutyā śravaṇamātreṇa veṇuvīṇādhvanivanmaṅgalaṃ kurvan,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1314: na cehānantaryārthasya sato na śravaṇamātreṇa maṅgalārthatetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1317: tadyathemamevāthaśabdaṃ prakṛtya vimṛśyate kimayamathaśabda ānantarye athādhikāreḥiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1323: na hi jātu bhavati kiṃ nitya ātmā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1325: tasmādānantaryaṃ vinā pūrvaprakṛtāpekṣa ihāthaśabdaḥ kasmānna bhavatītyata āhapūrvaprakṛtāpekṣāyāśca phalata ānantaryāvyatirekāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1328: sā ca pūrvaprakṛtārthāpekṣatve 'pyathaśabdasya sidhyatīti vyarthaṃ ānantaryārthatvāvadhāraṇāgraho 'smākamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1331: na ceha kalpāntaropanyāsa iti pāriśeṣyādānantaryārthaṃ eveti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1337: na cānantaryamātrasya dṛṣṭamadṛṣṭaṃ vā prayojanaṃ paśyāmaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1338: tasmāttasyātrānantaryaṃ vaktavyaṃ yadvinā brahmajijñāsā na bhavati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1342: dharmajijñāsāyā iva brahmajijñāsāyā api yogyatvāt svādhyāyā @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:1351: tasmādvedādhyayanānantaryameva brahmajijñāsāyā apyathaśabdārtha ityata āha-svādhyāyānantaryaṃ tu samānaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1353: atra ca svādhyāyena viṣayeṇa tadviṣayamadhyayanaṃ lakṣayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1354: tathā ca 'athāto dharmajijñāsā'ityanenaiva gatamiti nedaṃ sūtramārabdhavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1362: asyārthaḥ-'vividiṣanti yajñena'iti tṛtīyāśrutyā yajñādīnāmaṅgatvena brahmajñāne viniyogāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1367: na ca vākyaṃ sahakāritayā karmāṇyapekṣata iti yuktam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1371: tasmin sati tadarthānuṣṭhānaparivarjanaṃ tataśca tadbodha iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1372: na ca vedāntavākyānāmeva svārthapratyāyane karmāpekṣā na vākyāntarāṇāmiti sāṃpratam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1375: kartṛbhoktṛrūpasya jīvātmano nityaśuddhabuddhodāsīnasvabhāvena tatpadārthena paramātmanaikyamaśakyaṃ drāgityeva pratipattuṃ āpātato 'śuddhasattvairyogyatāvirahaviniścayāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1380: tasmāt 'tattvamasi'ityādeḥ śrutamayena jñānena jīvātmanaḥ paramātmabhāvaṃ gṛhītvā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1389: ata eva śrutiḥ-'tameva dhīro vijñāya prajñāṃ kurvīta brāhmaṇaḥ' /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1391: vijñāya tarkopakaraṇena śabdena prajñāṃ bhāvanāṃ kurvītetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1394: yajñādisaṃskṛto hi puruṣaḥ ādaranairantaryadīrghakālairāsevamāno brahmabhāvanāmanādyavidyāvāsanāṃ samūlakāṣaṃ kaṣati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1396: ata eva smṛtiḥ-'mahāyajñaiśca yajñaiśca brāhmīyaṃ kriyate tanuḥ' /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1399: asti hi smṛtiḥ-'ṛṇāni trīṇyapākṛtya mano mokṣe niveśayet' /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1401: anye tu 'tametaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti yajñena'ityādiśrutibhyastattatphalāya coditānāmapi karmaṇāṃ saṃyogapṛthaktvena brahmabhāvanāṃ pratyaṅgabhāvamācakṣate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1404_0: FN: 2-'khādire paśuṃ badhnāti' 'khādiraṃ vīryakāmasya yūpaṃ kurvīta'iti ekasyaiva
GSP33brsvbh1u:1404_1: khādiratvasya kratvarthatvaṃ puruṣārthatvaṃ ca yathā tathā karmaṇāmapi ubhayārthatvaṃ syādityarthaḥ / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:1408: atra ca pāramarṣaṃ sūtram-'sarvāpekṣā ca yajñādiśruteraśvavat' (bra. a. 3. pā. 4 sū. 26) iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1411: tasmādyadi śrutyādayaḥ pramāṇaṃ yadi vā pāramarṣaṃ sūtraṃ sarvathā yajñādikarmasamuccitā brahmopāsanā viśeṣaṇa @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:1415: trayavatī anādyavidyātadvāsanāsamucchedakrameṇa brahmasākṣātkārāya mokṣāparanāmne kalpata iti tadarthaṃ karmāṇyanuṣṭheyāni /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1421_1: teṣāṃ grāmaḥ samūhastatsahitaṃ parasparavibhinnaṃ karmasvarūpaṃ tadapekṣitādhikārīviśeṣaśca
GSP33brsvbh1u:1429: tasmātsādhūktam 'karmāvabodhānantaryaṃ viśeṣaḥ'iti karmāvabodhena hi karmānuṣṭhānasāhityaṃ bhavati brahmopāsanāyā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1434: kiṃ kārye yathāgneyādīnāṃ paramāpūrve cirabhāviphalānukūle janayitavye samidādyapekṣā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1440: FN: 1-bhāvanāsādhye sākṣātkāre yadi karmāpekṣā tarhi sa brahmasvarūpo na syāt tasyotpatsyamānatvāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1447: FN: 2-'piṣṭaṃ saṃyauti'iti vihitasya saṃyavanasya piṇḍa utpādyaḥ / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:1454: na khalu ghaṭādisākṣātkāra iva jaḍasvabhāvebhyo ghaṭādibhyo bhinna indriyādyādheyo brahmasākṣātkāro bhāvanādheyaḥ saṃbhavati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1458: FN: 3-sākṣātkārasya brahmaṇo bhinnatve brahma jaḍaṃ syāt śabdaśca parokṣapramāheturiti kevalabhāvanādheyaḥ sākṣātkāro 'pramā syāditi bhāvaḥ / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:1462: na khalvanumānāvibuddhaṃ vahniṃ bhāvayataḥ śītāturasya śiśirabharamantharatarakāyakāṇḍasya sphurajjvālājaṭilānalasākṣātkāraḥ pramāṇāntareṇa saṃvādyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1489: etāvāṃstu viśeṣaḥ-pratisīrāpanaye pāriṣadānāṃ nartakīviṣayaḥ sākṣātkāro bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1500: na hi sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti vā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1501: ārohapariṇāhavat dravyamiti vā śataśo 'pi jñānamabhyasyamānaṃ puruṣa eveti niścayāya paryāptam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1503: nanūktaṃ śrutamayena jñānena jīvātmanaḥ paramātmabhāvaṃ gṛhītvā yuktimayena ca vyavasthāpyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1517: antaḥkaraṇaṃ ca sopādhike ātmani janayatyahaṃvṛttimiti tasya siddhamaparokṣadhīhetutvam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1518: tacca śābdabrahmaikyadhīsaṃtativāsitaṃ jīvasya tatpadalakṣaṇabrahmātmatāṃ sākṣātkārayatītyāśayavānāha-na caiṣa iti / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:1520: na caiṣa sākṣātkāro mīmāṃsāsahitasyāpi śabdapramāṇasya phalam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1525: na cāyamanubhavo brahmasvabhāvo yena na janyeta,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1528: na hi śābdajñānaprakāśyaṃ brahma svayaṃ prakāśaṃ na bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1542: anyathā caitanyacchāyāpattiṃ vināntaḥkaraṇavṛtteḥ svayamacetanāyāḥ svaprakāśatvānupapattau sākṣātkāratvāyogāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1548: FN: 10-jīvasya prāgaparokṣatve 'pi śuddhabuddhatvādeḥ pārokṣyānna tatsākṣātkāro yathārthaṃ ityāśaṅkyāha-nahīti / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:1551: jīva eva tu tattadupādhirahitaḥ śuddhabuddhatvādisvabhāvo brahmeti gīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1558: antaḥkaraṇavṛttau brahmasākṣātkāre janayitavye asti tadupāsanāyāḥ karmāpekṣeti cet @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:1571: yadyucyeta niścite 'pi tattve viparyāsanibandhano vyavahāro 'nuvartamāno dṛśyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1572: yathā guḍasya mādhuryaviniścaye api pittopahatendriyāṇāṃ tiktatāvabhāsānuvṛttiḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1577: karmaṇo vā taducchedakasya kuta ucchedaḥ iti vācyam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1583: yathā vā katakarajo rajo 'ntarāvile pāthasi prakṣiptaṃ rajo 'ntarāṇi bhindat svayamapi bhidyamānamanāvilaṃ pāthaḥ karoti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1589: pittopahatendriya iva guḍaṃ thūtkṛtya tyajannapi tasya tiktatām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1593: kriyākartrādisvarūpavibhāgaṃ ca vidvasyamāna iha vidvānabhimataḥ karmakāṇḍe /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1594: ata eva bhagavān vidvadviṣayatvaṃ śāstrasya varṇayāṃbabhūva bhāṣyakāraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1597: na cānadhikṛtena samarthenāpi kṛtaṃ vaidika karma phalāya kalpate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1599: tena dṛṣṭārtheṣu karmasu śaktaḥ pravartamānaḥ prāpnotu phalam, dṛṣṭatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1600: adṛṣṭārtheṣu tu śāstraikasamadhigamyaṃ phalamanadhikāriṇi na yujyata iti nopāsanākārye karmāpekṣā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1603: evaṃ niṣedhavidhayo 'pi manuṣyādhikārā iti tadabhimānarahitasteṣvapi nādhikriyeta paśvādivat /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1607: na khalvayaṃ sarvathā manuṣyābhimānarahitaḥ kiṃ tvavidyāsaṃskārānuvṛttyāsya mātrayā tadabhimāno 'nuvartate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1608: anuvartamānaṃ ca mithyeti manyamāno na śraddhatta ityuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1614: api tu niṣidhyamānakriyonmukho nara ityeva pravartate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1615: tathā ca sāṃsārika iva śabdāvagatabrahmatattvo 'pi niṣedhamatikramya pravartamānaḥ pratyavaitīti na bhinnakarmadarśanābhyupagamaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1622: tathā ca śrutiḥ-'nakarmaṇā na prajayā dhanena tyāgenaike amṛtatvamānaśuḥ' /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1627: FN: 5-iha janmāntare karma sattvaśuddhidvāreṇa jñānotpattiheturiti siddhāntamāha ārāditi / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:1633: vastutaḥ pradhānasyāpi vedanasya prakṛtyarthatayā śabdato guṇatvāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1636: nahi rājapuruṣamānayetyukte vastutaḥ pradhānamapi rājā puruṣaviśeṣaṇatayā śabdata upasarjana ānīyate 'pi tu puruṣa eva,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1649: upadhīyate-puṇyenopacīyate iti viditvā yaḥ karma carati sa ātmaśuddhyarthaṃ yajannātmayājī sa ca devayājitaḥ kāmyakartuḥ śreyāniti śrutyarthaḥ / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:1651: vā ātmāyājī yo veda idaṃ me 'nenāṅgaṃ saṃskriyata idaṃ me 'nenāṅgamupadhīyate'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1654_1: jñānottapattiṃ darśayatyātharvaṇī śrutiḥ-'viśuddhasattvastatastu taṃ paśyati niṣkalaṃ dhyāyamānaḥ'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1656: kḷptenaiva ca nityānāṃ karmaṇāṃ nityehitenopāttaduritanibarhaṇadvāreṇa puruṣasaṃskāreṇa jñānotpattāvaṅgabhāvopapattau na saṃyoga @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:1658: FN: 2-idamatra bodhyam-saṃyogapṛthaktvenāṅgabhāve siddhe 'pi na samuccayavādyabhimataḥ sākṣādaṅgabhāvo yuktaḥ api tu paraṃparayā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1660_0: yathā prakṛtau kḷptopakārāṇāṃ vikṛtau tadatiriktopakārakalpane gauravaṃ tathā jñāne
GSP33brsvbh1u:1660_1: viniyuktayajñādīnāṃ kḷptapāpakṣayātiriktakalpane gauravāpatterna samuccayaḥ kalpanīya ityāśayaḥ / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:1666: sa hi anityāśuciduḥkharūpe saṃsāre nityaśucisukhakhyātilakṣaṇena viparyāsena cittasattvaṃ malinayati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1667: tataḥ pāpanivṛttau pratyakṣopapattipravṛttidvārāpāvaraṇe sati pratyakṣopapattibhyāṃ saṃsārasya anityāśuciduḥkharūpatāmapratyūhamavabudhyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1672: tataḥ śravaṇādikrameṇa tajjñānātītyārādupakārakatvaṃ tattvajñānotpādaṃ prati cittasattvaśuddhyā karmaṇāṃ yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1675: evaṃ cānanuṣṭhitakarmāpi prāgbhavīyakarmavaśāt yo viśuddhasattvaḥ saṃsārāsāratādarśanena niṣpannavairāgyaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1678: imameva ca puruṣadhaureyabhedamadhikṛtya pravavṛte śrutiḥ-'yadi vetarathā brahmacaryādeva pravrajet'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1680: ata eva na brahmacāriṇa ṛṇāni santi,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1682: etadanurodhācca 'jāyamāno vai brāhmaṇastribhirṛṇavā jāyate'iti gṛhasthaḥ saṃpadyamāna iti vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1688: yadvinā brahmajijñāsā na bhavati yasmiṃstu sati bhavantī bhavatyeva /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1689: na cetthaṃ karmāvabodhaḥ tasmānna karmāvabodhānantaryamātrāthaśabdārtha iti sarvamavadātam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1695: anyadravyānayane śrutavaiyarthyāt dṛṣṭaprayojane ārādupakārakatvasyānyāyyatvāt 'arthācca'yavāgūṃ paktvā juhotīti kramaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1700: 'gṛhī bhūtvā vanī bhavet vanī bhūtvā pravrajet'iti jābālaśrutirgārhasthyena hi yajñādyanuṣṭhānaṃ sūcayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1702: iṣṭā ca śaktito yajñairmano mokṣe niveśayet //
GSP33brsvbh1u:1706: kutaḥ, 'hṛdayasyāgre 'vadyati atha jihvāyā atha vakṣasaḥ'ityathāgraśabdābhyāṃ kramasya vivakṣitatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1724: tatra ekakālatvalakṣaṇasahatvasyāsaṃbhavāt sthānātsavanīyaprāthamyaṃ niyamyata ityayaṃ sthānakramaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1725: 'sārasvatau bhavata etadvai daivyaṃ mithunaṃ yatsarasvatī sarasvāṃśca'iti yugapatkarmadvayaṃ śrūyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1726: atra prathamaṃ sarasvatīdaivatasya yājyānuvākyāyugalaṃ paṭhyato tato sarasvaddaivatasya /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1727: tasmādetatkrameṇa karmadvayakrama iti jñāyate mantrāṇāṃ prayogaśeṣatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1728: aṅgaviśeṣanirvāpādīnāṃ kramākāṅkṣāyāṃ mukhyakrameṇaiva krama iti niyamyate soyaṃ mukhyakramaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1730: yājyānuvākyāpravṛttikrameṇa nirvāpādīnāṃ kramasya siddhatvāditi vistarabhayāddiṅmātraṃ darśitam / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:1744: FN: 4-anena yugapadanuṣṭhānamityuktaṃ tacca na kramamantarā siddhyediti sarvatra kramāpekṣā prakṛte tu pṛthaktvānna kramāpekṣeti bhāvaḥ / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:1749: yatra tu na śeṣaśeṣibhāvaḥ nāpyekādhikārāvacchedaḥ yathā sauryāryamṇa @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:1751: FN: 5-'sauryaṃ caruṃ nirvapedbrahmavarcasakāmaḥ' 'āryamaṇaṃ caruṃ nirvapet svargakāmaḥ' 'prājāpatyaṃ caruṃ nirvapecchatakṛṣṇalakāmaḥ'ityādi bhinnaphalakayagānāṃ na kramaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1758: na ceha dharmabrahmajijñāsayoḥ śeṣaśeṣibhāve śrutyādīnāmanyatamaṃ pramāṇamastīti / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:1765: yathā vā 'darśapūrṇamāsābhyāmiṣṭvā somena yajeta'iti darśapūrṇamāsasomayoraśeṣaśeṣiṇorityata āha-adhikṛtādhikāre vā pramāṇābhāvāt-iti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1766: svargakāmasya hi darśapūrṇamāsādhikṛtasya paśukāmasya sato darśapūrṇamāsakratvarthāppraṇayanāśrite godohane adhikāraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1775: yathāgneyādīnāṃ ṣaṇṇāmekasvargaphalāvacchinnānāmyadi vā jijñāsyabrahmaṇo 'śo dharmaḥ syāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1776: yathā caturlakṣaṇīvyutpādyaṃ brahma kenacitkenacidaṃśenaikaikena lakṣaṇena vyutpādyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1777: tatra caturṇāṃ lakṣaṇānāṃ jijñāsyābhedena parasparasaṃbandhe sati kramo vivakṣitaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1780: jijñāsāyā vastuto jñānatantratvāt jñānaphalaṃ jijñāsāphalamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1789: bhavitā ca bhāvakavyāpāranirvartyatayā tattantra iti tataḥ prāgjñānakāle nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1813: bhāvanāyāstaddvāreṇa ca yāgāderapekṣitopāyatāmavagamayantī tatrecchopahāramukhena puruṣaṃ niyuñjānaiva yāgādidharmamavabodhayati nānyathā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1814: brahmacodanā tu puruṣamavabodhayatyeva kevalaṃ na tu pravartayantyavabodhayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1816_1: puruṣo brahmāvabodhyata iti samānatvaṃ dharmacodanābhirbrahmacodanānāmityata āha-na
GSP33brsvbh1u:1826: api cātmajñānavidhipareṣu vedānteṣu nātmatattvaviniścayaḥ śābdaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1839: yasminnasati brahmajijñāsā na bhavati sati tu bhavantī bhavatyevetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1848: tathā sati eṣa viparyāsādanyaḥ saṃśayaḥ syāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1861: tadeteṣvanubhūyamāneṣu yuṣmadasmatpratyayagocareṣu viṣayaviṣayiṣu yadṛtaṃ nityaṃ sukhaṃ vyavasthāsyate tadāsthāgocaro bhaviṣyati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1863: so 'yaṃ nityānityavastuvivekaḥ prāgbhavīyādaihikādvā vaidikātkarmaṇo viśuddhasattvasya bhavatyanubhavopapattibhyām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1864: na khalu satyaṃ nāma na kiñcidastīti vācyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1867_0: athāsya puruṣadhaureyasyānubhavopapattibhyāmevaṃ sunipuṇaṃ nirūpayataḥ ā ca satyalokāt
GSP33brsvbh1u:1867_1: ā cāvīceḥ jāyasva mriyasva iti viparivartamānaṃ kṣaṇamuhūrtayāmāhorātrārdhamāsamāsartvayanavatsarayugacaturyugamanvantarapralayamahāpralayamahāsargāvāntarasargasaṃsārasāgarormibh iraniśamuhyamānaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1868: tāpatrayaparītamātmānaṃ ca jīvalokaṃ cāvalokya asminsaṃsāramaṇḍale anityāśuciduḥkhātmakaṃ prasaṃkhyānamu
GSP33brsvbh1u:1880: rāgādikaṣāyamadirāmattaṃ hi manasteṣu teṣu viṣayeṣūccāvacamindriyāṇi pravartayat,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1884: so 'yamasya vairāgyahetuko manovijayaḥ śama iti vaśīkārasaṃjña iti cākhyāyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1887: yathā dānto 'yaṃ vṛṣabhayuvā halaśakaṭādivahanayogyaḥ kṛta iti gamyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1889: ata eva śrutiḥ-'tasmācchānto dānta uparatastitikṣuḥ śraddhāvitto bhūtvātmanyevātmānaṃ paśyet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1895: tasya ca nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvabrahmajñānaṃ mokṣasya kāraṇamityupaśrutya tajjijñāsā bhavati dharmajijñāsāyāḥ prāgūrdhvaṃ ca,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1904: FN: 2-athaśabdena jijñāsāhetupratipādanātkimataḥśabdenetyāśaṅkya nānena hetorabhidhānaṃ kiṃ tu pūrvoktahetutvarūpāsiddhiparihāra ityāha-atraivamiti / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:1921: na hi mṛgāḥ santīti śālayo nopyante,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1923: api ca dṛṣṭaṃ sukhaṃ candanavanitādisaṅgajanma kṣayitālakṣaṇena duḥkhenāghrātatvādatibhīruṇā tyajyetāpi,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1927: tathā ca 'akṣayyaṃ ha vai cāturmāsyayājinaḥ sukṛtaṃ bhavati' /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1933: śaṅkhavadityanumānaṃ 'nāraṃ spṛṣṭvāsthi sasnehaṃ savāsā jalamāviśet'ityāgamādbādhitaviṣayaṃ tathā sukṛtamanityaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1943: na hi madhuviṣasaṃpṛktamannaṃ viṣaṃ parityajya samadhu śakyaṃ śilpivareṇāpi bhoktum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1944: kṣayitānumānopodbalitaṃ ca 'tadyatheha karmajitaḥ'ityādi vacanaṃ kṣayitāpratipādakam 'apāma somam'ityādikaṃ vacanaṃ mukhyāsaṃbhave jaghanyavṛttitāmāpādayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1946: atra ca brahmapadena tatpramāṇaṃ veda upasthāpitaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1947: sa ca yogyatvāt 'tadyatheha karmacitaḥ'ityādirataḥ iti sarvanāmnā parāmṛśya,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1950: yathā svargādeḥ kṛtakasya sukhasya duḥkhānuṣaṅgastathā brahmaṇo 'pītyata āha-tathā brahmavijñānādapīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1955: ṣaṣṭhīsamāsapradarśanena prācāṃ vṛttikṛtāṃ brahmaṇe jijñāsā brahmajijñāseti caturthīsamāsaḥ parāsto veditavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1956: 'tādarthyasamāse prakṛtivikṛtigrahaṇaṃ kartavyam'iti kātyāyanīyavacanena yūpadārvādiṣveva prakṛtivikārabhāve caturthīsamāsaniyamāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1969: yato brahmajijñāsāṃ pratijñāya tajjñāpanāya paramātmalakṣaṇaṃ praṇayati tato 'vagacchāmaḥ paramātmajijñāsaiveyaṃ na vipratvajātyādijijñāsetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1972: saṃbandhamātraṃ ca śeṣa iti brahmaṇo jijñāsetyukte brahmasaṃbandhinī jijñāsetyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1973: tathā ca brahmasvarūpapramāṇayuktisādhanaprayojanajijñāsāḥ sarvā brahmajijñāsārthā brahmajijñāsayāvaruddhā bhavanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1977: tathā cāpratijñātārthacintā pramāṇādiṣu bhavediti ye manyante tānpratyāha-brahmaṇa iti karmaṇi iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1981: na khalu jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ vinā nirūpyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1982: na ca jijñāsā jñānaṃ vineti pratipattyanubandhatvāt prathamaṃ jijñāsā karmaivāpekṣate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1985: na hi candramasamādityaṃ vopalabhya kasyāyamiti saṃbandhyanveṣaṇā bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1991: nanu satyaṃ na jijñāsyamantareṇa jijñāsā nirūpyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1993: brahma tu śeṣatayā saṃbhantsyata ityata āha-jijñāsyāntareti / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:1999: nigūḍhābhiprāya eva dūṣayati-evamapi pratyakṣaṃ brahmaṇa iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2000: vācyasya karmatvasya jijñāsayā prathamamapekṣitasya prathamasaṃbandhārhasya cānvayaparityāgena paścātkathañcidapekṣitasya saṃbandhimātrasya saṃbandho,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2021: na kevalaṃ jñānamiṣyate kintvavagatiṃ sākṣātkāraṃ kurvadavagatiparyantaṃ sanvācyāyā icchāyāḥ karma /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2027: nahyanapekṣaṇīyaviṣayamavagatiparyantamapi jñānamiṣyata ityata āha-jñānena hi pramāṇenāvagantumiṣṭaṃ brahma /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2032: kiṃ tu niḥśreyasaṃ vigalitanikhiladuḥkhānuṣaṅgaparamānandaghanabrahmāvagatirbrahmaṇaḥ svabhāva iti saiva niḥśreyasaṃ puruṣārtha iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2041_1: na pratibhātīva parādhīnaprakāśa iva dehendriyādibhyo bhinno 'pyabhinna iva bhāsata
GSP33brsvbh1u:2041_2: iti saṃsārabījāvidyādyanarthanibarhaṇātprāgaprāpta iva tasminsati prāpta iva bhavatīti
GSP33brsvbh1u:2049: tacca na kevalebhyo vedāntebhyo 'pi tu brahmamīmāṃso @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2051: FN: 1-atredaṃ bodhyam-brahmātmatāmicchatā jñānameṣitavyaṃ tacca vicāropakaraṇebhyo vedāntebhyaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2052: tathāca sati brahmavicāraḥ kartavya ityarthaḥ syāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2063: tatra phalavadarthāvabodhaparatāṃ svādhyāyādhyayanavidheḥ sūtrayatā 'athāto dharmajijñāsā'ityanenaiva pravartitatvāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2065: yadyapi ca dharmamīmāṃsāvat vedārthamīmāṃsayā brahmamīmāṃsāpyākṣeptuṃ śakya,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2067: nāpi brahmamīmāṃsāyā adhyayanamātrānantaryamiti brahmamīmāṃsārambhāya nityānityavivekādyānantaryapradarśanāya cedaṃ sūtramārambhaṇīyamityapaunaruktyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2069: etena sūtreṇa brahmajñānaṃ pratyupāyatā mīmāṃsāyāḥ pratipādyata ityuktam tadayuktam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2078: athāprasiddhaṃ vedāntebhyastarhi na tadvedāntāḥ pratipādayantīti sarvathāprasiddhaṃ naiva śakyaṃ jijñāsitum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2079: anubhūte hi priye bhavatīcchā na tu sarvathānanubhūtāpūrve /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2091: ayamarthaḥ-prāgapi brahmamīmāṃsāyā pūrvaṃ adhītavedasya nigamaniruktavyākaraṇādipariśīlanaviditapadatadarthasaṃbandhasya 'sadeva somyedamagra āsīt'ityupakramāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2100: FN: 2-nityatvaṃ ca dhvaṃsāpratiyogitve sati prāgabhāvāpratiyogitvarūpaṃ bodhyam / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2117: sadaiva muktaḥ sadaiva kevalo 'nādyavidyāvaśāt bhrāntyā tathāvabhāsata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2126: na kevalam 'sadeva somyedam'ityādīnāṃ vākyānāṃ paurvāparyālocanayā itthaṃbhūtabrahmāvagatiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2135: tadevaṃ tatpadārthasya śuddhatvādeḥ prasiddhimabhidhāya tvaṃpadārthasyāpyāha-sarvasyātmatvācca brahmāstitvaprasiddhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2155: nanvahamasmīti ca jñāsyati mā ca jñāsīdātmānamityata āha-yadīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2160: brahmaṇi tu kimāyātamityata āha-ātmā ca brahma /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2166: ākṣeptā prathamakalpāśrayaṃ doṣamāha-yadi tarhi loka iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2175: anyathā anāśrayā bhinnāśrayā vā vipratipattayo na syuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2183: tvaṃpadārthasya ca jīvātmano lokataḥ siddhiḥ sarvatantrasiddhāntaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2185: tasmātsāmānyataḥ prasiddhe dharmiṇi viśeṣato vipratipattau yuktastadviśeṣeṣu saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2199: tehi kriyārthatvamāmnāyasya bruvāṇā vedāntā aupacārikā vā avivakṣitasvārthā vā manyanta iti darśitaṃ prāk / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2202: tadevaṃ tvaṃpadārthavipratipattidvārā tatpadārthe vipratipattiṃ sūcayitvā sākṣāttatpadārthe vipratipattimāha-asti tadvyatirikta īśvaraḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvaśaktiriti kecit /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2209: na tvaṃpadārthena sāmānādhikaraṇyamiti svamatamāha-atmā sa bhokturityapare /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2216: tannimittaśca saṃśayaḥtathāpi kimarthaṃ brahmamīmāṃsārabhyata ityata āha-tatrāvicāryeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2221: tadavirodhinaśca ye 'nye 'pi tarkā adhvaramīmāṃsāyāṃ nyāye ca vedapratyakṣādiprāmāṇyapariśodhanādiṣūktāsta upakaraṇaṃ yasyāḥ sā tathoktā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2229: yatra yadyapi brahmasvarūpajñānasya pradhānasya pratijñayā tadaṅgānyapi pramāṇādīni pratijñātāni,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2232: na tenopalabdhena tadviruddhasya nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvasya brahmaṇaḥ svarūpaṃ śakyaṃ lakṣayitum,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2233: na hi jātu kaścitkṛtakatvena nityaṃ lakṣayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2240: FN: 1-itarapramāṇenāprasiddhamapi śabdataḥ prasiddhaṃ syāditi cettatrāha-evaṃ ceti / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2247: mā bhūdanubhūyamānaṃ jagattaddharmatayā tādātmyena vā brahmaṇo lakṣaṇam, @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2252: tadutpattyā tu bhaviṣyati deśāntaraprāptiriva saviturvrajyāyā iti tātparyārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2254: lāghavāya sūtrakṛtā janmādīti napuṃsakaprayogaḥ kṛtastadupapādanāya samāhāramāha-janmasthitibhaṅgamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2257: pradhānakālagrahalokapālakriyāyadṛcchāsvabhāvābhāveṣūpaplavamāneṣu satsu sarvajñaṃ sarvaśaktisvabhāvaṃ brahma jagajjanmādikāraṇamiti kutaḥ saṃbhāvanetyata āha-asya jagata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2258: atranāmarūpābhyāṃ vyākṛtasya iti cetanabhāvakartṛkatvasaṃbhāvanayā pradhānādyacetanakartṛkatvaṃ nirupākhyakartṛkatvaṃ ca vyāsedhati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2259: yatkhalu nāmnā rūpeṇa ca vyākriyate taccetanakartṛkaṃ dṛṣṭam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2261: vivādādhyāsitaṃ ca jagannāmarūpābhyāṃ vyākṛtam tasmāccetanakartṛkaṃ saṃbhāvyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2262: cetano hi buddhāvālikhya nāmarūpe ghaṭa iti nāmnā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2263: rūpeṇa ca kambugrīvādinā bāhyaṃ ghaṭaṃ niṣpādayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2264: ata eva ghaṭasya nirvartyasyāpyantaḥ saṃkalpātmanā siddhasya karmakārakabhāvo ghaṭaṃ karotīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2266: tathā cācetano buddhāvanālikhitaṃ karotīti na śakyaṃ saṃbhāvayitumiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2268: cetanā grahā lokapālā vā nāmarūpe buddhāvālikhya jagajjanayiṣyanti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2278: deśādīni ca tāni pratiniyatāni ceti vigrahaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2291: evaṃ ya eva sukhinasta eva kadācidduḥkhinaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2292: sarvametadākasmikāparanāmni yādṛcchikatve vā svābhāvikatve vā sarvajñāsarvaśaktikartṛkatve ca na ghaṭate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2295: ekasyā api hi śarīraracanāyā rūpaṃ manasā na śakyaṃ cintayituṃ kadācit,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2301: na tu vṛddhipariṇāmāpakṣayā apītyata āha-anyeṣāmapi bhāvavikārāṇāṃ--vṛddhyādīnāntriṣvevāntarbhāva iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2303: tenālpāvayavādavayavino dvitantukāderanya eva mahānpaṭo jāyata iti janmaiva vṛddhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2312: tathā sati hi tatpratipādake 'yato vā imāni bhūtāni'iti vedavākye buddhisthīkṛte jaganmūlakāraṇaṃ brahma lakṣitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2313: anyathā tu jāyate 'sti vardhate ityādīnāṃ grahaṇe tatpratipādakaṃ nairuktavākyaṃ buddhau bhavet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2318: tannāntarīyakatayā tu sthitibhaṅgaṃ gamyata ityata āha-yotpattirbrahmaṇaḥ kāraṇā @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2326: FN: 2-atredaṃ bodhyam-utpattimātrasya nimittakāraṇasādhāraṇatve 'pi layādhāratvoktyā upādānatvaṃ sidhyet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2329: nahyatropādānatvasūcanāyaiva taduktamapitu prakṛtivikārābhedanyāyenādvaitasiddhaye 'pi tena brahma upādānaṃ bhavatu,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2339: lakṣaṇaṃhi siddhasya vastuno bhedamavagamayati īdṛśaṃ taditi / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2346: tasya yadaikatvaṃ sidhyati tadā tatsarvajñaṃ sarvaśakti ca bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2347_0: ayaṃ ca saṃdehaḥ kalpanālāghavākhyatarkeṇa utkaṭaikatarakoṭikatāṃ nītaḥ saṃbhavānetyucyate
GSP33brsvbh1u:2347_1: prāsādādīnāmanekakartṛkatvasya dṛṣṭatvānna tatra nirṇayo bhavati ato nirṇayārthamāvaśyakamagnimādhikaraṇamiti bhāvaḥ / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2354: yadanye vaiśeṣikakādaya ita evānumānādīśvaraviniścayamicchantīti saṃbhāvanāhetutāṃ draḍhayitumāha-etadeveti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2362: kutaśca tadanubhavaḥ sākṣātkāraḥityata āha-satsu tu vedāntavākyeṣviti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2364: śabdāvirodhinyā tadupajīvinyā ca yuktyā vivecanaṃ mananam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2368: evaṃ brahmaṇyapi kasmānna bhavatītyata āha-na dharmajijñāsāyāmiveti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2373: yadyapi dharmajijñāsāyāmapi sāmagryāṃ pratyakṣādīnāṃ vyāpārastathāpi sākṣānnāsti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2374: brahmajijñāsāyāṃ tu sākṣādanubhavādīnāṃ saṃbhavo 'nubhavārthā ca brahmajijñāsetyāha-anubhavāvasānatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2390: anuṣṭhānasya ca vināpyanubhavaṃ śābdajñānamātrādeva siddherityāha-kartavye hītyādinā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2404: evaṃ nārāsthitasparśananiṣedho brahmaghnaśca tadvāraṇavidhirityevañjātīyakā vidhipratiṣedhā arthavantaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2407: yasmādgrahaṇāgrahaṇayoruditānuditahomayośca virodhātsamuccayāsaṃbhave tulyabalatayā ca bādhyabādhakabhāvābhāve satyagatyā vikalpaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2409: kintu sāmānyaśāstrasya sparśananiṣedhasya dhāraṇavidhiviṣayeṇa viśeṣaśāstreṇa bādhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2410: etaduktaṃ bhavati-vidhipratiṣedhaireva sa tādṛśo viṣayo 'nāgatotpādyarūpa upanītaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2412: bhūte vastuni tu neyamasti vidhetyāha-na tu vastvevaṃ naivamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2428: na tu puruṣatattvaṃ vā sthāṇutattvaṃ vāpekṣante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2430: tasmādayathāvastavo vikalpanā na vastu vikalpayanti vā anyathayanti vetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2435: evamuktena prakāreṇa bhūtavastuviṣayāṇāṃ jñānānāṃ prāmāṇyasya vastutantratāṃ prasādhya brahmajñānasya vastutantratāmāha-tatraivaṃ satīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2437: yat kila bhūtārthaṃ vākyaṃ tatpramāṇāntaragocarārthatayānuvādakaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2443: na tu vedāntavākyāni tadadhīnasatyatvānīti kathaṃ vedāntavākyagrathanārthatā sūtrāṇāmityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2446: kasmāt punarnendriyaviṣayatvaṃ pratīca ityata āha-svabhāvata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2475: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yathā rajjvajñānasahitarajjūpādānā hi dhārā rajjvāṃ satyāmasti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2488_1: nityanaimittikakāmyakarmapaddhatiṣu ca brahmatattve ca śiṣyāṇāṃ śāsanāt śāstramṛgvedādiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2494: purāṇādipraṇetāro hi maharṣayaḥ śiṣṭāstaistayā tayā dvārā vedānvyācakṣāṇaistadarthacādareṇānutiṣṭhadbhiḥ parigṛhīto veda iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2506: yo yadvākyapramāṇakartā sa tadviṣayādadhikaviṣayajñaḥ yathā pāṇiniriti / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2508: yadyadvistarārthaṃ śāstraṃ yasmātpuruṣaviśeṣātsaṃbhavati sa-puruṣaviśeṣaḥtato 'pi-śāstrātadhikataravijñānaḥ iti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2509: adyatve 'pyasmadādibhiryatsamīcīnārthaviṣayaṃ śāstraṃ viracyate tatrāsmākaṃ vaktṛṇāṃ vākyājjñānamadhikaviṣayam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2510: nahi te te 'sādhāraṇadharmā anubhūyamānā api śakyā vaktum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2512: vistarārthamapi vākyaṃ na vaktṛjñānena tulyaviṣayamiti kathayituṃ vistaragrahaṇam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2514: vedasya yasmāt mahato bhūtāt yoneḥ saṃbhavaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2515: tasya mahato bhūtasya brahmaṇo niratiśayaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ ca sarvaśaktitvaṃ ca kimu vaktavyamiti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2522: devarṣayo hi mahāpariśrameṇāpi yatrāśaktastadayamīṣatprayatnena līlayaiva karotīti niratiśayamasya sarvajñatvaṃ sarvaśaktitvaṃ coktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2524: ye 'pi tāvat varṇānāṃ nityatvamāsthiṣata tairapi padavākyādīnāmanityatvamabhyupeyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2528: varṇānāṃ nityānāṃ vibhūnāṃ ca kālato deśato vā paurvāparyāyogāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2529: vyaktiścānityeti kathaṃ tadupagṛhītānāṃ varṇānāṃ nityānāmapi padatā nityā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2532: yathā hi yādṛśaṃ gātracalanādi nartakaḥ karoti tādṛśameva śikṣyamāṇānukaroti nartakī,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2534: evaṃ yādṛśīmānupūrvīṃ vaidikānāṃ varṇapadādīnāṃ karotyadhyāpayitā tādṛśīmevānukaroti māṇavakaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2541: vaiyāsikaṃ tu matamanuvartamānāḥ śrutismṛtītihāsādisiddhasṛṣṭipralayānusāreṇānādyavidyopadhānalabdhasarvaśaktijñānasyāpi paramātmano nityasya vedānāṃ yonerapi na teṣu svātantryam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2543: yathā hi yāgādibrahmahatyādayor'thānarthahetavo brahmavivartā api na sargāntare 'pi vipariyanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2549: evaṃ sargāntareṣvapīti tadanurodhāt sarvajño 'pi sarvaśaktirapi pūrvapūrvasargānusāreṇa vedānviracayanna svatantraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2553: na hi bahūnāmapyajñānāṃ vijñānāṃ vāśayadoṣavatāṃ pratibhāne yukta āśvāsaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2556: tatpratyayena cārvācīnānāmapi tatra saṃpratyaya ityupapannaṃ brahmaṇaḥ śāstrayonitvam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2565: tadanena sūtreṇa pratipādanīyamityutsūtraṃ pūrvapakṣamāracayati bhāṣyakāraḥ-kathaṃ punariti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2569: na khalu laukikāni vākyāni pramāṇāntaraviṣayamarthamavabodhayanti svataḥ pramāṇam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2577: evaṃ hi pratyakṣādyanadhigatagocaratvenānapekṣatayā prāmāṇyaṃ ca prayojanavattvaṃ ca sidhyatīti tātparyārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2589: vedāntānāṃ cājñātaṃ brahma jñāpayatāṃ tathābhāvādityata āha-na ca pariniṣṭhita iti / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2602: yasmāt phalasaṃbandhaḥ kriyāyāḥ śeṣatvamantareṇa na saṃbhavati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2610: FN: 3-nanu adhikārādividhīnāṃ parasparamavinābhāve kathamavāntarabheda iti cettatrāha-tadvākyānāmiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2619: tasmāt bhāvanāviṣayo vidhirna siddhe vastuni bhavitumarhatīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2622: evaṃ ca satyuktarūpe brahmaṇi śabdasyātātparyāt pramāṇāntareṇa yādṛśa @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2626: masya rūpaṃ vyavasthāpyate na tacchabdena virudhyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2646: 'yato vā imāni bhūtāni'iti tu vākyaṃ pūrvamudāhṛtaṃ jagadutpattisthitināśakāraṇamiti ceha smāritamiti na paṭhitam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2647: yena hi vākyamupakramyate yena copasaṃhriyate tadeva vākyārtha iti śābdāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2650: FN: 1-'jāmi vā etadyajñasya kriyate yadanvañcau puroḍāśau upāṃśuyājamantarā yajati viṣṇurupāṃśu yaṣṭavyo 'jāmitvāya'ityādimantreṇa,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2651: āgneyāgnīṣomīyayoḥ puroḍāśayoḥ nirantarayoḥ karaṇe jāmi-ālasyaṃ bhavediti madhye upāṃśuyāgo vidhīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2652: tatra kimidamapūrvayāgavidhānamāho 'viṣṇurupāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ'iti paṭhitayāgatrayasyānuvāda iti saṃśaye dravyadevatayoraśravaṇāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2661: evamatrāpi 'sadeva somyedam'iti brahmopakramāt 'tattvamasi'iti ca jīvasya brahmātmanopasaṃhārāt tatparataiva vākyasya /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2664: FN: 1-aitareyake-'ātmā vā idameka evāgra āsīt'ityupakramya 'prajñānaṃ brahma'ityupasaṃhṛtam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2666: ātharvaṇe-'kasmin bhagavo vijñāte sarvamidaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavati'iti sarvātmakaṃ brahmopakramya 'brahmaivedamamṛtaṃ purastāt'iti tadevopasaṃhṛtam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2670: na ca tatparatvasya dṛṣṭasya sati saṃbhave 'nyaparatā adṛṣṭā yuktā kalpayitum,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2681: tatra pūrvavādyabhimatasya hetoḥ pauruṣeyatvena sopādhikatvaṃ apinā dyotyata ityāha-ayamabhisaṃdhiriti / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2694: evaṃ tarhi tadapūrvakāṇāṃ vedāntānāṃ bhūtārthānāmapi nāprāmāṇyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2702: bhūtārthasya śabdānapekṣeṇa puruṣeṇa mānāntarataḥ śakyajñānatvādbuddhipūrvaṃ viracanopapatteḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2714: FN: 6-vedāntavākyakadambasya kāryaparatve tu na vākyatvahetunā sāpekṣatvamanumeyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2720: FN: 7-akārye mānāntarāyogyatvasyāsiddhatvāttatparatve 'pi vedāntānāṃ pauruṣeyatvaṃ saṃbhavatīti samā sādhanavyāptiḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2721: tataśca vākyatvādiliṅgakānumānena pauruṣeyatvaṃ durapahnavamityāha-atra brūma iti / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2723: brūmaḥ-kiṃ punaridaṃ kāryamabhimatamāyuṣmataḥ yadaśakyaṃ puruṣeṇa jñātum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2727: lokānusārataḥ kriyāyā eva laukikyāḥ kāryatayā liṅāderavagamāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2733: na ca kriyā kṣaṇabhaṅgurāmuṣmikāya svargāya kalpata iti pāriśeṣyādvedata evāpūrve kārye liṅādīnāṃ saṃbandhagraha iti cet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2736: spaṣṭadṛṣṭena pauruṣeyatvena vā teṣāmapūrvārthatvapratiṣedhe vākyatvādinā liṅgena vedāntānāmapi pauruṣeyatvamanumitamityapūrvārthatā na syāt / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2738: FN: 9-smaryamāṇakartṛkatvena sopādhiko vākyatvaheturiti cet siddhārthakeṣvapi vedānteṣu tatsamamiti kāryārthatvamanapekṣatāprayojakaṃ na bhavatītyāha-anyatastviti / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2744: na cājñāte puṃsāṃ vākyaracanā saṃbhavatīti apauruṣeyo veda ityādi tatroktamavagantavyam / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2747: tenāpauruṣeyatve siddhe bhūtārthānāmapi vedāntānāṃ na sāpekṣatayā prāmāṇyavighātaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2752: gantṛtā nāsti yena prāmāṇyaṃ na syāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2757_1: puruṣārthapratilambhonāyaṃ sarpo rajjuriyamitijñānādiveti so 'yamasya vidhyarthajñānāt prakarṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2768: tatrāprāptaprāptau cātyaktatyāge ca bāhyopāyānuṣṭhānasādhyatvāt tadupāyatattvajñānādasti parācīnānuṣṭhānāpekṣā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2770: na hi sahasramapi rajjupratyayā vastusantaṃ phaṇinamanyathayitumīśate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2771: samāropite tu prepsitajihāsite tattvasākṣātkāramātreṇa bāhyānuṣṭhānānapekṣeṇa śakyete prāptumiva hātumiva /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2784: santu tarhi vedāntā devatāpratipādanadvāreṇopāsanāvidhiparā evetyata āha-na tu tathā brahmaṇa iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2785: upāsyopāsakopāsanādibhedasiddhyadhīnopāsanā na nirastasamastabhedaprapañce vedāntavedye brahmaṇi saṃbhavatīti nopāsanāvidhiśeṣatvaṃ vedāntānāṃ tadvirodhitvāt ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2789: na hi hānopādānabuddhī eva prāmaṇasya phale,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2795: svādhyāyavidhyadhīnagrahaṇatayā hi sarvo vedarāśiḥ puruṣārthatantra ityavagatam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2798: na ca vedāntebhya iva tadarthāvagamamātrādeva kaścitpuruṣārtha upalabhyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2800: 'barhiṣi rajataṃ na deyam'ityayamapi niṣedhavidhiḥ svaniṣedhyasya nindāmapekṣate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2802: tadyadi dūrato 'pi na nindāmavāpsyattato niṣedhavidhireva rajataniṣedhe ca nindāyāṃ ca darvihomavat sāmarthyadvayamakalpayiṣyat /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2803: tadevamuttaptayoḥ 'so 'rodīt'iti 'barhiṣi rajataṃ na deyam'iti ca padasaṃdarbhayorlakṣyamāṇanindādvāreṇa naṣṭāśvadagdharathavat parasparaṃ samanvayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2806: nanu vidhyasaṃsparśino vedasyānyasya na prāmāṇyaṃ dṛṣṭamiti kathaṃ vedāntānāṃ tadaspṛśāṃ tadbhaviṣyatītyata āha-na cānumānagamyamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2807: abādhitānadhigatāsaṃdigdhabodhajanakatvaṃ hi pramāṇatvaṃ pramāṇānāmtacca svata ityupapāditam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2809: tathāpi tadbodhopajanane mānāntaraṃ nāpekṣate nāpīmāmevārthāpattim, parasparā @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2811: FN: 2-pramāyāmutpannāyāṃ pramāṇānāṃ pramājanakatvānumānaṃ tataśca pramotpattiriti parasparāśrayatvamityarthaḥ / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2815: vedāntānāṃ brahmaṇyastīti dṛṣṭāntānapekṣaṃ teṣāṃ brahmaṇi prāmāṇyaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2816: anyathā nendriyāntarāṇāṃ rūpaprakāśanaṃ dṛṣṭamiti cakṣurapi na rūpaṃ prakāśayediti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2823: yatra hi śabdā lokena na prayujyante tatra na teṣāṃ saṃgatigrahaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2827: tasmāt pratipitsitaṃ pratipipādayiṣannayaṃ lokaḥ pravṛttinivṛttihetubhūtamevārthaṃ pratipādayet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2841: manumāya tasya ca śabdabhāvābhāvānuvidhānamavagamya śabdasya tadviṣayavācakatvaṃ niścetavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2843: kāryapratyaye tu narāntaravartini pravṛttinivṛttī sto hetū ityajñātasaṃgatitvānna brahmarūpaparā vedāntāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2852: FN: 2-nakāro 'yaṃ sāṃsārikāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ na nivṛttiriti yojanīyaḥ / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2854: na ca rajjuriyaṃ na bhujaṅgaḥiti yathākathañcillakṣaṇayā vākyārthatattvaniścaye yathā bhayakampādinivṛttiḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2857: api ca yadi śrutabrahmaṇo bhavati sāṃsārikadharmanivṛttiḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2861: tacca kāryaṃ svātmani niyojyaṃ niyuñjānaṃ niyoga iti ca mānāntarāpūrvatayāpūrvamiti cākhyāyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2862: na ca viṣayānuṣṭhānaṃ vinā tatsiddhiriti svasiddhyarthaṃ tadeva kāryaṃ svaviṣayasya karaṇasyātmajñānasyānuṣṭhānamākṣipati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2863: yathā ca kāryaṃ svaviṣayādhīnanirūpaṇamiti jñānena viṣeyeṇa nirūpyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2867: FN: 3-nanu kāryaṃ svaviṣayajñānanirūpaṇāya jñāyamānamātmānamākṣipati cedātmanaḥ śrautatvaṃ na syādityāśaṅkya vidhyākṣiptasya śrautatve gurusaṃmatimāha-yathāhuriti / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2869: yathāhuḥ-'yattu tatsiddhyarthamupādīyate ākṣipyate tadapi vidheyamiti tantre vyavahāraḥ'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2873: FN: 4-nanu 'vācaṃ dhenumupāsīta'itivadāropyasya vidheyadhīviṣayatvaṃ kiṃ na syādata āha-āropiteti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2875: tathāsati āropitaikyabhāvena jñānaṃ nirūpitaṃ na syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2876: satyāṃ gatāvāropo na yukta iti hṛdayam / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2878: āropitatadbhāvasya tvanyasya nirūpakatve tena tannirūpitaṃ na syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2885: 'yūpamaṣṭāśrīkaroti'ityādibhirvākyaistakṣaṇādividhiparairapi saṃskārāviṣṭaṃ viśiṣṭalakṣaṇasaṃsthānaṃ dāru yūpa iti gamyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2889: tatra ka āhavanīya ityākāṅkṣāyāṃ 'vasante brāhmaṇo 'gnīnādadhīta'ityādividhinā saṃskāraviśiṣṭo 'gnirāhavanīya iti gamyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2894: kārya eva ca saṃbandho na svarūpe,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2895: iti hetudvayaṃ bhāṣyavākyenopapāditam-pravṛttinivṛttiprayojanatvāt ityādinātatsāmānyādvedāntānāmapi tathaivārthavattvaṃ syāt ityantena /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2896: na ca svatantraṃ kāryaṃ niyojyamadhikāriṇamanuṣṭhātāramantareṇeti niyojyabhedamāha-sati ca vidhiparatva iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2897: 'brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati'iti siddhavadarthavādādavagatasyāpi brahmabhavanasya niyojyaviśeṣākāṅkṣāyāṃ brahma bubhūṣorniyojyaviśeṣasya rātri @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2899: FN: 1-'pratitiṣṭhanti ha vā ya etā rātrīrupayanti'iti rātriśabdena somaviśeṣā vidhīyante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2900: tatra kiṃ etadvākyābhihitapratiṣṭhā phalamuta svarga iti saṃśaye evaṅkāma ityaśravaṇāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2903: svarga eva phalamiti prāpte pratiṣṭhāphalasya sākṣānnirdeśena ānumānikasvargakalpanāyā anyāyyatvātpratiṣṭhaiva phalamiti rāddhāntaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2909_1: piṇḍapitṛyajñaḥ kratvartho vā puruṣārtha iti saṃśaye phalakalpanāparihārāya amāvāsyāśabdasya
GSP33brsvbh1u:2912: tadvadatra kalpane tu svargor'thaḥ brahmabhavanaśabdenāsamavetaḥ syāttathāca parokṣavṛttitāpāta iti bhāvaḥ / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2914: yajñanyāyena tu svargakāmasya niyojyasya kalpanāyāmarthavādasyāsamavetārthatayātyantaparokṣā vṛttiḥ syāditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2921: atra cātmadarśanaṃ na vidheyam taddhi dṛśerupalabdhivacanatvāt śrāvaṇaṃ vā syāt pratyakṣaṃ vā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2932: FN: 1-yathā bhikṣārthavihitadadhyānayanādvājinamānuṣaṅgikatayā jāyate evamamūtatvāya vihitādupāsanātsākṣātkāro jāyata iti tadutpādanaṃ na vidheyamityarthaḥ / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2938: arthavattyā mananādipratītyā cetyasya śeṣaḥ prapañco nigadavyākhyātaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2944: tacca sarvaṃ kāryaṃ ca vināśi ca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2948: etaduktaṃ bhavati-tvayāpyupāsanāvidhiparatvaṃ vedāntānāmabhyupagacchatā nityaśuddhabuddhatvādirūpabrahmātmatā jīvasya svābhāvikī vedāntagamyāsthīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2955: upāsanāsaṃskāravadupāsanāpūrvamapi cetaḥsahakārīti cetdṛṣṭaṃ ca khalu naiyogikaṃ phalamaihikamapi, yathā @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2957: FN: 1-'citrayā yajeta paśukāmaḥ'iti vihitacitrāniyogaphalaṃ iha janmāntare vā bhavati / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:2965: gāndharvaśāstrārthepāsanāvāsanāyā ivāpūrvānapekṣāyāḥ ṣaṭjādisākṣātkāre vedāntārthopāsanāvāsanāyā jīvabrahmabhāvasākṣātkāre 'napekṣāyā eva sāmarthyāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2969: na ca tatkāmaḥ kriyāmeva kāryamavagamiṣyati nāpūrvamiti sāṃpratam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2980: viśvajinnyāyena tu svargakalpanāyāṃ tasya sātiśayatvaṃ kṣayitvaṃ ceti na nityaphalatvamupāsanāyāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2983: upāsanāyāḥ saṃskārahetubhāvasya saṃskārasya ca sākṣātkāropajanane manaḥsācivyasya ca mānāntarasiddhatvāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2986: yathopāṃśuyājavākye 'viṣṇurupāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ'ityādayo vidhisarūpā na vidhayaḥ-iti tātparyārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2994: pare hi dvayīṃ nityatāmāhuḥ-kūṭasthanityatā pariṇāminityatāṃ ca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3003: ekadeśapariṇāme vā sa ekadeśastato bhinno vā abhinno vā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3007: abhede vā kathaṃ na sarvātmanā pariṇāmaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3012: na ca bhedābhedayorvirodhānnaikatra samavāya iti yuktam / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:3014: FN: 2-yatpramāṇaviparyayeṇa virodhena vartate tadviruddhamiti kva saṃpratyaya iti yojanā / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:3017: yattu yathā pramāṇenāvagamyate tasya tathābhāva eva /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3018: kuṇḍalamidaṃ suvarṇamiti sāmānādhikaraṇyapratyaye ca vyaktaṃ bhedābhedau cakāstaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3024: so 'yamabādhito 'saṃdigdhaḥ sarvajanīnaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyapratyaya eva kāryakāraṇayorbhedābhedau vyavasthāpayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3043: api ca kaṭakasya hāṭakādabhede yathā hāṭakātmanā kaṭakamukuṭakuṇḍalādayo na bhidyante evaṃ kaṭakātmanāpi na bhidyeran,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3049: yadi hāṭakādabhinnaḥ kaṭakaḥ kathamayaṃ kuṇḍalādiṣu nānuvartate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3051: ye hi yasminnanuvartamāne vyāvartante te tato bhinnā eva,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3058: api ca dūrātkanakamityavagate na tasya kuṇḍalādayo viśeṣā jijñāsyeran,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3066: asti cābhede kāraṇasatteti kanake jñāte jñātā eva kuṇḍalādaya iti tajjijñāsājñānāni cānarthakāni syuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3067: tena yasmin gṛhyamāṇe yanna gṛhyate tattato bhidyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3069: gṛhyamāṇe ca dūrato hemni na gṛhyante tasya bhedāḥ kuṇḍalādayaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3071: kathaṃ tarhi hema kuṇḍalamiti sāmānādhikaraṇyam iti cet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3073: athānuvṛttivyāvṛttivyavasthā ca hemni jñāte kuṇḍalādijijñāsā ca katham /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3085: tasmāt kūṭasthanityataiva pāramārthikī na pariṇāminityateti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3092: vrīhīṇāṃ khalu prokṣaṇena saṃskārākhyoṃ'śo yathā janyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3099: sukhaṃ cāpratīyamānaṃ na puruṣārthaṃ ityata āha-svayañjyotiriti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3100: tadevaṃ svamatena mokṣākhyaṃ phalaṃ nityaṃ śrutyādibhirupapādya kriyāniṣpādyasya tu mokṣasyānityatvaṃ prasañjayati-tadyadīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3103: api ca jñānajanyāpūrvajanito mokṣo naiyogika ityasyārthasya santi bhūyasyaḥ śrutayo nivārikā ityāha-api ca brahma vedeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3104: avidyādvayapratibandhāpanayamātreṇa ca vidyāyā mokṣasādhanatvam na svato 'pūrvotpādena cetyatrāpi śrutīrudāharati-tvaṃ hi naḥ piteti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3119: mithyājñānaṃ cāvidyā rāgādyupajananakrameṇa dṛṣṭenaiva saṃsārasya paramaṃ nidānam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3128: yena mithyājñānaṃ bhedāvabhāsaṃ nivartayanna vidhiviṣayo bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3134: tathā ca vidheḥ prāgaprāptaṃ puruṣecchayā kartavyaṃ sat vidhigocaro bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3135: yathā vṛttyantaratvena manaso viśvedevasāmyādviśvāndevānmanasi saṃpādya mana ālambanamavidyamānasamaṃ kṛtvā prādhānyena saṃpādyānāṃ viśveṣāmeva devānāmanucintanam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3137: evaṃ cidrūpasāmyājjīvasya brahmarūpatāṃ saṃpādya jīvamālambanamavidyamānasamaṃ kṛtvā prādhānyena brahmānucintanam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3151: prāyaṇakāle hi sa eva sarvāṇīndriyāṇi saṃgṛhyotkrāmatīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3152: seyaṃ saṃvargadṛṣṭirvāyau prāṇe ca daśāśāgataṃ jagaddarśayati yathā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3153: evaṃ jīvātmani bṛṃhaṇakriyayā brahmadṛṣṭismṛtatvāya phalāya kalpata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3157: 'ājyaiḥ stuvate praugaṃ śaṃsati iti stutaśastre samāmnāte,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3160_1: vā apūrvārthatvena pradhānakarmaṇi veti saṃdehe kratūpayogidevatāsmaraṇasya dṛṣṭatvādguṇakarmatve
GSP33brsvbh1u:3166: ātmā tu dravyaṃ karmaṇi guṇa iti saṃskāro vātmano darśanaṃ vidhīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3169: evaṃ kartṛtvena kratvaṅgabhūte ātmani 'ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ'iti darśanaṃ guṇakarma vidhīyate / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:3171: FN: 3-(jai. 2 / 1 / 8) tasyārthaḥ-yairavaghātādirdravyaṃ cikīrṣyate saṃskartumiṣyate guṇastatra pratīyeta /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3174: 'yaistu dravyaṃ cikīrṣyate guṇastatra pratīyeta'iti nyāyādata āha-na cedaṃ brahmātmaikatvavijñānamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3180: darśapūrṇamāsaprakaraṇe hi samāmnātamājyāvekṣaṇaṃ tadaṅgabhūtājyasaṃskāra iti yujyate / @#----------------------
GSP33brsvbh1u:3184: naca 'ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ'ityādi kasyacitprakaraṇe samāmnātam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3186: 'yasya pūrṇamayī juhūrbhavati'ityavyabhicaritakratusaṃbandhajuhūdvāreṇa juhūpadaṃ kratuṃ smārayadvākyena yathā parṇatāyāḥ kratuśeṣabhāvamāpādayati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3188: yena taddarśanaṃ kratvaṅgaṃ sadātmānaṃ kratvarthaṃ saṃskuryāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3191: FN: 1-'tasmātsuvarṇaṃ hiraṇyaṃ bhāryaṃ durvaṇo 'sya bhātṛvyo bhavati'ityanārabhyādhīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3192: tatra kiṃ śobhanahiraṇyadhāraṇaṃ kratvaṅgamuta puruṣadharma iti saṃdehe durvarṇakāma ityaśravaṇāt svatantraphalakalpane gauravāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3195: hiraṇyasādhanakaṃ dhāraṇaṃ vākyaśeṣagataphalāya vidhīyata iti puruṣadharmaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3198: 'suvarṇaṃ bhāryam'itivat viniyogabhaṅgena pradhānakarmaivāpūrvaviṣayatvānna guṇakarmeti sthavīyastayaitaddūṣaṇamanabhidhāya sarvapakṣasādhāraṇaṃ dūṣaṇamuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3200: kiṃ ca jñānakriyāviṣayatvavidhānamasya bahuśrutiviruddhamityāha-na ca vidikriyeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3206: sarvameva hi vākyaṃ nedantayā vastubhedaṃ bodhayitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3209: tena pramāṇāntarasiddhe laukike evārthe yadā gatiridṛśī śabdasya,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3216: tvaṃpadārtho hi pramātā pramāṇādhīnayā pramityā prameyaṃ ghaṭādi vyāpnotītyavidyāvilasitam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3217: tadasyā viṣayībhūtodāsīnatatpadārthapratyagātmasāmānādhikaraṇyena pramātṛtvābhāvāt tannivṛttau pramāṇādayastisro vidhā nivartante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3218: na hi pakturavastutve pākyapākapacanāni vastusanti bhavitumarhantīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3219: tathā hi-'vigalitaparāgvṛttyarthatvaṃ tvaṃpadasya tadastadā tvamiti hi padenaikārthatve tvamityapi yatpadam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3220: tadapi ca tadā gatvaikārthyaṃ viśuddhacidātmatāṃ tyajati sakalānkartṛtvādīnpadārthamalānnijān //
GSP33brsvbh1u:3228: tathā ca viśuddhavijñānotpādo mokṣa iti nirvartyo mokṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3229: anyeṣāṃ tu saṃskārarūpāvasthāmapahāya yā kaivalyāvasthāvāptirātmanaḥ sa mokṣa iti vikāryo mokṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3234: 'atha yadataḥ paro divo jyotirdīpyate'iti śruterbrahmaṇo vikṛtāvikṛtadeśabhedāvagamādavikṛtadeśabrahmaprāptirūpāsanādividhikāryā bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3235: tathā ca prāpyakarmatā brahmaṇa ityata āha-na cāpyatvenāpīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3238: madhye tu praśāntasakalakallolopasargaḥ svacchaḥ sthiratayāvikṛtastasya madhyamavikṛtaṃ pautikaḥ potena prāpnoti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3241: atha jīvo brahmaṇo bhinnastathāpi na tena brahmāpyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3247: tena hi tatkusumaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ lākṣārasasavarṇaṃ phalaṃ prasūte /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3250: guṇo hi brahmaṇaḥ svabhāvo vā bhinno vā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3275: kriyā hi brahmasamavetā vā brahma saṃskuryāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3281: FN: 1-yadyapi caitrasamavetā bhāvanā darpaṇasyopakaroti tathāpi saṃyogavibhāgākhyadhātvarthadvārā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3286: na hi darpaṇe nighṛṣyamāṇe maṇirviśuddho dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3297: anādyanirvācyāvidyopadhānameva brahmaṇo jīva iti ca kṣetrajña iti cācakṣate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3302: tenātrāpi yadāśritā kriyā sāṃvyavahārikapramāṇaviṣayīkṛtā tasyaiva saṃskāro nānyasyeti na vyabhicāraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3303: tattvatastu na kriyā na saṃskāra iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3304: sanidarśanaṃ tu śeṣamadhyāsabhāṣye eva kṛtavyākhyānamiti neha vyākhyātam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3319: yayā mokṣasya karmatā ghaṭiṣyata ityata āha-ato 'nyaditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3322: etaduktaṃ bhavati-catasṛṇāṃ vidhānāṃ madhye 'nyatamatayā kriyāphalatvaṃ vyāptam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3323: sā ca mokṣādvyāvartamānā vyāpakānupalabdhyā mokṣasya kriyāphalatvaṃ vyāvartayatīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3325: tathā ca tadarthāni śāstrāṇi tadarthāśca pravṛttayo 'narthakānītyata upasaṃhāravyājenāha-tasmājjñānamekamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3326: atha jñānaṃ kriyā mānasī kasmānna vidhigocaraḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3327: kasmācca tasyāḥ phalaṃ nirvartyādiṣvanyatamaṃ na mokṣa iti codayati-nanu jñānamiti /
