GSP33brsvbh1u:6492: 'balīyasā hi saureṇa tejasā mandaṃ tejaścandratārakādyabhibhūyamānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6494: ye 'pi pidhāyakāḥ pradīpasya gṛhaghaṭādayo na te svabhāsā pradīpaṃ bhāsayitumīśate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6500: tasmādyadyapi 'yasmin dyauḥ pṛthivī cāntarikṣamotam'iti brahma prakṛtaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6504: tatra taṃ tasyeti ca sarvanāmapadāni pradarśanīyamevāvamrakṣyanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6507: tasmātpramāṇāntarāpratītamapi tejo 'ntaramalaukikaṃ śabdādupāsyatvena gamyata iti prāpte ucyate-'brahmaṇyeva hi talliṅgaṃ na tu tejasyalaukike /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6508: tasmānna tadupāsyatve brahma jñeyaṃ tu gamyate //
GSP33brsvbh1u:6510_0: kiṃvā 'bhārūpaḥ satyasaṃkalpaḥ'iti śrutyantaraprasiddhena brahmaṇo bhānena sūryādīnāṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:6510_1: bhānamupapādyatāmiti viśaye na śrutasaṃbhave 'śrutasya kalpanā yujyata ityaprasiddhaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:6516: tathā tadeva cākṣuṣaṃ tejo bāhyasauryāditejaḥāpyāyitaṃ rūpādi prakāśayati nānāpyāyitam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6527: vanhyayaḥ piṇḍayostu yadyapi dahanakriyā na bhidyate tathāpi dravyabhedena kriyābhedaṃ kalpayitvā kriyāsādṛśyaṃ vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6528: tadevamanukṛteriti vibhajya tasya ceti sūtrāvayavaṃ vibhajate-tasya ceti caturthamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6533: brahmaṇi tu niḥśeṣajagadavabhāsake na sarvaśabdasya vṛttiḥ saṃkucatīti-tatraśabdamāharanniti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6535: 'tena raktaṃ rāgāt'ityādāvapi prakṛteḥ parasminpratyayer'thabhede 'nvākhyāyamāne prātipadikapratyarthasya pūrvavṛttatvamastīti teneti tatparāmarśānna vyabhāciraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6538: śrutistu liṅgādbalīyasīti śrautamiha brahmaiva gamyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6540: dṛṣṭārthatvādityāha-anantaraṃ ca hiraṇmaye pare kośa iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6542: tatra kathaṃ tat jyotiṣāṃ jyotirityapekṣāyāmitadamupatiṣṭhate-na tatra sūrya iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6545: ayamabhiprāyaḥ-'na tatra sūryo bhāti'iti neyaṃ satisaptamī,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6548: tena na tatra brahmaṇi prakāśayitavye sūryādayaḥ prakāśakatayā bhānti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6549: kintu brahmaiva sūryādiṣu prakāśayitavyeṣu prakāśakatvena bhāti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6575: ātmaśabdo hyayaṃ svabhāvavacano vā jīvavacano vā brahmavacano vā syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6576: tatra svabhāvasya svabhavitradhīnanirūpaṇatayā svasya ca bhavituranirdeśānna jñāyate kasya madhya iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6577: naca jīvaparayorasti madhyamañjaseti naiṣa sthānanirdeśo vispaṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6584: api ca jīvātmanaḥ spaṣṭamaṅguṣṭhamātratvaṃ smaryate-'aṅguṣṭhamātraṃ puruṣaṃ niśicakarṣa yamo balāt'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6585: nahi sarveśasya brahmaṇo yamena balānniṣkarṣaḥ kalpate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6586: yamo hi jagau-'hariguruvaśago 'smi na svatantraḥ prabhavati saṃyamane mamāpi viṣṇuḥ'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6587: tenāṅguṣṭhamātratvasya jīve niśchayādāpekṣikaṃ kiñcidbhūtabhavyaṃ prati jīvasyeśānatvaṃ vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6594: tadanantarasya saṃdarbhasya tatprativacanatociteti 'etadvai tat'iti brahmābhidhānaṃ yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6595: tathā cāṅguṣṭhamātratayā yadyapi jīve 'vagamyate tathāpi na tatparametadvākyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6599: tena yathā 'tattvamasi'iti vijñānātmanastvaṃpadārthasya taditi paramātmanaikatvaṃ pratipādyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6600: tathehāpyaṅguṣṭhaparimitasya vijñānātmana īśānaśrutyā brahmabhāvaḥ pratipādya iti yuktam //24//
GSP33brsvbh1u:6606: na cānyaḥ paramātmāna iha grahaṇamarhatīti na jīvaparametadvākyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6610: antaḥsaṃjñānāṃ mokṣamāṇānāṃ ca kāmyeṣu karmasvadhikāraṃ niṣedhati-śaktatvāditi tiryagdevarṣīṇāmaśaktānāmadhikāraṃ nivartayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6620: naca tajjīvamanabhidhāya śakyaṃ vaktumiti jīva ucyata ityarthaḥ //25//
GSP33brsvbh1u:6625: devarṣīṇāṃ brahmavijñānādhikāracintā samanvayalakṣaṇe 'saṃgatetyasyāḥ prāsaṅgikīṃ saṃgatiṃ darśayituṃ prasaṅgamāha-aṅguṣṭhamātraśrutiriti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6627: devādīnāṃ vividhavicitrānandabhogabhogināṃ vairāgyābhāvānnārthitvaṃ brahmavidyāyāmityata āha-tatrārthitvaṃ tāvanmokṣaviṣayamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6629: nanu devādīnāṃ vigrahādyabhāvendriyārthasaṃnikarṣajāyāḥ pramāṇādivṛtteranupapatteravidvattayā sāmarthyābhāvena nādhikāra ityata āha-tadā sāmarthyamiti teṣāmiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6632: na khalu vidhivat gurumukhādgṛhyamāṇo vedaḥ phalavatkarmabrahmāvabodhahetuḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6634: sa ca manuṣyāṇāmiha janmanīva devadīnāṃ prāci bhave vidhivadhīta āmnāya iha janmani smaryamāṇaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6635: ata eva svayaṃ pratibhāto vedaḥ saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6642: virodhaḥ karmaṇīti cen nānekapratipatter darśanāt / BBs_1,3.27 /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6644: mantrādipadasamanvayātpratīyamānor'thaḥ pramāṇāntarāvirodhe satyupeyaḥ na tu virodhe /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6647: tathāca vigrahādyabhāvācchabdopahitārthor'thopahito vā śabdo devatetyacetanatvānna tasyāḥ kvacidapyadhikāra iti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6651: saiva kuta ityata āha-darśanātśrutiṣu smṛtiṣu ca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6657: mā bhūdyāgādīnāmapi svargādisādhanatvamadṛṣṭamiti manuṣyaśarīrasya mātāpitṛsaṃyogajatvaniyamādasati pitroḥ saṃyoge kutaḥ saṃbhavaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6658: saṃbhave vānagnito 'pi dhūmaḥ syāditi bādhadarśanamiti cet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6659: hanta kiṃ śarīratvena hetunā devādiśarīramapi mātāpitṛsaṃyogajaṃ siṣādhayiṣasi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6664: bhūtavaśināṃ hi devādīnāṃ nānākāyacikīrṣāvaśādbhūtakriyotpattau bhūtānāṃ parasparasaṃyogena nānākāyamasutpādāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6670: na cāsmadādivatteṣāṃ śarīritvena vyavahitāviprakṛṣṭādidarśanāsaṃbhavo 'numīyata iti vācyam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6673: tena saṃnihitānāmapi na kratudeśe darśanaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6675: vaiśvadevaśastrasya hi nividi 'kati devāḥ'ityupakramya nividaivottaraṃ dattaṃ śākalyāya yājñavalkyena-trayaśca trī ca śatā trayaśca trī ca sahasreti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6677: etaduktaṃ bhavati-vaiśvadevasya nividi kati devāḥ śasyamānāḥ prasaṃkhyātā iti śākalyena pṛṣṭe yājñavalkyasyottaraṃ-'trayaśca trī ca śatā'ityādi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6678: yāvatsaṃkhyākā vaiśvadevanividi saṃkhyātā devāsta etāvanta iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6679: punaśca śākalyena 'katame te'iti saṃkhyeyeṣu pṛṣṭeṣu yājñavalkyasyottaram-mahimāna evaiṣāmete trayastriṃśattveva devā iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6680: aṣṭau vasava ekādaśa rudrā dvādaśādityā indraśca prajāpatiśceti trayastriṃśaddevāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6681: tatrāgniśca pṛthivī ca vāyuścāntarikṣaṃ cādityaśca dyauśca candramāśca nakṣatrāṇi ceti vasavaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6682: ete hi prāṇināṃ karmaphalāśrayeṇa kāryakāraṇasaṃghātarūpeṇa pariṇamanto jagadidaṃ sarvaṃ vāsayanti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6684: katame rudrā iti daśeme puruṣe prāṇāḥ buddhikarmendriyāṇi daśa,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6688: te hi prāyaṇakāla utkrāmantaḥ puruṣaṃ rodayantīti rudrāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6689: katama ādityā iti dvādaśamāsāḥ saṃvatsarasyāvayavāḥ punaḥ punaḥ paruvartamānāḥ prāṇabhṛtāmāyūṃṣi ca karmaphalopabhogaṃ cādāpayantītyādityāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6696: yajñasādhanaṃ ca yajñarūpaṃ ca paśavaḥ prajāpatiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6697: eta eva trayastriṃśaddevāḥ ṣaṇṇāmagnipṛthivīvāyvantarikṣādityādivāṃ mahimāno na tato bhidyante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6699: te tu ṣaḍagniṃ pṛthivīṃ caikīkṛtyāntarikṣaṃ vāyuṃ caikīkṛtya divaṃ cādityaṃ caikīkṛtya trayo lokāstraya eva devā bhavanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6700: eta eva ca trayo 'nnaprāṇayorantarbhavanto 'nnaprāṇau dvau devau bhavataḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6705: yadasminsati sarvamidamadhyardhaṃ vṛddhiṃ prāpnoti tenādhyardha iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6708: sarvadevātmatvena bṛhattvādbrahma tadeva syādityācakṣate parokṣābhidhāyakena śabdena /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6713: aṇimā laghimā mahimā prāptiḥ prākāmyamīśitvaṃ vaśitvaṃ yatrakāmāvasāyitetyaiśvaryāṇi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6717: tadeva parisphuṭaṃ darśayituṃ vyatirekaṃ tāvadāha-kvacideka iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6718: na khalu bahuṣu śrāddheṣveko brāhmaṇo yugapadaṅgabhāvaṃ gantumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6720: yathaikaṃ brāhmaṇamuddiśya yugapannamaskāraḥ kriyate bahubhistathā svasthānasthitāmekāṃ devatāmuddiśya bahubhiryajamānairnānādeśāvasthitairyugapaddhavistyajyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6725: śabda iti cen nātaḥ prabhavāt pratyakṣānumānābhyām / BBs_1,3.28 /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6727: gotvādivatpūrvāvamarśābhāvādupādherapyekasyāpratīteḥ pācakādivadākāśadiśabdavadvyaktivacanā eva vasvādiśabdāḥ tasyāśca nityatvāttayā saha saṃbandho nityo bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6728: vigrahādiyoge tu sāvayavatvena vasvādīnāmanityatvāttataḥ pūrvaṃ vasvādiśabdo na svārthena saṃbaddha āsīt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6730: tataścotpanne vasvādau vasvādiśabdasaṃbandhaḥ prādurbhavandevadattādiśabdasaṃbandhavatpuruṣabuddhiprabhava iti tatpūrvako vākyārthapratyayo 'pi puruṣabuddhyadhīnaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6731: puruṣabuddhiśca mānāntarādhīnajanmeti mānāntarāpekṣayā prāmāṇyaṃ vedasya vyāhanyeteti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6734: vasutvādijātivācakācchabdāttajjātīyāṃ vyaktiṃ cikīrṣitāṃ buddhivāsikhya tasyāḥ prabhavanam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6736: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yadyapi na śabda upādānakāraṇaṃ vasvādīnāṃ brahmopādānatvāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6743: tathāca tadeva pramāṇāntarāpekṣavākyatvādaprāmāṇyamāpatitamityata āha-utsargo 'pyayaṃ vācaḥ saṃpradāyapravartanātmaka iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6745: etaduktaṃ bhavati-svayaṃbhuvo vedakartṛtve 'pi na kālidāsādivatsvatantratvamapi tu pūrvasṛṣṭyanusāreṇa /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6753: tatra na tāvadvasvādīnāṃ vakārādayo varṇā vācakāḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6756: api caite pratyekaṃ vā vākyārthamabhidadhīran militā vā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6761: teṣāmekavaktṛprayujyamānānāṃ rūpato vyaktito vā pratikṣaṇamapavargiṇāṃ mithaḥ sāhityasaṃbhavābhāvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6763: naca svarūpasāhityābhāve 'pi varṇānāmāgneyādīnāmiva saṃskāradvārakamasti sāhityamiti sāṃprataṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6780: nahi yaiva vahnerdahanaśaktiḥ saiva tasya prakāśanaśaktiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6781: nāpi dahanaśakteḥ prakāśanaśaktiḥ apica vyutkrameṇoccaritebhyo varṇebhyaḥ saivāsti smṛtibījaṃ vāsanetyarthapratyayaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6792: na sphoṭa iti tu na mṛṣyāmaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6797: na cāyamasati bādhake ekapadavākyānubhavaḥ śakyo mithyetivaktum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6802: tathā sati dhavakhadirapalāśā iti na jātu syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6807_1: sa sphoṭa iti taṃ ca dhvanayaḥ pratyekaṃ vyañjayanto 'pi na drāgitveva viśadayanti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6809_1: carame cetasi cakāsti viśadaṃ padavākyatattvamiti prāganutpannāyāstadanantaramarthadhiya
GSP33brsvbh1u:6818: arthadhiyastvapratyakṣāyā mānāntarajanmano vyakta evopajano na vā syānna punarasphuṭa iti na samaḥ samādhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6819: tasmānnityaḥ sphoṭa eva vācako na varṇā iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6820: tadetadācāryadeśīyamataṃ svamatamupapādayannapākaroti-varṇā eva tu na śabda iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6835: tatra kvacidvyabhicāradarśanena tadutprekṣāyāmucyate vṛddheḥ svataḥprāmāṇ.vādibhiḥ-'utprekṣeta hi yo mohādajñātamapi bādhanam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6839: na cedaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ gatvādijātiviṣayaṃ na gādivyaktiviṣayaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6840: tāsāṃ pratinaraṃ bhedopalambhādata eva śabdabhedopalambhādvaktṛbheda unnīyate 'somaśarmādhīte na viṣṇuśarmā'iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6842: yathā kālākṣīṃ ca svastimatīṃ cekṣamāṇasya vyaktibhedaprathāyāṃ satyāmeva tadanugatamekaṃ sāmānyaṃ prathate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6843: tathā kiṃ gakārādiṣu bhedena prathamāneṣveva gatvamekaṃ tadanugataṃ cakāsti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6844_1: mahadiva dīrghamiva vāmanamiva tathāgavyaktirājānata ekāpi vyañjakabhedāttadharmānupātinīva
GSP33brsvbh1u:6845: tatra gavyaktibhedamaṅgīkṛtyāpi yo gatvasyaikasya paropadhānabhedakalpanāprayāsaḥ sa varaṃ gavyaktāvevāstu kimantargaḍunā gatvenābhyupetena /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6849: tathā sati daśa gakārānudacārayaccaitra iti hi pratyayaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6851: na caiṣa jātyabhiprāyo 'bhyāso yathā śatakṛtvastittirīnupāyuṅkta devadatta iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6852: atra hi sorastāḍaṃ krandato 'pi gakārādivyaktau lokasyoccāraṇābhyāsapratyayasya vinirvṛttiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6864: mā bhūvan ghrāṇarasanaśrotrāṇāṃ gandharasaśabdagocarāṇāṃ tadvantaḥ pṛthivyudakākāśā gocarāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6865: evaṃ ca mā nāma bhūdvāyugocaraṃ śrotram,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6868: naca śabdasya pratyabhijñānāvadhṛtaikatvasya svarūpata udāttādayo dharmāḥ parasparavirodhino 'paryāyeṇa saṃbhavanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6871: na tu bhāviko nānādharmasaṃsarga iti sthite 'bhyupetya parihāramāha bhāṣyakāraḥ-athavā dhvanikṛta iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6877: na cāyamanirdhāritaviśeṣavarṇatvasāmānyamātrapratyayo na tu varṇātiriktadabhivyañjakadhvanipratyaya iti sāṃpratam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6882_0: śabdavyañjakaḥ śrāvaṇo 'bhyupeyaḥ ubhayathāpi cākṣu vyañjaneṣu ca tattaddhvanibhedopadhānenānunāsikatvādayo
GSP33brsvbh1u:6882_1: 'vagamyamānāstaddharmā eva śabde pratīyante na tu svataḥ śabdasya dharmāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6883: tathā ca yeṣāmanunāsikatvādayo dharmāḥ parasparaviruddhā bhāsante bhavatu teṣāṃ dhvanīnāmanityatā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6885: yeṣu tu varṇeṣu pratyabhijñānaṃ na teṣāmanunāsikatvādayo dharmā iti nānityāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6887: yadyeṣa parasyāgraho dharmiṇyagṛhyamāṇe taddharmā na śakyā grahītumiti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6890: tadanena prabandhena kṣaṇikatvena varṇānāmaśakyasaṃgatigrahatayā yadavācakatvamāpāditaṃ varṇānāṃ tadapākṛtam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6903: evaṃ ca kalpitā evāsya bhāgā varṇā iti cet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6906: hantāsyāṃ nānā varṇāḥ prathanta iti nānātvāvabhāsa ekaikatvaṃ kasmānna bādhate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6908: no khalu senāvanabuddhī gajapadātituragādīnāṃ campakāśokakiṃśukādīnāṃ ca bhedamapabādhamāne udīyete,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6917: na caikasmṛtisamārohiṇāṃ kramākramaviparītakramaprayuktānāmabhedo varṇānāmiti yathākathañcitprayuktebhya etebhyor'thapratyayaprasaṅga iti vācyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6918: uktaṃ hi-'yāvanto yādṛśā ye ca padārthapratipādane /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6921: nanu paṅktibuddhāvekasyāmakramāyāmapi vāstavī śālādīnāmasti paṅgiriti tathaiva prathā yuktā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6922: naca tatheha varṇānāṃ nityānāṃ vibhūnāṃ cāsti vāstavaḥ kramaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6927: tathāhi-jārārājeti padayoḥ prathayantyoḥ smṛtidhiyostattve 'pi varṇānāṃ kramabhedātpadabhedaḥ sphuṭataraṃ cakāsti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6936: santvanityā eva varṇāstathāpi gatvādyavacchedenaiva saṃgatigraho 'nādiśca vyavahāraḥ setsyatītyāha-athāpi nāmeti //28//
GSP33brsvbh1u:6941: nanu prācyāmeva mīmāṃsāyāṃ vedasya nityatvaṃ siddhaṃ tatkiṃ punaḥ sādhyata ityata āha-svatantrasya karturasmaraṇādeva hi sthite vedasya nityatva iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6954: niranvayasya tu jagataḥ pravilaye 'tyantāsataścāpūrvasyotpāde 'bhidhānābhidheyāvatyantamucchinnāviti kimāśrayaḥ saṃbandhaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6957: antaḥkaraṇādyupādhikalpitā hi te tadvicchede na sthātumarhanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6960: brahmaṇaśca sṛṣṭyādāvantaḥkaraṇāni tadavacchinnāścha jīvāḥ prādurbhavanto napūrvakarmāvidyāvāsanāvanto bhavitumarhanti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6965_0: yadyapi mahāpralayasamaye nāntaḥkaraṇādayaḥ samudācaradvṛttayaḥ santi tathāpi svakāraṇe
GSP33brsvbh1u:6965_1: 'nirvācyāyāmavidyāyāṃ līnāḥ sūkṣmeṇa śaktirūpeṇa karmavikṣepakāvidyāvāsanābhiḥ sahāvatiṣṭhanta eva /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6969: te cāvadhiṃ prāpya parameśvarecchāpracoditā yathā kūrmadehe nilīnānyaṅgāni tato niḥsaranti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6970: yathā vā varṣāpāye prāptamṛdbhāvāni maṇḍūkaśarīrāṇi tadvāsanāvāsitatayā ghanaghanāghanāsārāvasekasuhitāni punarmaṇḍūkadehabhāvamanubhavanti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6974: naca sargapralayapravāhasyānāditāmantareṇaitadupapadyata iti sargapralayābhyayupagame 'pi saṃsārānāditā na virudhyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6979: tathāpi mahāpralayāntarite kutaḥ smaraṇaṃ vedānāmityata āha-anādau ca saṃsāre yathā svāpaprabodhayoriti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6981: tathāpi karmavikṣepasaṃskārasahitalayalakṣaṇā vidyāvaśeṣatāsāmyena svāpapralayāvasthayorabheda iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6985: prāyaṇakālaviprakarṣayośca vāsanocchedakāraṇayorabhāvena satyāṃ vāsanāyāṃ smaraṇopapatteḥ śabdārthasaṃbandhavedavyahārānucchedo yujyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6987: prāyaṇakālaviprakarṣau ca tatra saṃskāramātrocchedahetū sta iti kutaḥ suṣuptavatpūrvaprabodhavyavahāravaduttaraprabodhavyavahāra iti codayati-syādetat /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6995: tatra kaiva kathā parameśvarānugraheṇa dharmajñānavairāgyaiśvaryātiśayasaṃpannānāṃ hiraṇyagarbhaprabhṛtīnāṃ mahādhiyām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6996: yathāvā ā ca manuṣyebhya ā ca kṛmibhyo jñānādīnāmanubhūyate nikarṣaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6997: evamā manuṣyebhya eva ā ca bhagavato hiraṇyagarbhajjñānādīnāṃ prakarṣe 'pi saṃbhāvyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7010: tathāca pūrvavyavahārocchedācchabdārthasaṃbandhaśca vedaścānityau prasajyeyātāmityata āha-prāṇināṃ ca sukhaprāptaya iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7018: tathā sati vastusāmarthyaniyamābhāvātsarvaṃ sarvasmādbhavediti pipāsurapi dahanamāhṛtya pipāsāmupaśamayet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7021: evaṃ ya eva vedā asminkalpe ta eva kalpāntare,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7022: ta eva caiṣāmarthā ta eva ca varṇāśramāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7035: kiṃ sarvāsu brahmavidyā svaviśeṣeṇa sarveṣāṃ kiṃvā kāsucideva keṣāñcit /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7039: asau vā ādityo devamadhvityatra hi manuṣyā ādityaṃ madhvadhyāsenopāsīran /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7040: upāsyopāsakabhāvo hi bhedādhiṣṭhāno na svātmanyādityasya devatāyāḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7044: ayamarthaḥ-'asau vā ādityo devamadhu'iti devānāṃ modahetutvānmadhviva madhu /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7050_0: yathā hi bhramarāḥ puṣpebhya āhṛtya makarandaṃ svasthānamānayantyevamṛṅmantrabhramarāḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:7052_1: āhṛtyāgnau hutaṃ somādi pūrvavadamṛtabhāvamāpannaṃ yajurvedamantrabhramarā ādityamaṇḍalamānayanti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7054_1: āhṛtyāgnau hutaṃ somādi pūrvavadamṛtabhāvamāpannaṃ sāmamantrastotrabhramarā ādityamaṇḍalamānayanti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7056: athāsyādityamadhuna udīcibhiratikṛṣṇābhī raśmināḍībhirathavedavihitebhyaḥ karmakusumebhya āhṛtyāgnau hutaṃ somādi pūrvavadamṛtabhāvamāpannamatharvāṅgirasamantrabhramarāḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7058: aśvamedhe vācaḥstome ca pāriplavaṃ śaṃsanti iti śravaṇāditihāsapurāṇamantrāṇāmapyasti prayogaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7060: athāsya yā ādityamadhuna ūrdhvā raśmināḍyo gopyāstābhirupāsanabhramarāḥ praṇavakusumādāhṛtyādityamaṇḍalamānayanti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7062: tā etā ādityavyapāśrayāḥ pañca rohitādayo raśmināḍya ṛgādisaṃbaddhāḥ krameṇopadiśyeti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7063: etadevāmṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvopalabhya yathāsvaṃ samastaiḥ karaṇairyaśastejaindriyasākalyavīryānnādyānyamṛtaṃ tadupalabhyāditye tṛpyati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7064: tena khalvamṛtena devānāṃ vasvādīnāṃ modanaṃ vidadhadādityo madhu /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7069: ākāśasya hi sarvagatatvaṃ rūpādihīnatve ca brahmaṇā sārūpyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7070: tasya caitasyākāśasya brahmaṇaścatvāraḥ pādā agnyādayaḥ 'agniḥ pādaḥ'ityādinā darśitāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7071: yathā hi goḥ pādā na gavā viyujyanta,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7073: tadevamākāśasya catuṣpado brahmadṛṣṭiṃ vidhāya svarūpeṇa vāyuṃ saṃvargaguṇakamupāsyaṃ vidhātuṃ mahīkaroti-vāyurvāva saṃvargaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7074: tathā svarūpeṇaivādityaṃ brahmadṛṣṭyopāsyaṃ vidhātuṃ mahikaroti-ādityo brahmetyādeśaḥupadeśaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7078: yadyucyeta nāviśeṣaṇa sarveṣāṃ devarṣīṇāṃ sarvāsu brahmavidyāsvadhikāraḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7092: indro vṛtrāṇi jighnate'iti vigrahavattvaṃ devatāyā mantrārthavādā abhivadanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7093: tathā havirbhojanaṃ devatāyā darśayanti 'addhīndra piba caprasthitasya'ityādayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7094: tatheśanam-'indro diva indra īśe pṛthivyā indro apāmindra itparvatānām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7095: indro vṛdhāmindra inmedhirāṇāmindraḥ kṣeme yoge havya indraḥ'iti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7097: tathā varivasitāraṃ prati devatāyāḥ prasādaṃ prasannāyāśca phaladānāṃ darśayati-'āhutibhireva devān hutādaḥ prīṇāti tasmai prītā iṣamūrjaṃ ca yacchanti'iti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7101: laukikā api devatāvigrahādipañcakaṃ smaranti coparacaranti ca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7107: tathāsyāḥ prasādaṃ ca prasannāyāśca phaladānamāhuḥ-prasanno 'sya paśupatiḥ putro 'sya jātaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7120: vidhyuddeśenaikavākyatāmāpadyamānā arthavādā vidhiviṣayaprāśastyalakṣaṇāparā na svārthe pramāṇaṃ bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7130: na caikaṃ vākyamubhayaparaṃ bhavatīti vākyaṃ bhidyeta /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7133_1: kathamupayujyantāṃ teṣa teṣu karmasvityapekṣāyāṃ dṛṣṭe prakāre saṃbhavati nādṛṣṭakalpanocitā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7136: autsargikī cārthaparatā padānāmityapekṣitaprayogasamavetārthasmaraṇatātparyāṇāṃ mantrāṇāṃ nānadhigate vigrahādāvapi tātparyaṃ yujyata iti na tebhyo 'pi tatsiddhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7153: nahi śvitrinirṇejanaparaṃ śveto dhāvatīti vākyamitaḥ sārameyagamanaṃ gamayitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7158: nahyudakāharaṇārthinā ghaṭadarśanāyonmīlitaṃ cakṣurghaṭapaṭau vā paṭaṃ vā kevalaṃ nopalabhate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7159: tadevamekadeśini pūrvapakṣiṇā dūṣite paramasiddhāntavādyāha-atrocyate viṣama upanyāsa iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7160: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-loke viśiṣṭārthapratyāyanāya padāni prayuktāni tadantareṇa na svārthamātrasmāraṇe paryavasyanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7161: nahi svārthasmāraṇamātrāya loke padānāṃ prayogo dṛṣṭapūrvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7163: na caitānyasmāritasvārthāni sākṣādvākyārthaṃ pratyāyayitumīśate iti svārthasmāraṇaṃ vākyārthamitaye 'vāntaravyāpāraḥ kalpitaḥ padānām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7164: naca yadarthaṃ yattattena vinā paryavasyatīti na svārthamātrabhidhāne paryavasānaṃ padānām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7173_0: yatra tu vākyasyaikasya vākyāntareṇa saṃbandhastatra lokānusārato bhūtārthavyutpattau
GSP33brsvbh1u:7174: yathā 'vāyurvai kṣepiṣṭhā devatā vāyumeva svena bhāgadheyenopadhāvati sa evainaṃ bhūtiṃ gamayati vāyavyaṃ śvetamālabheta'ityatra /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7175: iha hi yadi na svādhyāyādhyāyanavidhiḥ svādhyāyaśabdavācyaṃ vedarāśiṃ puruṣārthatāmaneṣyattato bhūtārthamātraparyavasitā nārthavādā vidhyuddeśenaikavākyatāmāgamiṣyan /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7176: tasmāt svādhyāyavidhivaśātkaimarthyākāṅkṣāyāṃ vṛttāntādigocarāḥ santastatpratyāyanadvāreṇa vidheyaprāśastyaṃ lakṣayanti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7180: ata eva gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityatra gaṅgāśabdaḥ svārthasaṃbaddhabheva tīraṃ lakṣayati na tu samudratīraṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7184: ata eva yatra pramāṇāntaraviruddhārtā arthavādā dṛśyante,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7189: tasmādyatra sor'thorthavādānāṃ pramāṇāntaraviruddhastatra guṇavādena prāśastyalakṣaṇeti lakṣitalakṣaṇā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7190: yatra tu pramāṇāntarasaṃvādastatra pramāṇāntarādivārthavādādapi sor'thaḥ prasidhyati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7193: pramātā hyavyutpannaḥ prathamaṃ yathā pratyakṣādibhyor'thamavagacchati na tathāmnāyataḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7203: yathaikasminvākye padānāṃ padārthā dvārato vākyārthaśca tātparyato viṣayaḥ evaṃ vākyadvayaikavākyatāyāmapi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7208: yathā viṣaṃ bhakṣayeti vākyaṃ mā asya gṛhe bhuṅkṣveti vākyāntarārthaparaṃ sat /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7209: yatra tu tātparyaṃ tatra mānāntaravirodhe pauruṣeyapramāṇameva bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7211: na ca 'ādityo vai yūpaḥ'iti vākyamādityasya yūpatvapratipādanaparamapi tu yūpastutiparam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7215: tatra dvārato 'pi viṣayaḥ pratīyamāno na śakyastyaktum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7218: tathā satyanadhigataṃ vigrahādi pratipādayat vākyaṃ bhidyeteti cet addhā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7223: naca yasya yatra na tātparyaṃ tasya tatrāprāmāṇyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7225: sati viśiṣṭaparaṃ vākyaṃ viśeṣaṇeṣvapramāṇamiti viśiṣṭaparamapi na syāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7229: tasmādviśiṣṭapratyayaparebhyo 'pi viśeṣaṇāni pratīyamānāni tasyaiva vākyasya viṣayatvenānicchatāpyabhyupeyāni yathā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7230: tadyānyaparebhyo 'pyarthavādavākyebhyo devatāvigrahādayaḥ pratīyamānā asati pramāṇāntaravirodhe na yuktāstyaktum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7239: sa tu padārthāntaraviśiṣṭaḥ padārtha ekaḥ kvacid dvārabhūtaḥ kvacid dvārītyetāvān viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7240: nanvevaṃ sati odanaṃ bhuktvā grāmaṃ gacchatītyatrāpi vākyabhedaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7245: bhuktveti hi samānakartṛkatā pūrvakālatā ca pratīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7247: tasmādyāvati padasamūhe padāhitāḥ padārthasmṛtayaḥ paryavasanti tāvadekaṃ vākyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7248: arthavādavākye caitāḥ paryavasyanti vinaiva vidhivākyaṃ viśiṣṭārthapratīteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7249: na ca dvābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ padābhyāṃ viśiṣṭārthapratyayaparyavasānāt pañcaṣaṭpadavati vākye ekasminnānātvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7253: tasmādvidhivākyādarthavādavākyamanyaditi vākyayoreva svasvavākyārthapratyayāvasitavyāpārayoḥ paścātkutaścidapekṣāyāṃ parasparānvaya iti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7255: devatāmuddiśya haviravamṛśya ca tadviṣayasvatvatyāga iti yāgaśarīram /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7257: naca rūparahitā cetasi śakyata ālekhitumiti yāgavidhinaiva tadrūpāpekṣiṇā yādṛśamanyaparebhyo 'pi mantrārthavādebhyastadrūpamavagataṃ tadabhyupeyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7260_0: yathā hi 'vrātyo vrātyastomena yajate'iti vrātyasvarūpāpekṣāyāṃ yasya pitā pitāmaho
GSP33brsvbh1u:7260_1: vā somaṃ na pibet sa vrātya iti vrātyasvarūpamavagataṃ vrātyastomavidhyapekṣitaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:7265: devatāyāḥ samāropeṇāpi ca rūpajñānamupapadyata iti samāropitameva rūpaṃ devatāyā mantrārthavādairucyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7268: tasya tu rūpasyāsati bādhake 'nubhavārūḍhaṃ tathābhāvaṃ parityajyānyathātvamananubhūyamānamasāṃprataṃ kalpayitum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7276: api tu itihāsapurāṇalokasmaraṇebhyo mantrārthavādamūlebhyo vā pratyakṣādamūlebhyo vetyāha-itihāseti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7279: tadevaṃ mantrārthavādādisiddhe devatāvigrahādau gurvādipūjāvaddevatāpūjātmako yāgo devatāprasādādidvāreṇa saphalo 'vakalpate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7281: na caivaṃ yajñakarmaṇo devatāṃ prati guṇabhāvāddevatātaḥ phalotpāde yāgabhāvanāyāḥ śrutaṃ phalavattvaṃ yāgasya ca tāṃ prati tatphalāṃśaṃ vā prati śrutaṃ karaṇatvaṃ hātavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7285: tasmātkarmaṇo 'pūrvāvāntaravyāpārasya vā devatāprasādāvāntaravyāpārasya vā phalavattvāt pradhānatvamubhayasminnapi pakṣe samānaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7286: natu devatāyā vigrahādimatyāḥ prādhānyamiti na dharmamīmāṃsāyāḥ sūtram-'api vā śabdapūrvatvādyajñakarma pradhānaṃ guṇatve devatāśrutiḥ'iti virudhyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7290: śugasya tadanādaraśravaṇāt tadādravaṇāt sūcyate hi / BBs_1,3.34 /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7294: nirmṛṣṭanikhiladuḥkhānuṣaṅge śāśvatika ānande kasya nāma cetanasyārthitā nāsti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7297: dvividhaṃ hi sāmarthyaṃ nijaṃ cāgantukaṃ ca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7305: naca tathā brahmavidyāyāmalaukikamasti sādhanaṃ yacchūdrasya na syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7319: nahi yathā juhvādi avyabhicāritakratusaṃbaddhamevaṃ svādhyāya iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7324: tadupāye 'pi hi vidhitaḥ prāk sāmānyarūpā pravṛttiḥ puruṣecchānibandhanaiva /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7328: kraturiti hi vidhiviṣayeṇa vidhiṃ parāmṛśati viṣayiṇam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7330: na cādhyayanaṃ vā svādhyāyo vā tadarthajñānaṃ vā prāgvidheḥ puruṣecchādhīnapravṛttiḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7335: tathā cādhyayanavidheraniyāmakatvācchūdrasyādhyayanena vā pustakādipāṭhena vā sāmarthyamastīti so 'pi brahmavidyāyāmadhikriyeta /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7338: 'aha hāretvā śūdra'iti śūdraṃ saṃbodhya tasyāḥ pravṛtteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7341: tasmādyathānadhīyānasyeṣṭau niṣādasthapateradhikāro vacanasāmarthyādevaṃ saṃvargavidyāyāṃ śūdrasyādhikāro bhaviṣyatīti prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7347: suvarṇaṃ bhāryamitivadārthavādikaṃ vā phalaṃ kalpayitvā viniyogabhaṅgena svādhyāyenādhīyītetyevamarthaḥ kalpatāṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7349: na dṛṣṭadvāreṇa paramparayāpyanyato 'pekṣitapratilambhe ca yathāśrutiviniyogopapattau ca saṃbhavantyāṃ śrutiviniyogabhaṅgenādhyayanādevāśrutādṛṣṭaphalakalpanocitā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7353: natu suvarṇadhāraṇādau dṛṣṭadvāreṇa kiñcit paramparayāpyastyapekṣitaṃ puruṣasya,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7355_1: iti sthāpitaṃ tadā yasyādhyayanaṃ tasyaiva karmabrahmāvabodho 'bhyudayaniḥśreyasaprayojano nānyasya,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7357_1: śūdrāṇāṃ na phalāya kalpata iti śāstrīyasāmarthyābhāvānna śūdro brahmavidyāyāmadhikriyata iti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7369: sa cānyataḥ siddhamarthavadyotayati na tu prāpayatītyadhvaramīmāṃsakāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7370: asmākaṃ tu anyaparādapi vākyādasati bādhake pramāṇāntareṇārthāvagamyamāno vidhinā cāpekṣitaḥ svīkriyata eva /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7374: vidhyuddeśagatatve tvayaṃ nyāyo 'podyate vacanabalānniṣādasthapativanna tveṣa vidhyuddeśagata ityuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7376: apica kimarthavādabalādvidyāmātre 'dhikāraḥ śūdrasya kalpate saṃvargavidyāyāṃ vā na tāvadvidyāmātra ityāha-kāmaṃ cāyamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7378: astu tarhi saṃvargavidyāyāmeva śūdrasyādhikāra ityata āha-arthavādasthatvāditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7381: tulyaṃ hi sāṃpradāyikamityata āha-śakyate cāyaṃ śūdraśabda iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7382: evaṃ kilātropākhyāyate-jānaśrutiḥ pautrāyaṇo bahudāyī śraddhādeyo bahupākyaḥ priyātithirbabhūva /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7383: sa ca teṣu teṣu grāmanagaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu vividhānāmannapānānāṃ pūrṇānatithibhya āvasathān kārayāmāsa /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7385: athāsya rājño dānaśauṇḍasya guṇagarimasaṃtoṣitāḥ santo devarṣayo haṃsarūpamāsthāya tadanugrahāya tasya nidādhasamaye doṣā harmyatalasthasyopari mālāmābadhyājagmuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7386: teṣāmagresaraṃ haṃsaṃ saṃbodhya pṛṣṭhataḥ patannekatamo haṃsaḥ sādbhutamabhyuvāda /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7388: jānaśruterasya pautrāyaṇasya dyuniśaṃ dyuloka āyataṃ jyotistanmā prasāṅkṣīrmaitattvā dhākṣīditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7394: yasmādayaṃ varākastasmātkamenaṃ kiṃbhūtametaṃ santaṃ prāṇimātraṃ raikvamiva sayugvānamāttha /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7395: yugvā gantrī śakaṭī tayā saha vartatā iti sa yugvā raikvastamiva kamenaṃ prāṇimātraṃ jānaśrutimāttha /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7397_0: tasya hi bhagavataḥ puṇyajñānasaṃbhārasaṃbhṛtasya raikvasya brahmavido dharme trailokyodaravartiprāṇabhṛnmātradharmo
GSP33brsvbh1u:7398_1: jānaśrutiḥ kitava ivākṣaparājitaḥ paunaḥpunyena niḥśvasannudvelaṃ kathaṃ kathamapi
GSP33brsvbh1u:7399: tato niśāvasānapiśunamanibhṛtavandāruvṛndaprārabdhastutisahasrasaṃvalitaṃ maṅgalatūryanirghoṣamākarṇya talpatalastha eva rājā ekapade yantāramāhūyādideśa,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7401: raikvāhvayaṃ brahmavidamekaratiṃ sayugvānamativivikteṣu teṣu teṣu vepinanaganikuñjanadīpulinādipradeśeṣvanviṣya prayatnato 'smabhyamācakṣveti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7402: sa ca tatra tatrānviṣyan kvacidativivekte deśe śakaṭasyādhastāt pāmānaṃ kaṇḍūyamānaṃ brāhmaṇāyanamadrākṣīt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7403: taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā raikvo 'yaṃ bhaviteti pratibhāvānupaviśya savinayamaprākṣīt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7406: tasya ca raikvabhāvānumatiṃ ca taistairiṅgitairgārhasthyecchāṃ dhanāyāṃ connīya yantā rājñe nivedayāmāsa /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7407: rājā tu taṃ niśamya gavāṃ ṣaṭśatāni niṣkaṃ ca hāraṃ cāśvatarīrathaṃ cādāya satvaraṃ raikvaṃ praticakrame /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7409: hai raikva, gavāṃ ṣaṭśatānīmāni niṣkaśca hāra ścāyamaśvatarīrathaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7412: tamevamuktavantaṃ prati sāṭopaṃ ca saspṛhaṃ covāca raikvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7416: hāreṇa yuktā itvā gantrī ratho hāretvā sa gobhiḥ saha tavaivāstu,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7417: kimetanmātreṇa mama dhanenākalpavartino gārhasthyasya nirvāhānupayogineti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7418: āharetveti tu pāṭhonarthakatayā ca gobhiḥ sahetyatra pratisaṃbandhyanupādānena cācāryairdūṣitaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7419: tadasyāmākhyāyikāyāṃ śakyaḥ śūdraśabdena jānaśrutī rājanyo 'pyavayavavyutpattyā vaktum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7420: sa hi raikvaḥ parokṣajñatāṃ cikhyāpayiṣurātmano jānaśruteḥ śūdreti śucaṃ sūcayāmāsa /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7421: kathaṃ punaḥ śūdraśabdena śugutpannā sūcyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7428: tasmāttadādravaṇāditi tacchabdena śugvā jānaśrutirvā raikvo vā parāmṛśyata ityuktam //34//
GSP33brsvbh1u:7433_0: itaśca na jātiśūdro jānaśrutiḥ yatkāraṇaṃprakaraṇanirūpaṇe kriyamāṇe kṣatriyatvamasya
GSP33brsvbh1u:7433_1: jānaśruteravagamyate caitrarathena liṅgāditi vyācakṣāṇaḥ prakaraṇaṃ nirūpayati-uttaratra
GSP33brsvbh1u:7434: caitrarathenābhipratāriṇā niścitakṣatriyatvena samānāyāṃ saṃvargavidyāyāṃ samabhivyāhārālliṅgātsaṃdigdhakṣatriyabhāvo jānaśrutiḥ kṣatriyo niścīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7435: 'atha ha śaunakaṃ ca kāpeyamabhipratāriṇaṃ ca kākṣaseniṃ sūdena pariviṣyamāṇau brahmacārī bibhikṣe'iti prasiddhayājakatvena kāpeyenābhipratāriṇo yogaḥ pratīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7442: etena vai citrarathaṃ kāpeyā ayājayannitichandogānāṃ dvirātre śrūyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7444: eṣa cābhipratāri citrarathādanyaḥ sanneva kāpeyānāṃ yājyo bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7445: yadi caitrarathiḥ syāt samānānvayānāṃ hi prāyeṇa samānānvayā yājakā bhavanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7449: kṣattṛpreṣaṇe cārthasaṃbhave ca tādṛśasya vadānyapraṣṭhasyaiśvaryaṃ prāyeṇa kṣatriyasya dṛṣṭaṃ yudhiṣṭhirādivaditi //35//
GSP33brsvbh1u:7454: na kevalamupanītādhyayanavidhiparāmarśena na śūdrasyādhikāraḥ kintu teṣu teṣu vidyopadeśeṣūpanayanasaṃskāraparāmarśāt śūdrasya tadabhāvābhidhānādbrahmavidyāyāmanadhikāra iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7458: tacca dvijātīnāmiti dvijātaya eva niṣiddhopanayanā adhikriyante na śūdra iti //36//
GSP33brsvbh1u:7463: satyakāmo ha vai jābālaḥ pramītapitṛkaḥ svāṃ mātaraṃ jabālāṃ papraccha,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7472: sa hovāca, nāvijñātagotra upanīyata iti kiṅgotro 'sīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7473: athovāca satyakāmo nāhaṃ veda svaṃ gotraṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7478: tenāsminna śūdratvasaṃbhāvanāstīti tvāṃ dvijātijanmānamupaneṣya ityupanetamanuśāsituṃ ca jābālaṃ gautamaḥ pravṛttaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7492: prāṇavajraśrutibalādvākyaṃ prakaraṇaṃ ca bhaṅktvā vāyuḥ pañcavṛttirādhyātmiko bāhyaścātra pratipādyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7496: vāyureva hi bāhyo dhūmajyotiḥsalilasaṃvalitaḥ parjanyabhāvena pariṇato vidyutstanayitnuvṛṣṭyaśanibhāvena vivartate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7497: yadyapi ca sarvaṃ jagaditi savāyukaṃ pratīyate tathāpi sarvaśabda āpekṣiko 'pi na svābhidheyaṃ jahāti kintu saṃkucadvṛttirbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7501: amṛtaśabdo 'pi maraṇābhāvavacano na sārvakālikaṃ tadabhāvaṃ brūte,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7508: brahmaṇohi bibhyadetajjagatkṛtsnaṃ svavyāpāre niyamena pravartate na tu maryādāmativartate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7515: yatkhalu pṛṣṭaṃ tadeva pradhānaṃ prativaktavyamiti tasya prakaraṇam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7518: 'apapunarmṛtyuṃ jayati'iti śrutyā hyapamṛtyorvijaya ukto natu paramamṛtyuvijaya ityāpekṣikatvaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7520: na kevalamapaśrutyā tadāpekṣikamapi tu paramātmānamabhidhāya 'ato 'nyadārtam'iti vāyvāderārtatvābhidhānāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7535: ādityaścārcirādyapekṣayā paraṃ jyotirbhavatīti tadupasaṃpadya tasya samīpe bhūtvā svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7537: brahmajyotiḥpakṣe tu brahma bhūtvā kā parā svarūpaniṣpattiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7539: sā hi brahmabhūyātprācīnā na tu parācīnā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7541: tasmāttisṛbhiḥ śrutibhiḥ prakaraṇabādhanātteja evātra jyotiriti prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7551: natu śrutyanurodhamātreṇa prakaraṇādapakraṣṭavyā iti hi lokasthitiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7552: anyathopāṃśuyājavākye jāmitādoṣopakrame tatpratisamādhānopasaṃhāre ca tadantaḥ pātino 'viṣṇurupāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ'ityādayo vidhiśrutyanurodhena pṛthagvidhayaḥ prasajyeran /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7554: sa hi kṛtsnavidhānānna kutaścidapi hīyate kratorityahīnaḥ śakyo vaktum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7556: avayavaprasiddheḥ samudāyaprasiddhirbalīyasīti śrutyā prakaraṇabādhanānna dvādaśopasattāmahīnaguṇayukte jyotiṣṭome śaknoti vidhātum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7560_0: tenānapakṛṣṭenaiva dvādaśāhīnasyetivākyena sāhnasya tisra usapadaḥ kāryā iti vidhiṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:7560_1: stotuṃ dvādaśāhavihitā dvādaśopasattā tatprakṛtitvena ca sarvāhīneṣu prāptā nivītādivadanūdyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7561: tasmādahīnaśrutyā prakaraṇabādhe 'pi na dvādaśāhīnasyeti vākyasya prakaraṇādapakarṣa /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7564: iha tvapakṛṣṭasyārcirādimārgopadeśe phalasyopāyamārgapratipādake 'tiviśade 'eṣa saṃprasādaḥ'iti vākyasyāviśadaikadeśamātrapratipādakasya niṣprayojanatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7565: naca dvadaśāhīnasyetivadyathoktātmadhyānasādhanānuṣṭhānaṃ stotumeṣa saṃprasāda iti vacanamarcirādimārgamanuvadatīti yuktam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7572: iha tu svārthasaṃsargatātparye noktadoṣaprasaṅga iti paurvāparyālocanayā prakaraṇānurodhādrūḍhimapi pūrvakālatāmapi parityajya prakaraṇānuguṇyena jyotiḥ paraṃ brahma pratīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7576: naca kramamuktyabhiprāyaṃ svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyata iti vacanam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7578: tathā ca śrutiḥ-'na tasmāt prāṇā utkrāmanti atraiva samanīyante'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7580: arcirādimārgasya hi kāryabrahmalokaprāpakatvaṃ na tu brahmabhūyahetubhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7583: tasmānna jyotirādityamupasaṃpadya saṃprasādasya jīvasya svena rūpeṇa pāramārthikena brahmaṇābhiniṣpattirāñjasīti śruteratrāpi kleśaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7584: apica paraṃ jyotiḥ sa uttamapuruṣa itihaivopariṣṭādviśeṣaṇāttejaso vyāvartya puruṣaviṣayatvenāvasthāpanājjyotiḥpadasya,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7585: parameva brahma jyotiḥ na tu teja iti siddham //40//
GSP33brsvbh1u:7592: nāmarūpe antarā brahmeti ca nākāśasya nāmarūpayornirvahiturantarālatvamāha,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7603: bhūtākāśaṃ ca vikāratvena nāmarūpāntaḥpāti sat kathamātmānamudvahet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7604: nahi suśikṣito 'pi vijñānī svena skandhenātmānaṃ voḍhumutsahate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7605: naca nāmarūpaśrutiraviśeṣataḥ pravṛttā bhūtākāśavarjaṃ nāmarūpāntare saṃkocayituṃ sati saṃbhave yujyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7606_0: naca nirvāhakatvaṃ niraṅkuśamavagataṃ brahmaliṅgaṃ kathañcitkleśena paratantre netumucitam
GSP33brsvbh1u:7606_1: 'anena jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇi'iti ca sraṣṭṛtvamatisphuṭaṃ brahmaliṅgamatra pratīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7607: brahmarūpatayā ca jīvasya vyākartṛtve brahmaṇa eva vyākartṛtvamuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7609: tathā ca te nāmarūpe yadantaretyayamarthāntaravyapadeśa upapanno bhavatyākāśasya /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7619: tameva ca 'yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu'ityādiśrutisaṃdarbha ādimadhyāvasāneṣvāmṛśatīti tadanuvādaparo bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7622: na tu tadatiriktaḥ kaścidatra nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvaḥ pratipādyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7623: yattu suṣuptyutkrāntyoḥ prājñenātmanā saṃpariṣvakta iti bhedaṃ manyase,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7625: tena suṣuptyutkrāntyavasthāyāṃ viśeṣaviṣayābhāvātsaṃpiṇḍitaprajñena prājñenātmanā svabhāvenā pariṣvakto na kiñcidvedetyabhede 'pi bhedavadupacāreṇa yojanīyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7627: pratyādayaśca śabdāḥ saṃsāriṇyeva kāryakaraṇasaṃghātātmakasya jagato jīvakarmārjitatayā tadbhogyatayā ca yojanīyāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7628: tasmātsaṃsāryevānūdyate na tu paramātmā pratipādyata iti prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7637: naca prājñasya paramātmano jīvādbhedena saṃkīrtanaṃ sati saṃbhave rāhoḥ śira itivadaupacārikaṃ yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7638: naca prājñaśabdaḥ prajñāprakarṣaśālini nirūḍhavṛttiḥ kathañcidajñaviṣayo vyākhyātumucitaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7641: tasmātsuṣuptyutkrāntyorbhedena jīvātprājñasya paramātmano vyapadeśāt 'yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ'ityādinā jīvātmānaṃ lokasiddhamanūdya tasya paramātmabhāvo 'nanadhigataḥ pratipādyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7646: evaṃ ca mahattvaṃ cājatvaṃ ca sarvagatasya nityasyātmanaḥ saṃbhavānnāpekṣikaṃ kalpayiṣyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7663: kiñca sa evaṃbhūto hṛdyantarjyotiḥ puruṣo vijñānamayo na sādhunā karmaṇā bhūyānutkṛṣṭo bhavatītyevamādyāḥ śrutayo 'saṃsāriṇaṃ paramātmānameva pratipādayanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7664: tasmājjīvātmānaṃ mānāntarasiddhamanūdya tasya brahmabhāvapratipādanaparo 'yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ'ityādivākyasaṃdarbha iti siddham //43//
GSP33brsvbh1u:7672: ānumānikam apy ekeṣām iti cen na śarīra-rūpaka-vinyasta-gṛhīter darśayati ca / BBs_1,4.1 /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7679: gatisāmānyaṃ ca vedāntavākyānāṃ brahmakāraṇavādaṃ prati vidyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7686: tasmādanarthaka uttaraḥ saṃdarbha ityata āha-brahmajijñāsāṃ pratijñāyeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7692: evaṃ ca lakṣaṇavyabhicārādavyabhicārāya yukta uttarasaṃdarbhārambha iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7710: yathāhuḥ-'ya eva laukikāḥ śabdāsta eva vaidikāsta eva caiṣāmarthāḥ'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7723: pradhānasyākāṅkṣāvato vacanaṃ prakaraṇamiti gantavyaṃ viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ pradhānamiti tadākāṅkṣāmavatārayati-taiścendriyādibhirasaṃyatairiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7726: nanvāntaratvena yadi śreṣṭhatvaṃ tadendriyāṇāmeva bāhyebhyo gandhāhibhyaḥ śreṣṭhatvaṃ syādityata āha-arthā ye śabdādaya iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7729: grahebhyaścendriyebhyo 'tigrahatayārthānāṃ prādhānyaṃ śrutyā vivakṣitamitīndriyebhyor'thānāṃ prādhānyātparatvaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7730: ghrāṇajihvāvākcakṣuḥ śrotramanohastatvaco hi indriyāṇi śrutyāṣṭau grahā uktāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7737: grahatvenendriyaiḥ sāmye 'pi manasaḥ svagatena viśeṣeṇārthebhyaḥ paratvamāha-viṣayebyaśca manasaḥ paratvamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7745: tadevaṃ sarvāsāṃ buddhīnāṃ prathamajahiraṇyagarbhabuddhyekanīḍatayā hiraṇyagarbhabuddhermahattvaṃ cāpanādā(copādānā?)tmatvaṃ ca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7747: nanvetasminpakṣe hiraṇyagarbhabuddherātmatvānna rathina ātmano bhokturatropādānamiti na rathamātraṃ pariśiṣyate 'pi tu rathavānapītyata āha-etasmiṃstu pakṣa iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7748: yathā hi samāropitaṃ pratibimbaṃ bimbānna vastuto bhidyate tathā na paramātmano vijñānātmā vastuto bhidyata iti paramātmaiva rathavānihopāttastena rathamātraṃ pariśiṣṭamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7749: atha rathādirūpakakalpanāyāḥ śarīrādiṣu kiṃ prayojanamityata āha-śarīrendriyamanobuddhiviṣayavadenāsaṃyuktasya hīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7776: pradhānaṃ hi sāṃkhyānāṃ seśvarāṇāmanīśvarāṇāṃ veśvarāt kṣetrajñebhyo vā vastuto bhinnaṃ śakyaṃ nirvaktum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7777: brahmaṇastviyamavidyā śaktirmāyādiśabdavācyā na śakyā tattvenānyatvena vā nirvaktum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7785: yadi brahmaṇo 'vidyāśaktyā saṃsāraḥ pratīyate hanta muktānāmapi punarutpādaprasaṅgaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7787: tadvināśe vā samastasaṃsārocchedaḥ tanmūlavidyāśakteḥ samucchedādityata āha-muktānāṃ ca punaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7794: tena yasyaiva jīvasya vidyotpannā tasyaivāvidyāpanīyate na jīvāntarasya,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7798: pradhānasyaikatvena taducchede sarvocchedo 'nucchede vā na kasyacidityanirmokṣaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7802: na cāvidyopādhibhedādhīno jīvabhedo jīvabhedādhīnaścāvidyopādhibheda iti parasparāśrayādubhayāsiddhiriti sāṃpratam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7806: nahyacetanaṃ cetanānadhiṣṭhitaṃ kāryāya paryāptamiti svakāryaṃ kartuṃ parameśvaraṃ nimittatayopādānatayā vāśraye,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7808: tena yathāhivibhramo rajjūpādāna evaṃ prapañcavibhrama īśvaropādānaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7812: ata evāha-yasyāṃ svarūpapratibodharahitāḥ śerate saṃsāriṇo jīvā iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7818: yadyapi jīvāvyaktayoranāditvenāniyataṃ paurvāparyaṃ tathāpyavyaktasya pūrvatvaṃ vivakṣitvaitaduktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7839: etaddhi dṛṣṭabībhatsatayā sukaraṃ vairāgyaviṣayatvena śodhayitumityata āha-na caivaṃ mantavyamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7840: viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padamavagamayituṃ paraṃ paramatra pratipādyatvena prastutaṃ na tu vairāgyāya śodhanamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7843: tathāpi na sāṃkhyābhimatamatra pradhānaṃ paramityabhyupetyāha-sarvathāpi tviti //3//
GSP33brsvbh1u:7849: sāṃkhyaiḥ khalu pradhānādvivekena puruṣaṃ niḥśreyasāya jñātuṃ vā vibhūtyai vā pradhānaṃ jñeyatvenopakṣipyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7850: na ceha jānīyāditi copāsīteti vā vidhivibhaktiśrutirasti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7856: vadatīti cen na prājño hi prakaraṇāt / BBs_1,4.5 /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7861: trayāṇām eva caivam upanyāsaḥ praśnaś ca / BBs_1,4.6 /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7863: varapradānopakramā hi mṛtyunaciketaḥ saṃvādavākyapravṛttirāsamāpteḥ kaṭhavallīnāṃ lakṣyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7864: mṛtyuḥ kila na ciketase kupitena pitrā prahitāya tuṣṭastrīnvarān pradadau /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7865: naciketāstu pathamena vareṇa pituḥ saumanasyaṃ vavre,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7869: nanu tatra varapradāne pradhānagocare staḥ praśnaprativacane /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7871: 'hantaḥ ta idaṃ pravakṣyāmi guhyaṃ brahma sanātanam'ityanena vyavahitaṃ jīvaviṣayaṃ 'yathā tu maraṇaṃ prāpyātmā bhavati gautama'ityādiprativacanamiti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7873: kiṃ vānyo jīvasya 'yeyaṃ prete'manuṣya iti praśnaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7878: varapradānānantarbhāve praśnasya tadvat pradhānākhyānamapyanantarbhūtaṃ varapradāne 'stu 'mahataḥ paramavyakta'mityākṣepaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7884: vāstavaśca jīvaparamātmanorabhedastatra tatra śrutyupanyāsena bhagavatā bhāṣyakāreṇa darśitaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7886_0: 'yeyaṃ prete'iti hi naciketasaḥ praśnamupaśrutya tattatkāmaviṣayamalobhaṃ cāsya pratītya
GSP33brsvbh1u:7886_1: mṛtyuḥ 'vidyābhīpsinaṃ naciketasaṃ manye'ityādinā naciketasaṃ praśasya praśnamapi
GSP33brsvbh1u:7890: apica yadviṣayaṃ praśnamupaśrutya mṛtyunaiṣa praśaṃsito naciketāḥ yadi tameva bhūyaḥ pṛcchettaduttare cāvadadhyāt tataḥ praśaṃsā dṛṣṭārthā syāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7900: puruṣārthakriyākṣamaṃ sattasya bhāvaḥ sattā tanmātraṃ mahattattvamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7901: yā yā puruṣārthakriyā śabdādyupabhogalakṣaṇā ca sattvapuruṣānyatākhyātilakṣaṇā ca sā sarvā mahati buddhau samāpyata iti mahattattvaṃ sattāmātramucyata iti //7//
GSP33brsvbh1u:7906: ajāśabdo yadyapi chāgāyāṃ rūḍhastathāpyadhyātmavidyādhikārānna tatra kartitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7908: tatra kiṃ svatantraṃ pradhānamanena mantravarṇenānūdyatāmuta pārameśvarī māyāśaktistejo 'bannavyākriyākāraṇamucyatām kiṃ tāvatprāptaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7910: tathāhi-yādṛśaṃ pradhānaṃ sāṃkhyaiḥ smaryate tādṛśamevāsminnanyūnānatiriktaṃ pratīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7911: sā hi pradhānalakṣaṇā prakṛtirna jāyata ityajā ca ekā ca lohitaśuklakṛṣṇā ca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7912: yadyapi lohitatvādayo varṇā na rajaḥprabhṛtiṣu santi,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7923: 'ajo hyeko juṣamāṇo 'nuśete jahātyenāṃ bhuktabhogāmajo 'nyaḥ'iti tvātmabhedaśravaṇāt sāṃkhyasmṛterevātra mantravarṇe pratyabhijñānaṃ na tvavyākṛtaprakriyāyāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7927: avayavāḥ pradhānasyaikasya sattvarajastamāṃsi teṣāṃ dharmā lohitatvādayastairiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7942: viṣayā hi śabdādayaḥ prakṛtivikārastraiguṇyena sukhaduḥkhamohātmāna indriyamano 'haṅkārapraṇālikayā buddhisattvamupasaṃkrāmanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7943: tena tadbuddhisattvaṃ pradhānavikāraḥ sukhaduḥkhamohātmakaṃ śabdādirūpeṇa pariṇamate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7944: citiśaktistvapariṇāminyapratisaṃkramāpi buddhisattvādātmano vivekamabudhyamānā buddhivṛttyaiva viparyāsenāvidyayā buddhisthānsukhādīnātmanyabhimanyamānā sukhādimatīva bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7953_0: evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate-na tāvat 'ajo hyeko juṣamāṇo 'nuśete jahātyenāṃ bhuktabhogāmajo
GSP33brsvbh1u:7954: sa cānūdito bhedaḥ 'eko devaḥ sarvabhūteṣu gūḍhaḥ sarvavyāpī sarvabhūtāntarātmā'ityādiśrutibhirātmaikatvapratipādanaparābhirvirodhātkalpaniko 'vatiṣṭhate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7955: tathāca na sāṃkhyaprakriyāpratyabhijñānamityajāvākyaṃ camasavākyavatpariplavamānaṃ na svatantrapradhānaniścayāya paryāptam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7961: jyotirupakramā tu tathā hy adhīyata eke / BBs_1,4.9 /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7963: sarvaśākhāpratyayamekaṃ brahmeti sthitau śākhāntaroktarohitādiguṇayoginī tejo 'bannalakṣaṇā jarāyujāṇḍajasvedajadbhijjacaturvidhabhūtagrāmaprakṛtibhūteyamajā pratipattavyā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7969: ajāpadasya ca samudāyaprasiddhiparityāgena na jāyata ityavayavaprasiddhyāśrayaṇe doṣaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7971: api cāyamapi śrutikalāpo 'smaddarśanānuguṇo na sāṃkhyasmṛtyanuguṇa ityāha-tathehāpīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7975: yathāhuḥ-'puruṣasya tu śuddhasya nāśuddhā vikṛtirbhavet'ityāśayavatīva śrutiḥ pṛcchati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7978: te brahmavido dhyānayogenātmānaṃ gatāḥ prāptā apaśyanniti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7991: nanu kiṃ chāgā lohitaśuklakṛṣṇaivānyādṛśīnāmapi chāgānāmupalambhādityata āha-yadṛcchayeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7996: na saṃkhyopasaṃgrahād api nānābhāvād atirekāc ca / BBs_1,4.11 /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7999: pañcajanā iti hi samāsārthaḥ pañcasaṃkhyayā saṃbadhyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8000: naca 'diksaṃkhye saṃjñāyām'iti samāsavidhānānmanujeṣu nirūḍho 'yaṃ pañcajanaśabda iti vācyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8002: evaṃ cātmani pañcamanujānāmākāśasya ca pratiṣṭhānamiti nistātparyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8006: tatrāpi kiṃ pañca prāṇādayo vākyaśeṣagatā vivakṣyante uta tadatiriktā anya eva vā kecit /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8013: tasmātkānicideva tattvānīha pañca pratyekaṃ pañcasaṃkhyāyogīni pañcaviṃśatitattvāni bhavanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8015: pañcaviṃśatitattvāni smaryanta iti tānyevānena mantreṇocyanta iti nāśabdaṃ pradhānādi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8016: na cādhāratvenātmano vyavasthānātsvātmani cādhārādheyabhāvasya virodhāt ākāśasya ca vyatirecanāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8017: trayoviṃśatirjanā iti syānna pañca pañcajanā iti vācyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8019: tathāca satyātmākāśābhyāṃ saptaviṃśatisaṃkhyāyāṃ pañcaviṃśatitattvānīti svasiddhāntavyākopa iti cet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8035: yadyapi pṛthivyādayo goghaṭādīnāṃ prakṛtistathāpi na te pṛthivyādibhyastattvāntaramiti na prakṛtiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8038: evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate -na saṃkhyopasaṃgrahādapi pradhānādīnāṃ śrutimattvāśaṅkā kartavyā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8042: na khalu sattvarajastamomahadahaṅkārāṇāmekaḥ kriyā vā guṇo vā dravyaṃ vā jātirvā dharmaḥ pañcatanmātrādibhyo vyāvṛttaḥ sattvādiṣu cānugataḥ kaścidasti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8048_0: yadyapi parasyāṃ saṃkhyāyāmavāntarasaṃkhyā dvitvādikā nāsti tathāpi tatpūrvaṃ tasyāḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:8049: naca pañcaśabdo janaśabdena samasto 'samastaḥ śakyo vaktumityāha-paraścātra pañcaśabda iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8051: api ca vīpsāyāṃ pañcakadvayagrahaṇe daśaiva tattvānīti na sāṃkhyasmṛtipratyabhijñānamityasamāsamabhyupetyāha-na ca pañcakadvayagrahaṇaṃ pañca pañceti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8052: na caikā pañcasaṃkhyā pañcasaṃkhyāntareṇa śakyā viśeṣṭum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8053: pañcaśabdasya saṃkhyopasarjanadravyavacanatvena saṃkhyāyā upasarjanatayā viśeṣaṇenāsaṃyogādityāha-ekasyāḥ pañcasaṃkhyāyā iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8055: atra tāvadrūḍhau satyāṃ na yogaḥ saṃbhavatīti vakṣyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8057_1: samudāyino 'vacchinatti na samudāyaṃ samāsapadagamyamatastasmin kati te samudāyā
GSP33brsvbh1u:8058: pañcajanā ityatra tu pañcasaṃkhyayotpattiśiṣṭayā janānāmavacchinnatvātsamudāyasya ca pañcapūlīvadatrāpratīterna padāntarābhihitā saṃkhyā saṃbadhyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8064: nahyupasarjanaṃ viśeṣaṇena yujyate pañcaśabda eva tāvatsaṃkhyeyopasarjanasaṃkhyāmāha viśeṣatastu pañcajanā ityatra samāse /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8067: nahi bhavati ṛddhasya rājapuruṣa iti samāso 'pi tu (pada)
GSP33brsvbh1u:8072: yadi sattvarajastamāṃsi pradhānenaikīkṛtyātmākāśau tattvebhyo vyatiricyete tadā siddhāntavyākopaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8073: atha tu sattvarajastamāṃsi mitho bhedena vivakṣyante tathāpi vastutattvavyavasthāpane ādhāratvenātmā niṣkṛṣyatām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8080: tadyadi rūḍhau mukhyor'thaḥ prāpyate tataḥ sa eva grahītavyo 'tha tvasau na vākye saṃbandhārhaḥ pūrvāparavākyavirodhī vā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8082: yathā 'śyenenābhicaran yajeta'iti śyenaśabdaḥ śakuniviśeṣe nirūḍhavṛttistadaparityāgenaiva nipatyādānasādṛśyenārthavādikena kratuviśeṣe vartate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8084: yathā saptarṣiśabdo vasiṣṭha ekasmin saptasu ca vartate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8087: rūḍhau satyāṃ pcaviṃśatereva saṃkhyāyā abhāvātkathaṃ tattveṣu vartate //11//
GSP33brsvbh1u:8090: evaṃ ca ke te pañcajanā ityapekṣāyāṃ kiṃ vākyaśeṣagatāḥ prāṇādayo gṛhyantāmuta pañcaviṃśatistattvānīti viśaye tattvānāmaprāmāṇikatvāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8091: prāṇādīnāṃ ca vākyaśeṣe śravaṇāttatparityāge śrutahānyaśrutakalpanāprasaṅgātprāṇādaya eva pañcajanāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8092: naca kāṇḍavamādhyandinayorvirodhānna prāṇādīnāṃ vākyaśeṣagatānāmapi grahaṇamiti sāṃpratam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8100: tasya kathaṃ prāṇādiṣvajaneṣu prayoga iti vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8101: anyathā tu pratyastamitāvayavārthe samudāyaśabdārthe janaśabdārtho nāstītyaparyanuyoga eva /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8107: samāsabalāccedrūḍhirāsthīyate hanta na dṛṣṭastarhi tasya prayogo 'śvakarṇādivadvṛkṣādiṣu /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8109_0: janeṣu tāvatpañcajanaśabdaśca prathamaḥ prayogo lokeṣu dṛṣṭa ityasati prathamaprayoga
GSP33brsvbh1u:8122: bhavitā hi tasyāḥ sthānamavirodhalakṣaṇamityata āha-pratipāditaṃ brahmaṇa iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8123_0: ayamarthaḥ nānekaśākhāgatatattadvākyālocanayā vākyārthāvagame paryavasite sati pramāṇāntaravirodhena
GSP33brsvbh1u:8124: prāsaṅgikaṃ tu tatra sṛṣṭiviṣayāṇāṃ vākyānāṃ parasparamavirodhapratipādanaṃ na tu lakṣaṇārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8126: iha tu-vākyānāṃ sṛṣṭipratipādakānāṃ parasparavirodhe brahmaṇi jagadyonau na samanvayaḥ seddhumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8130: tasmādvākyānāṃ virodhāvirodhābhyāmuktārthākṣepasamādhānābhyāṃ samanvayaḥ evopapādyata iti samanvayalakṣaṇe saṃgatamidamadhikaraṇam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8138: sṛṣṭyā ca kāryeṇa tatkāraṇatayā brahma lakṣitam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8139: sṛṣṭivipratipattau tatkāraṇatāyāṃ brahmalakṣaṇe vipratipattau satyāṃ bhavati tallakṣye brahmaṇyapi vipratipattiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8141: vedāntāstu kartrādipratipādanena karmavidhiparatayopacaritārthā avivakṣitārthā vā japopayogina iti prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8144: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-'sargakramavivāde 'pi na sa sṛṣṭari vidyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8153: tadasya devadattasya sarvatraitāsmin kartṛtvācchakyaṃ vaktuṃ devadattāccakrādi saṃbhūtaṃ tasmāccakrādeḥ kumbhādīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8155: nahyastyasaṃbhavaḥ sarvatrāsmin kāryajāte kramavatyapi devadattasya sākṣātkarturanusyūtatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8156: tathehāpi yadyapyākāśādikrameṇaiva sṛṣṭistathāpyākāśānalānilādau tatra tatra sākṣāt parameśvarasya kartṛtvācchakyaṃ vaktuṃ parameśvarādākāśaḥ saṃbhūta iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8157: śakyaṃ ca vaktuṃ parameśvarādanalaḥ saṃbhūta ityādi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8158: yadi tvākāśādvāyurvāyosteja ityuktvā tejaso vāyurvāyorākāśa iti brūyādbhavedvirodhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8162: eṣā hi svavyāpāramabhidhānakrameṇa kurvatī nābhidheyānāṃ kramaṃ niruṇaddhi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8163: te tu yathākramāvasthitā evākrameṇocyante-yathā kramavanti jñānāni jānātīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8168: naca sṛṣṭivigānaṃ sraṣṭari tadadhīnanirūpaṇe vigānamāvahatīti vācyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8169: nahyeṣa sraṣṭṛtvamātreṇocyate 'pi tu 'satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma'ityādinā rūpeṇocyate sraṣṭā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8174: tena 'phalavatsaṃnidhāvaphalaṃ tadaṅgam'iti sṛṣṭivijñānaṃ sraṣṭṛbrahmavijñānāṅgaṃ tadanuguṇaṃ sadbrahmajñānāvatāropāyatayā vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8181: tadapi 'tadapyeṣa śloko bhavati'iti pūrvaprakṛtaṃ sadbrahmaṇākṛṣya 'asadevedamatra āsīt'ityucyamānaṃ tvasato 'bhidhāne 'saṃbaddhaṃ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8184: 'taddhaika āhurasadevedamatra āsīt'iti tu nirākāryatayopanyastamiti na kāraṇe vivāda iti sūtre caśabdastvarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8186: ākāśādiṣu sṛjyamāneṣu kramavigāne 'pi na sraṣṭari vigānam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8188: yathaikasyāṃ śrutau vyapadiṣṭaḥ parameśvaraḥ sarvasya kartā tathaiva śrutyantareṣūkteḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8191: aparaḥ kalpo yathā vyapadiṣṭaḥ krama ākāśādiṣu,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8193: tasyaiva kramasyānapabādhanena 'tattejo 'sṛjata'ityādikāyā api sṛṣṭerukterna sṛṣṭāvapi vigānam //14//
GSP33brsvbh1u:8203: vyākriyata iti ca karmakartari karmaṇi vā rūpaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8205: nahi lūyate kedāraḥ svayameveti vā lūyate kedāra iti vā lavitāraṃ devadattādiṃ pratikṣipati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8213: upasaṃhāre ca 'sarvān pāpmano 'pahatya sarveṣāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ śraiṣṭhyaṃ svārājyaṃ paryeti ya evaṃ veda'iti niratiśayaphalaśravaṇādbrahmavedanādanyatra tadasaṃbhavāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8214: ādityacandrādigatapuruṣakartṛtvasya ca 'yasya vaitatkarma'iti cāsyāsatyavacchede sarvanāmnā pratyakṣasiddhasya jagataḥ parāmarśena,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8216: ucyate-brahma te bravāṇīti bālākinā gārgyeṇa brahmābhidhānaṃ pratijñāya tattadādityādigatābrahmapuruṣābhidhānena na tāvadbrahmoktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8218: 'yo vai bālāke eteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ kartā yasya vaitatkarma'iti vākyaṃ na tena brahmābhidhānaṃ pratijñātam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8222: kārye tu kriyata iti vyutpattyā vartate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8225: vākyaśeṣe ca 'athāsmin prāṇa evaikadhā bhavati'iti śravaṇātparispandalakṣaṇasya ca karmaṇo yatropapattiḥ sa eva veditavyatayopadiśyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8229: upakramānurodhena copasaṃhāre sarvaśabdaḥ sarvān pāpmana iti ca sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāmiti cāpekṣikavṛttirbahūn pāpmano bahūnāṃ bhūtānāmityevaṃparo draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8231: yadi tu dṛptabālākimabrahmaṇi brahmābhidhāyinamapodyājātaśatrorvacanaṃ brahmaviṣayamevānyathā tu taduktādviśeṣaṃ vivakṣorabrahmābhidhānamasaṃbaddhaṃ syāditi manyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8234_0: yatkāraṇaṃ veditavyatayopanyastasya puruṣāṇāṃ karturvedanāyopetaṃ bālakiṃ prati bubodhayiṣurajātaśatruḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:8234_2: yaṣṭighātotthānāt prāṇādivyatiriktaṃ jīvaṃ bhoktāraṃ svāminaṃ pratibodhayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8235: parastādapi 'tadyathā śreṣṭhī svairbhuṅkte yathā vā svāḥ śreṣṭhinaṃ bhuñjantyevamevaiṣa prajñātmaitairātmabhirbhuṅkte evamevaita ātmāna enamātmānaṃ bhuñjanti'iti śravaṇāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8236: yathā śreṣṭhī pradhānaḥ puruṣaḥ svairbhṛtyaiḥ karaṇabhūtairviṣayān bhuṅkte,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8237: yathā vā svā bhṛtyāḥ śreṣṭhinaṃ bhuñjanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8240: te hyādityādaya ālokavṛṣṭyādinā sācivyamācaranto jīvātmānaṃ bhojayanti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8249: ye ca praśnaprativacane-'kvaiṣa etad bālāke puruṣo 'śayiṣṭa yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ na kañcana paśyati'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8252: tasmājjīvaprāṇayoranyatara iha grāhyo na raparameśvara iti prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8255: 'yathā hi kenacinmaṇilakṣaṇajñamāninā kāce maṇireva veditavya ityukte parasya kāco 'yaṃ maṇirna tallakṣaṇāyogādityabhidhāya ātmano viśeṣaṃ jijñāpayiṣostattvābhidhānamasaṃbaddham /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8256: amaṇau maṇyabhidhānaṃ na pūrvavādino viśeṣamāpādayati svayamapi mṛṣābhidhānāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8258: evamajātaśatruṇā dṛptabālākerabrahmavādino viśeṣamātmano darśayatā jīvaprāṇābhidhāne asaṃbaddhamuktaṃ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8264: sarvān pāpmano 'pahatya sarveṣāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ śraiṣṭhyaṃ svarājyaṃ paryeti ya evaṃ veda'iti ca sati saṃbhave sarvaśruterasaṃkocānniratiśayena phalenopasaṃhārāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8266: ādityādipuruṣakartṛtvasya ca svātantryalakṣaṇasya mukhyasya brahmaṇyeva saṃbhavādanyeṣāṃ hiraṇyagarbhādīnāṃ tatpāratantryāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8267_1: na kañcana paśyatyathāsmin prāṇa evaikadhā bhavati'ityāderuttarasya ca brahmaṇyevopapatterbrahmaviṣayatvaṃ niścīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8268: atha kasmānna bhavato hiraṇyagarbhagocare eva praśnottare,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8269: tathā ca naitābhyāṃ brahmaviṣayatvasiddhirityetannirācikīrṣuḥ paṭhati-etasmādātmanaḥ prāṇā yathā yathāyatanaṃ pratiṣṭhanta iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8271: yadyapi ca jīvo nātmano bhidyate tathāpyupādhyavacchinnasya paramātmano jīvatvenopādhibhedādbhedamāropyādhārādheyabhāvo draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8272: evaṃ ca jīvabhavanādhāratvamapādānatvaṃ ca paramātmana upapannam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8273: tadevaṃ bālākyajātaśatrusaṃvādavākyasaṃdarbhasya brahmaparatve sthite yasya vaitatkarmaiti vyāpārābhidhāne na saṃgacchata iti karmaśabdaḥ kāryābhidhāyī bhavati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8277: na cādityādipuruṣāḥ saṃnihitā api parāmarśārhāḥ bahutvāt puṃliṅgatvācca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8278: etaditi caikasya napuṃsakasyābhidhānāt 'eteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ kartā'ityanenaiva gatārthatvācca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8282: kintu kṛtsnameva jagadyasya kāryamiti vāśabdena sūcyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8293: nirdiśyantāṃ puruṣāḥ kāryāstadviṣayā tu kṛtiranirdiṣṭā tatphalaṃ vā kāryasyotpattisti yasyedaṃ karmeti nirdekṣyete,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8298: nanu yadīdamā jagatparāmṛṣṭaṃ tatastadantarbhūtāḥ puruṣā apīti ya eteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāmiti punaruktamityata āha-etaduktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8306: anyārthaṃ tu jaiminiḥ praśnavyākhyānābhyām api caivam eke / BBs_1,4.18 /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8307: nanu 'prāṇa evaikadhā bhavati'ityādikādapi vākyājjīvātiriktaḥ kutaḥ pratīyata ityato vākyāntaraṃ paṭhati-etasmādātmanaḥ prāṇā iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8309: vedāntaprakriyāyāmevopapattimupasaṃhāravyājenāha-tasmādyatrāsyaātmano yato niḥsaṃbodho 'taḥ svacchatārūpamiva rūpamasyeti svacchatārūpo na tu svacchataiva /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8312_0: etadeva vibhajate-upādhibhiḥ antaḥkaraṇādibhiḥ janitaṃ yadviśeṣavijñānaṃ ghaṭapaṭādivijñānaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:8312_2: sadbrahmaiva syāttacca nityamiti nopādhijanitaṃ nāpi tadrihitaṃ svarūpaṃ brahmasvabhāvasyāprahāṇāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8314: yadā tu layalakṣaṇāvidyopabṛṃhito vikṣepasaṃskāraḥ samudācarati tadā viśeṣavijñānotpādātsvapnajāgarāvasthātaḥ paramātmano rūpādbhraṃśarūpamāgamanamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8317: nanvatrākāśaṃ śayanasthānaṃ tatkutaḥ paramātmapratyaya ityata āha-ākāśaśabdaśceti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8322: tatra mandadhiyāṃ nedaṃ prāṇanirākaraṇāyeti buddhirmā bhūdityāśayavānāha-prāṇanirākaraṇasyāpīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8334_1: maitraiyyā bhāryāyāḥ kātyāyanyā sahārthasaṃvibhāgakaraṇa ukte maitreyī yājñavalkyaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:8335: yannu ma iyaṃ bhagoḥ sarvā pṛthvī vittena pūrṇā syātkimahaṃ tanāmṛtā syāmuta neti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8337: yathaivopakaraṇavatāṃ jīvitaṃ tathaiva te jīvitaṃ syādamṛtatvasya tu nāśāsti vittena /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8338: evaṃ vittenāmṛtatvāśā bhavedyadi vittasādhyāni karmāṇyamṛtatve upayujyeran /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8340: jñānasādhyatvādamṛtatvasya karmaṇāṃ ca jñānavirodhināṃ tatsahabhāvitvānupapatteriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8341: sā hovāca maitreyī yenāhaṃ nāmṛtā syāṃ kimahaṃ tenaṃ kuryāṃ yadeva bhagavān veda tadeva me brūhi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8343_1: patijāyādiṣu vairāgyamutpādayituṃ yājñavalkyo 'na vā are patyuḥ kāmāya'ityādivākyasaṃdarbhamuvāca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8344: ātmaupādhikaṃ hi priyatvameṣāṃ na tu sākṣāt priyāṇyetāni /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8345: tasmādetebhyaḥ patijāyādibhyo virabhya yatra sākṣātprema sa evaātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8348: etatsādhanāni ca śravaṇādīni vihitāni śrotavya ityādinā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8350: ātmano vā are darśanena śravaṇādisādhanenedaṃ jagatsarvaṃviditaṃ bhavatīti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8351: yato nāmarūpātmakasya jagatastattvaṃ pāramārthikaṃ rūpamātmaiva bhujaṅgasyeva samāropitasya tattvaṃ rajjuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8352: tasmādātmani vidite sarvamidaṃ jagattattvaṃ viditaṃ bhavati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8353: rajjvāmiva viditāyāṃ samāropitasya bhujaṅgasya tattvaṃ viditaṃ bhavati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8354: yatastasmādātmaiva draṣṭavyo na tu tadatiriktaṃ jagat svarūpeṇa draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8360: ātmaiva jagatastattvaṃ na tu tadatiriktaṃ kiñcittaditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8362: yat khalu yadgrahaṃ vinā na śakyate grahītuṃ tattato na vyatiricyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8366: na gṛhyante ca cidrūpagrahaṇaṃ vinā sthitikāle nāmarūpāṇi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8370_1: 'pi tu nāmarūpotpatteḥ prāgapi cidrūpāvasthānāt tadupādānatvācca nāmarūpaprapañcasya tadanatirekaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8371_0: rajjūpādānasyeva bhujaṅgasya rajjoranatireka ityetaddṛṣṭāntena sādhayati bhagavatī
GSP33brsvbh1u:8371_1: śrutiḥ-'sa yathārdraidho 'grerabhyāhitasya pṛthagdhūmā viniścarantyevaṃ vā are 'sya
GSP33brsvbh1u:8371_2: mahato bhūtasya niḥśvasitametadyadṛgvedaḥ'ityādinā caturvidho mantra uktaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8378: yadā ca nāmadheyasyeyaṃ gatistadā tatpūrvakasya rūpadheyasya kaiva katheti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8379: na kevalaṃ tadupādānatvāttato na vyatiricyate nāmarūpaprapañcaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8381: yathā sāmudramevāmbhaḥ pṛthivītejaḥ saṃparkāt kāṭhinyamupagataṃ saindhavaṃ khilyaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8382: sa hi svākāre samudre kṣipto 'mbha eva bhavati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8383: evaṃ cidambhodhau līnaṃ jagacchideva bhavati na tu tato 'tiricyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8385: dṛṣṭāntaprabandhamuktvā dārṣṭāntike yojayati-evaṃ vā are idaṃ mahaditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8393: etebhyaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvena vyavasthitebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya sāmyenotthāya /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8397_2: tānyeva bhūtāni naśyantyanu tadupādhiścidātmanaḥ khilyabhāvo vinaśyati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8399: na pretya saṃjñāstīti saṃjñāmātraniṣedhādātmā nāstīti manyamānā sā maitreyī hovāca,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8400: atraiva mā bhagavānamūmuhanmohitavān na pretya saṃjñāstīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8403: ānandajñānaikarasabrahmādvayānubhave tu tat kena kaṃ paśyet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8411: dvaitanindayā cādvaitaguṇakīrtanādbrahmaiva maitreyībrāhmaṇe pratipādyaṃ na jīvātmeti nāsti pūrvapakṣa ityanārabhyamevedamadhikaraṇam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8414: nāpijñānakartṛtvamakartuḥ sākṣācca mahato bhūtasya vijñānātmabhāvena samuttānābhidhānaṃ vijñānātmana eva draṣṭavyatvamāha /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8415: anyathā brahmaṇo draṣṭavyatvapare 'smin brāhmaṇe tasya vijñānātmatvena samutthānābhidhānamanupayuktaṃ syāttasya tu draṣṭavyamupayujyata ityupakramamātraṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8420: tadevaṃ paurvāparyālocanayā maitreyībrāhmaṇasya brahmadarśanaparatve sthite bhoktrā jīvātmanopakramamācāryadeśīyamatena tāvatsamādhatte sūtrakāraḥ-
GSP33brsvbh1u:8423: yathā hi vahnervikārā vyuccaranto visphuliṅgā na vahneratyantaṃ bhidyante,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8427: tathā jīvātmano 'pi brahmavikāra na brahmaṇo 'tyantaṃ bhidyante,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8433: tatra tadvijñānena sarvavijñānapratijñāsiddhaye vijñānātmaparamātmanorabhedamupādāya paramātmani darśayitavye vijñānātmanopakrama ityāśmaradhya ācāryo mene //20//
GSP33brsvbh1u:8437: utkramiṣyata evaṃ bhāvād ity auḍulomiḥ / BBs_1,4.21 /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8439: jīvo hi paramātmano 'tyantaṃ bhinna eva san dehendriyamanobuddhyupadhānasaṃparkātsarvadā kaluṣaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8442: yathāhuḥ pāñcarātrikāḥ-'āmukterbheda eva syājjīvasya ca parasya ca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8447: saṃprati svābhāvikameva jīvasya nāmarūpaprapañcāśrayatvalakṣaṇaṃ kāluṣyaṃ pārthivānāmaṇūnāmiva śyāmatvaṃ kevalaṃ pākeneva /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8448: jñānadhyānādinā tadapanīya jīvaḥ parātparataraṃ puruṣamupaitītyāha-kvacicca jīvākṣayamapīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8458: ākāśa iva ghaṭamaṇikādikalpitāvacchedo ghaṭākāśo maṇikākāśo na tu paramākāśādanyastadvikāro vā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8462: atha vikāraḥ paramātmano jīvaḥ kasmānna bhavatyākāśādivadityāha-naca tejaḥprabhṛtīnāmiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8463: nahi yathā tejaḥprabhṛtīnāmātmavikāratvaṃ śrūyate evaṃ jīvasyeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8466: tathāca kathañcidbhedo 'pīti tamāsthāya kāryakāraṇabhāva iti matatrayamuktvā kāśakṛtsnīyamataṃ sādhutvena nirdhārayati-tatra teṣu madhye /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8470: rājaputrasyeva ca mlecchakule vardhamānasyātmani samāropito mlecchabhāvo rājaputro 'sīti āptopadeśena /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8471: na tu mṛdvikāraḥ śarāvādiḥ śataśo 'pi mṛnmṛditi cintyamānastajjanmanā mṛdbhāvasākṣātkāreṇa śakyo nivartayituṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8476: api ca jīvasyātmavikāratve tasya jñānadhyānādisādhanānuṣṭhānāt svaprakṛtāvapyaye sati nāmṛtatvasyāśāstītyapuruṣārthatvamamṛtatvaprāptiśrutivirodhaśca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8478: nanu yadi jīvo na vikāraḥ kintu brahmaiva kathaṃ tarhi tasminnāmarūpāśrayatvaśrutiḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8485: aikāntike hyādvaite ātmano 'nyakarmakaraṇe 'kena kaṃ paśyet'iti ātmanaśca karmatvaṃ 'vijñātāramare kena vijānīyāt'iti śakyaṃ niṣeddhum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8487: na kevalaṃ kāśakṛtsnīyadarśanāśrayaṇena bhūtapūrvagatyā vijñātṛtvamapi tu śrutipaurvāparyaparyālocanayāpyevamevetyāha-api ca yatra hīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8488: kasmāt punaḥ kāśakṛtsnasya matamāsthīyate netareṣāmācāryāṇāmityata āha-darśitaṃ tu purastāditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8489: kāśakṛtsnīyasya matasya śrutiprabandhopanyāsena punaḥ śrutimattvaṃ smṛtimattvaṃ copasaṃhāropakramamāha-ataśceti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8496: apica yadi jīvaparamātmanorbhedābhedāvāsthīyeyātāṃ tatastayormitho virodhātsamuccayābhāvādekasya balīyastve nātmani nirapavādaṃ vijñānaṃ jāyeta,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8499: tataḥ saṃśaye sati na suniścitārthamātmani jñānaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8504: kathaṃ tarhi vyapadeśabuddhibhedau kṣetrajñaḥ paramātmeti kathañca nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvasya bhagavataḥ saṃsāritā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8511_1: jīveśvarayorbhedo 'pi bhāvika ityata āha-sthite ca paramātmakṣetrajñātmaikatveti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8512: na tāvadbhedābhedāvekātra bhāvikau bhavitumarhata iti viprapañcitaṃ prathame pāde /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8513: dvaitadarśananindayā caikāntikādvaitapratipādanaparāḥ paurvāparyālocanayā sarve vedāntaḥ pratīyante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8514: tatra yathā bimbādavadatāttāttvike pratibimbānāmabhede 'pi nīlamaṇikṛpāṇakācādyupadhānabhedātkālpaniko jīvānāṃ bhedo buddhivyapadeśabhedau vartayati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8515: idaṃ bimbamavadātamimāni ca pratibimbāni nīlotpalapalāśaśyāmalāni vṛttadīrghādibhedabhāñji bahūnīti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8516_1: jīvānāṃ bhedo buddhivyapadeśabhedāvayaṃ ca paramātmā śuddhavijñānānandasvabhāva ime
GSP33brsvbh1u:8517: avidyopadhānaṃ ca yadyapi vidyāsvabhāve paramātmani na sākṣādasti tathāpi tatpratibimbakalpajīvadvāreṇa parasminnucyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8523: kathaṃ cātmānaṃ saṃsāriṇaṃ vividhavedanābhājaṃ kuryādityādyanuyogo niravakāśaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8530: hanta jīvaḥ sphuṭa iti brahmāpi tathā syāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8531: tathā ca 'nihitaṃ guhāyām'iti nopapadyata ityata āha-nahi satyamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8532: yathāhi bimbasya maṇikṛpāṇādayo guhā evaṃ brahmaṇo 'pi pratijīvaṃ bhinnā avidyā guhā iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8533: yathā pratibimbeṣu bhāsamāneṣu bimbaṃ tadabhinnamapi guhyamevaṃ jīveṣu bhāsamāneṣu tadabhinnamapi brahma guhyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8534: astu tarhi brahmaṇo 'nyadguhyamityata āha-naca brahmaṇo 'nya iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8536: brahmaṇaḥ sarvātmanā bhāgaśo vā pariṇāmābhyupagame tasya kāryatvādanityatvācca tadāśrito mokṣo 'pi tathā syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8538: evaṃ ye nadīsamudranidarśanenāmukterbhedaṃ muktasya cābhedaṃ jīvasyāsthiṣata teṣāmapi nyāyenāsaṃgatiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8542: kiṃ pāthaḥ paramāṇava utaiṣāṃ saṃsthānabheda āhosvittadārabdho 'vayavī /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8543: tatra saṃsthānabhedasya vāvayavino vā samudraniveśe vināśāt kasya samudreṇaikatā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8544: nadīpāthaḥ paramāṇūnāṃ tu samudrapāthaḥ paramāṇubhyaḥ pūrvavasthitebhyo bheda eva nābhedaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8546: ye tu kāśakṛtsnīyameva matamāsthāya jīvaṃ paramātmanoṃ'śamācakhyusteṣāṃ kathaṃ 'niṣkalaṃ niṣkriyaṃ śāntam'iti na śrutivirodhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8547: niṣkalamiti sāvayavatvaṃ vyāsedhi na tu sāṃśatvam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8548: aṃśaśca jīvaḥ paramātmano nabhasa iva karṇanemimaṇḍalāvacchinnaṃ nabhaḥ śabdaśravaṇayogyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8549: vāyoriva ca śarīrāvacchinnaḥ pañcavṛttiḥ prāṇa iti cet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8553: hanta tarhi prāptāprāptavivekena karṇanemimaṇḍalaṃ vā tatsaṃyogo vetyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8559: nabhodharmatve hi tadanavayavaṃ sarvatrābhinnamiti tatsaṃyogaḥ sarvatrā pratheta /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8563: vyāpyaivāsti kevalaṃ pratisaṃbadhyadhīnanirūpaṇatayā na sarvatra nirūpyata iti cet,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8565: tatsaṃyuktaṃ tu nabhaḥ śravaṇayogyaṃ sarvatrāstīti sarvatra śravaṇaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8566: naca bhedābhedayoranyatareṇāṃśaḥ śakyo nirvaktum na cobhābhyāṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8568: tasmādanirvacanīyānādyavidyāparikalpita evāṃśo nabhaso na bhāvika iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8571: na jātu rajjvāmajñāyamāna urago bhayakampādikāryāya paryāpta iti vācyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8578: api ca bhāvikāṃśavādināṃ mate bhāvikāṃśasya jñānenocchettumaśakyatvānna jñānadhyānasādhano mokṣaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8580: evaṃ jīvo brahmaṇoṃ'śa iti kāśakṛtsnīyaṃ matamiti siddham //22//
GSP33brsvbh1u:8586: vedāntānāṃ brahmaṇi samanvaye darśite samāptaṃ samanvayalakṣaṇamiti kimaparamavaśiṣyate yadarthamidamārabhyata iti śaṅkāṃ nirākartuṃ saṃgatiṃ darśayannavaśeṣamāha-yathābhyudayeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8587: atra ca lakṣaṇasya saṃgatimuktvā lakṣaṇenāsyādhikaraṇasya saṃgatiruktā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8588: etaduktaṃ bhavati-satyaṃ jagatkāraṇe brahmaṇi vedāntānāmuktaḥ samanvayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8589: tatra kāraṇabhāvasyobhayathā darśanājjagatkāraṇatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ kiṃ nimittatvenaiva,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8591: tatra yadi prathamaḥ pakṣastata upādānakāraṇānusāraṇe sāṃkhyasmṛtisiddhaṃ pradhānamabhyupeyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8595: yadi tūttaraḥ pakṣastato nātivyāptirnāpyavyāptiriti sādhu lakṣaṇam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8600: āgamasya kāraṇamātre paryavasānādanumānasya tadviśeṣaniyamamāgamo na pratikṣipatyapi tvanumanyata evetyāha-pāriśeṣyādbrahmaṇo 'nyaditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8601: brahmopādānatvasya prasaktasya pratiṣedhe 'nyatrāprasaṅgātsāṃkhyasmṛtiprasiddhamānumānikaṃ pradhānaṃ śiṣyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8605: yathā somaśarmaṇaikena jñātena sarve kaṭhā jñātā bhavanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8615: 'tadihāpi pratijñādṛṣṭāntau mukhyārthāveva yuktau na tu 'yajamānaḥ prastaraḥ'itivadguṇakalpanayā netavyau,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8618: nimittakāraṇaṃ tu kāryādatyantabhinnamiti na tajjñāne kāryajñānaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8622: nahi tadānīṃ brahmaṇi jñāte sarvaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8624: yata iti ca pañcamī na kāraṇamātre smaryate api tu prakṛtau,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8632: etayā khalu svātantryalakṣaṇena kartṛtvena nimittatvaṃ darśitam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8640: śrutirbrahmaṇo jagadupādānatvamavadhārayantī upādānāntarābhāvaṃ sākṣādeva darśayatītisākṣāditisūtrāvayavena darśitamiti yojanā //25//
GSP33brsvbh1u:8657: kathaṃ ca tadbrahmaṇo rūpaṃ yadi tasya brahmopādānaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8668: hanta tarhi yādṛśamīśvaramāgamo gamayati tādṛśo 'bhyupagantavyaḥ sa ca nimittakāraṇaṃ copādānakāraṇaṃ ceśvaramavagamayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8670: iyaṃ copādānapariṇāmādibhāṣā na vikārābhiprāyeṇāpi tu tathā sarpasyopādānaṃ rajjurevaṃ brahma jagadupādānaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8671: na khalu nityasya niṣkalasya brahmaṇaḥ sarvātmanaikadeśena vā pariṇāmaḥ saṃbhavati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8677: tasmādadvaitopakramādupasaṃhārācca sarva eva vedāntā aikāntikādvaitaparāḥ santaḥ sākṣādeva kvacidadvaitamāhuḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8687: mā bhūtpradhānaṃ jagadupādānaṃ tathāpi na brahmopādānatvaṃ sidhyati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:8689: teṣāmapi hi kiñcidupodbalakamasti vaidikaṃ liṅgamityāśaṅkāmapanetumāha sūtrakāraḥ-etena sarve vyākhyātā vyākhyātāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:8691: 'pratijñālakṣaṇaṃ lakṣyamāṇe padasamanvayaḥ vaidikaḥ sa ca tatraiva nānyatretyatra sādhitam //28//
GSP33brsvbh1u:8692: 'iti śrīmadvācaspatimiśraviracite śrīmacchārīrakabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ prathamādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //4//
